item.title: I go skiing in the summer! Exploring Yongpyong Resort - Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon, South Korea
item.description:
Summer ski resorts are all `` green ''

I go skiing in the summer! Exploring Yongpyong Resort

Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon, South Korea

Is it a tree frog? Be sure to visit late spring or summer, not winter. The ski slopes at this time of year when the white slopes have turned into a lush green garden and the crowds have disappeared are peaceful. What do you have to do at the ski resort on summer days? You do not know. Unique summer sports fills the ski and snowboard retreat. In the early weekend when the hot weather was on the rise, Yongpyong Resort in Pyeongchang, Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do, enjoyed the exhilarating sports.
Do I try MTB too?
Confession, there was a time when I was looking for a ski resort to learn skiing. But one day I realized Not everyone can love skiing and snowboarding. Especially if you're as cold as you are. Unfortunately, it wasn't until summer that I was able to walk back to the ski slopes. One hot summer, at Daegwallyeong Yongpyong Resort, I faced the cool and lush landscape and wind.
As the heat started early this year, he led his family to Daegwallyeong. Daegwallyeong is much cooler than other areas, and there are plenty of things to do, including exotic ranches and large resorts. So it's perfect for a cool and exciting summer day.
We go to Yongpyong Resort for a walk and enjoy sports. Summer ski resorts have a different color and atmosphere than winter. The white-white landscape hides its traces and the surroundings are 'green'.
People enjoying MTB at Yongpyong Resort
The first thing you noticed at Yongpyong Resort is the MTB riders who race through the green. A group of riders ride their bikes downhill and jump from a slightly protruding chin. At the moment, the bicycle disintegrates and descends. It's short, but it makes a strong impression as if you were dealing with a slow motion effect. Watching riders jump from young children to adults.
The scene of jumping is thrilling just by looking at it.
Suddenly, it reminded me of the scenery I saw in Whistler, Canada many years ago. It was a fresh shock when many riders raced down the MTB at Whistler Ski Resort, which was standing on the summer road. Riding the bicycle while the wind was cool and exciting. Let's learn MTB to Koreans outside Korea. To challenge spirit. Of course, it's been a while since then.
MTB Riders Spot the Grass
A few years later, he faced an MTB riding scene at Yongpyong Resort. In the meantime, there has been a bicycle boom in Korea and many MTB users. At the same time, two MTB parks, which consisted of naturally mountain bike trails, began to emerge. Yongpyong Resort MTB Park opened in 2015. People come from various groups, including clubs, family and friends. Adult men and women as well as teenagers use the MTB park.
MTB Riders Spot the Grass
I went to the MTB center and riders gathered on the deck for a while. There are men in their 40s and 50s who came from the club, and middle school students who came to the MTB park for the first time and high school students who came with friends. Foreigners who have taken a plane to experience Yongpyong Resort MTB Park are also eye-catching. They come from Ireland and Thailand and have been riding the MTB here for three days and the course is quite attractive.
Various people enjoy the MTB Park.
'I want to ride once MTB' comes up again. Is it possible to use Yongpyong Resort MTB Park even for beginners without equipment preparation? Of course. There is a separate course for beginners at MTB Park, and rental bicycles and protective gear. MTB Park staff will also accompany the participants several times to guide the course. If you feel that you are familiar with the course, you can enjoy riding alone.
People preparing to depart MTB
You don't have to be scared how to climb a bike. This is because it is a course where you go up the lift and enjoy the downhill. There are originally five courses, depending on how each course is combined. You can enjoy 15 different courses.
Lift boarding ground
Admission tickets are 25,000 won for half day including lift fee and 35,000 won for weekly.
I am riding MTB under the lift.
Exhilarating sports to forget the heat
What if they are so envious of riding the MTB and aren't ready to ride right now? Enjoy the mountain coaster. You can ride a mountain coaster instead of a bicycle to race through the meadow. Take the same lift as the MTB riders to the boarding area.
Take the lift to the mountain coaster boarding area
Mountain coasters ride on sleds and slide down rails. Yongpyong Resort Mountain Coaster has a total length of 1300m and a maximum speed of 40km. The feeling of speed with bare body is quite fast. The operation method is easy. Speed up and slow down with one lever. Young children can also be used with their parents. Feeling like you're sliding down a green mountain foot is the `` let '' itself!
Ride through the forest on a mountain coaster
When you come down the mountain coaster, you will see buggy cars and four-wheeled motorcycles aside. Ride a buggy or four-wheeled motorcycle and off-road against the green slopes. It's not a good road, but a fun driving experience in Yongpyong Resort's nature. It feels cool to ride a bumpy road on a buggy.
Let's run off-road with buggy car
There are also leisure facilities next to the Buggy River Four Wheel Motorcycle Experience Center. There are various experiences to satisfy every age group from young children to adults. Children's electric cars, air bumper cars, triway, horse riding and so on. There's also a Segway, which Steve Jobs praised as "the best invention ever since PC" (unfortunately, it didn't resonate).
There is also an electric car for children.
Segway was developed in 2001 by an American inventor named Dean Carmen. One person stands and rides on the balance of the body. The sensor measures the occupant's center of gravity movement in hundredths of a second, balancing it against falling. It can be used from the 3rd grade of elementary school and from 20kg or more
There are various experiences such as horse riding through the meadow.
Listen to the guide and learn the basics. There is no device like a brake at all. Only body balance moves. Anyone can enjoy the basic motions such as forward, stop, and rotate. It consists of a course where you learn the basics and take a look around with your guide. The general experience lasts about 20 minutes and the mountain experience using the mountain segway takes about 30 minutes.
Segway that anyone can easily enjoy by learning the basics

Her 40-year-old husband and 10-year-old daughter raise their thumbs after riding the Segway. It's very fun. Well… . The downside of Segway is aftereffects. My husband wants to buy a Segway, and her daughter searches for the internet and asks her to go to Yongpyong Resort for a Segway ride. You may have to endure this aftereffect.


It's getting hotter. If you are looking for a cool and fun place, put Yongpyong Resort on the list. You will agree with the 'frog frog' traveler's claim that skiing is a fun place in summer.

Take a look around with the guide

item.title: The best hidden unexplored east coast, Gangneung Hunhwa-ro Drive Course - Gangneung, South Korea
item.description:
Gangneung Hunhwa-ro, known as the road closest to the sea in Korea

The best hidden unexplored east coast, Gangneung Hunhwa-ro Drive Course

Gangneung, South Korea

Along the winding coastal roads, the landscape changes. Calm white sand stretches out calmly, while magnificent rock formations appear rough. Some of them move on the surfboards and move wildly, while others lay down a fishing rod and remain silent. Gangneung Hunhwa-ro is a place where you can run along the indigo sea and face the harsh and mild scenery.
With a wreath of the legend of Mrs.
Hunhwaro runs from Gangneung Geumjin Beach to Jeongdongjin Port. Hunhwa-ro has Jeongdongjin to the north and Okgye Beach to the south. In 1998, the Jinjin-Shimgok Port section was opened for the first time, and the 2001 Shingok Port-Jeongdongjin Port section was extended. In Geumjin, the Simgok section is a coastal road, and in Simgok port, the Jeongdongjin section is an inland road. The coastal road to Hwahwa-ro filled the sea. It is known as the closest road to the sea in Korea. In fact, when you run down this road, you feel like you are running on the sea.
“Hunhwa-ro” that goes well with the background of “Hunhwa-ga”
But why is the name of the road as a wreath? It is reminiscent of <Hunhwasa> in The Three Kingdoms History. Mrs. Su-ro, wife of Sun Jeonggong in Gangneung Taesu in the Silla era, was famous for being a savvy woman. Mrs. Su-ro went to Gangneung for a while and rested at the beach. At that time, I saw a beautiful rhododendron bloom on the cliff and asked if there was a tooth to pick, but all said it was impossible. However, an old man who passed by said that he picked up flowers and gave them to Mrs. The background of the story fits nicely with the scenery of the place, so it was named “Hunhwaro”.
The sea seen from Hunhwaro is magnificent and clear.
The narrative is the background, making the Hunhwaro a deeper and more mysterious space. But it is not only the narrative that makes the wreath special. The stunning view that blends with the coastal road is also a big attraction. It's as vivid as the waves that touch the rocks. In fact, waves are so close to the sea that sea water is pushed down the road. Nowadays, the visibility is better than in 1998, when it was first established. After the road was damaged by the waves, it was renovated in 2008. Previously, the roadside balustrade had a height of 1.2m, which obscured the view. The strange rock formations and the superb view of the sea rush into the snow.
Low roadside fences obstruct vision
Relaxing Jinjin Beach with vintage cafes and surfers
With the offering, the drive can be started from Jeongdongjin or Jinjin. You can enjoy the superb view in any direction, but if you're in the first place, start with Jinjin. You can feel the climax of the scenery that starts calmly and reaches the peak. Entering the Hunhwa-ro from Okgye IC and running towards the sea, there is a point that is gently turned to the left. This is where the cool scenery of the wreath begins. When the sea hides and hides and turns around the corner, it appears like a “gift of surprise”. Many people stop in the calm seascape. There is ample parking and a seating area to relax.
There is a view and rest area at the beginning of Geumjin Beach.
A seaside shelter is also available, or a vintage café across the street. The cafe has a small sign of “red tea cafe” on its simple appearance. The name is unique.
'Red Tea Café' Signs
The owner of the cafe originally ran a red food truck on the parking side. It was famous as a toast restaurant among those who visited Hunhwa-ro. Thanks to its popularity, it now runs a store. It was named `` red tea '' in the image of the red truck that was a trademark.
Neat atmosphere inside the cafe
The building used to be a restaurant was remodeled. It's not overly stylish, so it goes well with the simple Jinjin beach. Sitting on the outdoor terrace overlooks the sea.
A cool view from the red cafe terrace
You can taste homemade burgers, coffee, and drinks as well as toast, which has been a popular dish since the food truck.
A hearty homemade burger in the red cafe
If you enjoyed the sea while enjoying the yogi, now is a good time to enjoy the beach. Quiet and secluded Geumjin Beach unfolds before your eyes. The news that tens of thousands of people gathered at Gyeongpo Beach and Haeundae during the summer season seems like a distant world. Geumjin Beach is secluded even in midsummer. There are many regular summer vacationers who are attracted to such attraction.
People enjoying leisurely surf at Geumjin Beach
A few years ago, surfing spots have become popular and related companies are spawning. It's also fun to watch the novice surfers who have the opportunity to ride the waves while surfing the board. If you watch surfers running skillfully on the waves, you will be motivated to learn.
There are surf schools all over the beach
White rice in Hunhwa-ro, Geumjin Port-Simgok Port
Enjoy a leisurely rest at Geumjin Beach, then head back to Hunhwa-ro. You can ride a car or bike, or just walk. From Jinjin Port to Simgok Port, it can be said to be the beauty of Hunhwa-ro. The meandering views spread along the winding coast. The scenery created by the rock formations and the indigo sea creates a moist feeling for even the most blunt.
You can ride a bicycle as a wreath.
In the middle of the road, you stop and look at the sea. It is a wasteful scene to pass by car. You can also park your car at Simgok Port or Geumjin Port. The distance from Jinjin Port to Simgok Port is about 2km. I recommend walking slowly, if not all sections.
Take a break from the middle and enjoy the superb view
The path from Geumjin Port to Simgok Port is on one side of the sea and on the other is a strange rock formation. It's hard to find a shop. You can use the shops in Jinjin Port or Simgok Port. Near Jinjin Port, a stall called `` Hang-gu wagon '' is famous. Some people deliberately come to Jinjin Port in search of port wagons. It is famous for its kalguksu and crab sashimi. It's a tacky small stall but there are always many customers. These simple things, combined with the magnificent natural scenery, make the wreath stand out even more.
A small restaurant near port of Geumjin Port
Travel info

item.title: Mourning, Secret Garden of Mugwort Island - Goheung-gun, Jeonnam, Korea
item.description:
Flowers and the Sea in Mourning Star Garden

Mourning, Secret Garden of Mugwort Island

Goheung-gun, Jeonnam, Korea

I know someone who has traveled. Do not postpone tomorrow's trip to tomorrow. Met Mourning, a small island in Goheung, Jeonnam. All you need is a fluffy blanket to rest on the last beach, earphones to listen to sweet music, and a couple of books to save. In the spring, mourning wormwood is growing all over the island, and the mourning (艾 島) is called wormwood, which is not love. It is an island of rising love.
Sorrow Island, mourning for me
Is it possible to blow away the traces of daily routines and silly desires like squirrels' wheels, like the dust of the universe?
300 kinds of flowers bloom every season
Then he met mourning like fate. It was probably luckier than fate to find “Sumseom” mourning in days when they could not afford it.
Relaxing island that you can spend alone
The place where you can spend your time alone or alone without anyone's interruption as you wish you didn't want to do anything vigorously. A day of mourning, where you meet beautiful flower gardens against the backdrop of the ocean, moments of healing and emotions rush like waves.
Enjoy the horizon and flowers together
Mourning also retains its unique island culture. Mourning does not have dogs, chickens, or graves. In the alley, you can see only the cats running around.
Superb view of the tea ceremony
Like a stone wall that has long been a focal point, the 14 mourners have been keeping the traditional rules for hundreds of years.
Cats met in mourning
A flowery day spent at Healing Park
Ae Island (艾 島), a small island with a coastline length of 1 km (0.32㎢), is an island belonging to Bongrae-myeon, Goheung-gun, Jeonnam. The island, which is only 3 minutes by boat from the passenger ship terminal, is a near and distant island, but it is perfect for a healing trip.
Mourning near and far island, only 3 minutes from Narodo
If you look at the ferry terminal, I think Mourning Village will be in your hands. It's close enough to get off as soon as you get on the boat, but the sea breeze that hits it for a while is pleasant and cool. The mourning dock has a drone box filled with gulls. The admission fee of 5,000 won for Healing Park Mugwort Island is used for the island and its residents. Next to the unmanned box, a mourning guide map is kindly drawn. It's only a matter of time to fall in love with the scenery of mourning.
5,000 won is used for islands and residents.
Turn left at the dock and you'll see a steep hill road past the seagull café to the trail. As you climb up the tabac batak, the mountain path is cooler and more serene. The thick bushes, peugeots, meat and buckthorn villages meet in the lush forest of Nandaelim forest are reminiscent of the jungle in the movie.
Dense Nanrim Forest Trail
The 3km Mondang-gil walks while looking at the horizon.
Women's scattered rock that island villagers enjoyed
Climb the mountain trail, 80 meters above sea level, and meet the marine garden in front of you.
Forested and cool mountain trail
Over 300 kinds of flowers bloom from spring to winter, this is the space garden of mourning (star garden, solar garden, moon garden).
A thick tree called grandmother tree
Flower tail, crape myrtle, hibiscus, canna, sulphurous cosmos, chrysanthemum, marigold, zinnia, aster, silver marigold, evening primrose, cockscomb, moonbeam, velvet dong, kye gyuk, hydrangea, matari, double leaf chrysanthemum, melampodium, petunia If you come back to the village after looking around the star garden where 300 kinds of flowers with different names are blooming all year round, the wildflowers on the stone wall are not unusual. If you walk through the stone wall road of hundreds of years of love and walk to the well, you will see the beautiful camellia tree that has lived for 200 or 300 years.
Sunset view from Dongbaek-gil
Go through the two wells where you can feel the memories of the villagers and go up to the lighthouse.
Beautiful sunset lighthouse
It is a place where you can watch the sunset as it is said to be staying overnight because of the sunset. A beautiful night is an extra bonus if you stay overnight on the island. When the darkness falls, you can see the constellations that shine like black jewels.
Sunset from the lighthouse
Story of couple who turned wormwood hill into secret garden
Mourning is a private garden of Jeollanam-do No.1. Kim Sang-hyun, a couple of pharmacist Ko Chae-hoon, who fell in love with mourning, is a space garden, a maritime garden of 80m above sea level.
Star garden, Korea's only marine garden
As a resident, Kim Sang-hyun, who goes to Suksum Garden on weekends and vacations, gets a bright smile on her tanned face. In five scenes of falling in love and mourning, the voice becomes five times brighter.
“If you walk to the lighthouse in the Nanrim Forest, you will hear five interjections of‘ 와! ’. Once on the hill of ecstasy, where the dense forest of forests begins, two times to meet the view point overlooking the archipelago, three times in front of the star garden that begins on the hill, four times in the spring watching the spectacular view of Dongbaekgil. Five times, wow! Every landscape we meet in mourning is a wave of emotion. ”
He says he didn't need ground floor plants to create a space garden. There was a blue sea that went so well with the flowers. Thanks to his wife, who is well-educated as a gardening expert, she only cares about the arrangement of flowers.
Kim Sang-hyun made a beautiful marine garden in Mourning
Mourning can also be reached by boat (roundtrip KRW 2,000) from the passenger ship terminal at Bongrae-myeon, Goheung-gun, Jeonnam.
Seagull cafe exterior
The trip takes between 1 and 30 minutes to 2 hours, but if you want to take a leisurely stroll, remember the last boat time.
Unmanned Seagull Cafe
If you apply in advance, you can experience the forest with the forest commentator. During vacation, there are various experiences such as catching the beating of the sea, catching crabs, and catching jukumi. The proceeds are all used for the village. Every 20th of the month is a regular holiday for village boats.
Simply decorated stone crab pension
Travel info

item.title: Yeosu's famous bread tour from Dolsan Fresh Bread to Geomundo Sea Bread - Yeosu, Jeonnam, Korea
item.description:
It's unique since the name of bakery called Yeosu Fresh Baked

Yeosu's famous bread tour from Dolsan Fresh Bread to Geomundo Sea Bread

Yeosu, Jeonnam, Korea

Yeosu is famous for its seafood as it is located along the sea. You can find Seodaehoe and restaurants selling crab on white. In fact, '10 Yeosu 'includes Seodaehoe, crab baekban, Yeosu Korean set meal, grilled eel, grilled eel, cutlet stew, clam sashimi, shabu shabu, new clam shabu shabu, Dolsan gad kimchi, sashimi and grilled. Most are seafood. But you can't just taste seafood. You'll also need a Juburi to refresh your mouth while you try some of the signature dishes. You can enjoy Yeosu's specialty breads, which include Yeosu's specialty Dolsan Gad and Geomundo, which are made of sea wormwood, as well as the turtle-shaped bread that symbolizes the history of Yeosu and the bread that contains memories of Yeosu.
Special bread and pie with Dolsan freshly baked Yeosu fresh baked
Dolsangat Kimchi, which is included in Yeosu 10 rice, is already famous nationwide. The bitter taste of Dolsangat is commonly enjoyed with kimchi, but now it can be tasted as a new food. It is bread made with Dolsangat.
The place I visited to taste unique bread is the Yeosu Fresh Baked Bakery. Bakery is located near Dolsan Bridge, near Bongsan Crab Street. When you enter the bakery, you will see three different bakery profiles with different kinds of bread. Since it is a bakery in the Republic of Korea, the belief in taste goes first.
There are a variety of breads, but the first thing that catches your attention is Dolsangat Odong Bread and Kappa. Odong bread has various modifiers such as 'unique world', 'patent technology' and 'development of sediment.'
We sell pies made from Korean wheat and organic dolsan
On top of the paulownia bread is a topping made with Dolsan Fresh. The bread contains red bean sediment with nuts and cinnamon. Nut grains add to the chewing taste, and cinnamon adds flavor. Surprisingly bitter, the smell of gat is not felt at all. Kappi is also sweet and crispy without smelling.
Yeosu Fresh Baked Bakery has a variety of breads
We studied and prepared for 3 years until we made bread and pie that everyone can enjoy deliciously with freshly made ingredients. Add eco-friendly Dolsan fresh powder to bread, pies and cookies. Also, Kappi used our wheat to add health.
Paulownia Bread with Dolsan Fresh
Odong bread and Kappi make the trip to Yeosu even more special. 1,800 won for paulownia bread and 1,300 won for goat pies.
It tastes chewy with nuts in sediment
Geomundo Grand Piape with bread full of sea wormwood flavor
This time it's time to taste the bread made with sea wormwood. Geomundo Haepoong Mugwort is famous for being a healthy eco-friendly wormwood grown in the face of sea breeze and seaweed. In recognition of its geographical characteristics, it was designated as a geographically registered registered agricultural product. If you go to the Grand Piaf at the roundabout in Yeosu-dong, Yeosu, you can find delicious bread made with sea wormwood. It is filled with specialty bread made by a baker who is from Japan's East Economics Academy and has over 20 years of experience.
A baker with 20 years of experience presents a variety of breads
While eye-catching bread is full, first look for bread with Geomungdo sea wormwood. Geomun also has pancakes made with sea wormwood, red bean bread and castella. The wormwood is not strong in general and can be enjoyed by everyone. Sea wormwood pancakes are made with the traditional Japanese style of Dorayaki. On the outside of the bread is the word 'Geommoondo Haepoong mugwort'. The bread is green with mugwort, and inside is a cow mixed with red beans and cream.
Pancakes with the words ‘Geomundo Haepoong mugwort’
In red bean bread, red bean sediment is added to the bread added with Geomundo sea wormwood. Red beans are usually boiled directly in stores, but only processed red beans are used in the hot summer months. However, red beans in red bean shaved ice are cooked directly throughout the year. Haipung mugwort pancakes cost 1,200 won and sweet red bean paste 1,500 won each.
Seaweed mugwort is added to red bean bread and becomes light green
Yeosu specialty bread and turtle sun bread next to Yi Sun Shin Square
Let's go to Yi Sun Shin Square, which was built in the old port of Yeosu. The cool sea and the 2nd Dolsan Bridge can be seen at a glance. It is a good place to take a walk and relax while facing the sea breeze. There is a turtle ship at Yi Sun Shin Square, and there is a turtle turtle shop near Yeosu specialty bread. It sells bread made in the shape of a turtle ship in harmony with Yi Sun Shin Square. It wasn't long before, but it was already word of mouth among travelers.
Turtle Sun Bread Shop near Yi Sun Shin Square
There are two types of bread, turtle-shaped bread and turtle-shaped citron bread. Turtle Sun Bread recently attempted a slight taste change. It adds a crispy texture to the tart, and adds a little more variety to the taste.
Turtle bread made in the shape of turtle
There are five flavors: sweet pumpkin, blueberry, chocolate, milkshake, and green tea. Choose your taste and have fun.
There is turtle bread with sweet pumpkin sediment
On the other hand, yuzu bread has a completely different shape and taste from turtle sun bread. It is fresh with yellow and round shape. If you make a bite of natural citron juice, the citron will spread in your mouth. Yuzu was also added to the cream slightly above. Yuzu bread doubles its flavor, especially when eaten cool.
Citron bread with fresh yellow color
There is another place where you can taste this yuzu bread, Tongyeong. This is because the owner of Tongyeong's “Turtle Line Honey Bread” is the same. The turtle sun bread is made by the owner every morning in Tongyeong and brought to Yeosu. Because they sell only a fixed amount a day, they are often sold out in the morning on weekends and vacations. It is open at 9am on weekdays and 8:30 am on weekends. Turtle bread is not available individually, and a box of five is 9,000 won.
Citron bread with fresh yellow color
Rustic bread that brings memories, single bungle bakery
Single Bungle Bakery is a simple neighborhood bakery where you can taste the old bread of memories. It is such a bakery that I saw in front of school. In fact, Yeoju Joongang Elementary School, Yeosu Girls 'Middle School, and Yeosu Girls' High School are gathered near Single Bungle Bakery. There are only six kinds of bread. They sell salad bread, croquettes, red bean donuts, sausage bread, cream bread and steamed bread. Salad bread with cabbage and pink sausage mixed with mayonnaise is a nostalgia for its shape and taste. Bread costs 800 won each. It is not expensive because it is aimed at students. The store has more than 20 years of history, and it's only 600 won higher than it used to be. Compared to the fort inflation rate, it is a slow climb.
'Single Bungle Bakery' makes you smile even by name
The taste is nothing special. Is it special to memorize the taste? And like the name, the kindness of the owner who always welcomes guests with a single face is special. Travelers can also be guided in detail on the Yeosu travel course. This is the information we hear from locals who have love for Yeosu. The reason why travelers come to this small bakery in the corner is not just the taste of bread, but the special atmosphere where you can feel the memories and affection.
Hot steamed buns that are delicious even in summer

item.title: Excitement that can not be stopped once, Tongyeong Rouge - Tongyeong, Gyeongnam, Korea
item.description:
Travelers down the Luge Track

Excitement that can not be stopped once, Tongyeong Rouge

Tongyeong, Gyeongnam, Korea

Many people gather to sleigh in southern Tongyeong, where the spring is full of warm spring. This is to ride the Skyline Rouge, which can only be enjoyed at six locations around the world. LUGE is a playground that uses specially designed carts and tracks using only the slope and gravity of the ground without special power devices. It was first invented in Rotorua, New Zealand, and opened sixth in Tongyeong after New Zealand (2), Canada (2) and Singapore (1).
As soon as it opened in February 2017, guests will have to wait for more than two hours on weekends. Still, Luge's popularity doesn't fade. Due to the relatively low number of visitors early in the morning or on weekdays, it is best to avoid crowded hours to relax.
Long queued passengers on the rouge
Skyline Luge is the same name as Winter Sports Luge, but much safer and easier. Think of it as a sled with a steering wheel and wheels. The operation is as simple as a sled, so children over 110 centimeters can ride alone. Children 85 to 110 cm tall must be accompanied by a guardian.
Rouge sled is carried behind a chairlift
To experience the luge, take a chairlift overlooking Mt. Miseung and Tongyeong downtown to the upper boarding area. Before riding a chairlift, you should choose a helmet that fits your head. First-time users are taught how to use simple sleds. At the boarding area, the left row is for those who have been trained in sledding and the right is for first-timers.
The helmet is available in XS, S, M, L and XL.
Sit down with your legs straight and push the handle forward with both hands, and the sled will slowly slide forward. Release the force a little more and push the steering wheel forward to gain speed. Conversely, pulling the handle toward you slows down. Follow the instructions of the guide and confirm that you are moving and stopping the sleigh and immediately stand at the starting line.
The helmet is available in XS, S, M, L and XL.
Slowly down the slope, get a confirmation that you have been trained to sled on the back of your hand and run the track in earnest. If you get a stamp, you can board immediately without training from the second time.
Safety officer tells you how to operate simple
You have to come down with no power, so do not apply braking on the first straight course to accelerate. If you want to accelerate to some degree, S-shaped, U-shaped, 360-degree rotating course comes out. There is only one 360-degree turn course in the world, so tourists who have used the Luge from abroad may come to enjoy the new track.
Once trained, put a stamp on the back of your hand
Currently there is only one track, but by 2020, the plan is to create a track that begins at three starting points and is divided into six courses during the descent.
Passengers down the Luge Track
Safety guards are on the dangerous course and look low on the road, but there are barriers on both sides of the track so you don't have to worry about leaving the track. Cool spring breezes sweep their faces and the blue sea of the South Sea unfolds beneath their feet. In the beautiful scenery, joyful shouts are heard both here and there.
Passengers down the Luge Track
Rouge track total 1.5km. It runs about 10-15km per hour and arrives in the lower station in 8-10 minutes. It seems to have ended so quickly that I sell additional tickets at the exit. One-time, three-time and five-time passes are sold, most of which are purchased at least three times. Once you get down, you can realize the meaning of "Once is never enough".
The last course has a curved track
On the first attempt, driving a sleigh is immature and it takes about 10 minutes to come down to the end when it is scared with acceleration. From the second, there are tips and confidence, and time is getting less and less. Couples who have used the luge several times are racing ahead or walking backwards. It's an amusement facility that comes first for children and later for adults.
Luge souvenirs sold at the lower stop
When planning a luge in Tongyeong, my slogan is "Ruge in the cable car land in the sky." Tongyeong's representative travel course, Hallyeo Sudo View Cable Car, and Luge Boarding Hall are well located up and down. As you ride the Tongyeong cable car, you can see the Luge boarding area under your feet. Tongyeong, where you can enjoy the sky, the land, the island and the sea, is the best place for spring travel. Enjoy a fun luge sled, then ate Tteokbokki in Seopirang village, leave for an island floating on the indigo sea, or ride a bike along the coast. Seasoned torii and Munge Bibimbap stimulate the appetite, and Tongyeong's representative foods such as jjigae, minced rice porridge, honey bread, and Chungmu Gimbap attract tourists everywhere. Things to see, Tongyeong overflowing with food is not enough for a day.
Hallyeo Capital View Cable Car and Luge Boarding Pass

item.title: Hot shop without sign - Korea, Seoul
item.description:
`` Shop without signage '' without sign

Hot shop without sign

Korea, Seoul

There are shops that are returning with hundreds or thousands of SNS certification shots. The price seems a bit high, but the attractive idea that satisfies everything including taste, space, atmosphere and mood deserves to slip away from your pocket. The quality of the product is nagging. After seeing the exterior, opening the door, sitting and watching the fun, he turns his head, and as soon as the food comes into the mouth, the admiration gun is fired. The evolution and transformation of the shop are grateful as consumers living in modern times. If you want to be impressed by the boring everyday moments, go visit! Shop without sign.
Nobody knew, this is a restaurant! Ikseon-dong ‘Shop without signage’
Three young friends gathered and had a big job. Three representatives opened a unique Italian restaurant with great personality and a grievous body but more pleasant than ever. Its name, space, and menu are all different, but it is a shop without signage.
Simple and familiar menu, but full of personality
The main menu is pasta, risotto and pizza. It was accompanied by drinks and liquors to add a taste of the food. No sign was put up. Without a sign, I wanted to bring people together with taste, affection, and atmosphere just like a small restaurant in the country that people always look for. Friends from high school have opened a shop without a signboard in July 2017, based on what they learned in their fields of operation, planning, marketing, and cooking. Since then, there is no signboard, so many people are coming.
Interior of the old space
Their fusion Italian menu is so popular that it sells out before breaktime. The menu includes familiar ingredients such as cheerful pasta, oyster pasta, steak risotto, and spinach pizza, and the name is familiar to us.
Witch sniper
This is where you make your own sauces and broths. Cherry tomatoes mixed with basil pesto and pickled in home-grown peppers are also proud of their attractive taste.
Uniquely shaped menus
Ikseon-dong Hanok Alley was a perfect place for them to pursue a cozy restaurant like home. I thought it would be good to add restrained sophistication, leaving the old look of the space. Even the people doing the interior work advised that signs should be attached. I've never thought it was fashionable, but the three representatives are realizing the trend without signboards so that inquiries from the media such as magazines come in.
Spinach pizza with a boiled egg and spinach
Ikseon-dong Hanok Street, where there are no signs, is located in the center of downtown Seoul. It is a so-called urban-style Hanok, and Hanok Village was established by urban planning in the 1970s. In this place where meat shops, collections and noodles were used to fill the common people's stomachs, shops armed with stylish interiors are attracting many people of all ages. Waiting is the default for shops without signs. If you want to enjoy the atmosphere and taste of this house, the first thing you should do is write down your weighting notes. There are so many things to see and enjoy right in front of you, next to the alleys, so boredom is not allowed.
‘No signage’ in Hanok Alley, Ikseon-dong
Is it a photo zone? Mangwon-dong Cafe ‘Vending Machine’
As if he met 'Pink of Life', he is busy trying to take a picture in front of the vending machine. In the early days, people who were mistaken as real photo zones had to pose and take pictures in front of the vending machine, and the vending machine had to open up to have both surprise and embarrassment. Everyone knows now. The fact that the pink vending machine is the doorway.
This is the entrance to the vending machine, which is good for taking pictures!
Those who take pictures in front of the vending machine also notice who is coming out of the vending machine doorway, and those who want to use the vending machine do not obstruct the photo shoot as much as possible and are polite to each other.
The world inside the vending machine
If you pose in front of the pink vending machine and dogs and make a certified shot back and forth, it's time to hand over the photozone to the back and open the vending machine door. How do you open a heavy vending machine door? Let's not break the style and grab the pink door. It's rather heavy, but you can grab the hook by the door and pull it hard.
All menus are pretty careful
Inside the vending machine is a pink world decorated with pink. This is the place where the owner wanted the motif from Alice in Wonderland. This is the world in the vending machine. It's not strange, but it's definitely an invitation to a different world.
Pink whale is fondant in tin
In a pink world, a smile already spreads around the mouth and pink energy spreads on both cheeks. Round donuts, cup cakes in cans called tin cakes, three to four times hesitant, a sniper, a cautious café menu with a spoon and a courage to dig through it.
Menus in wooden tray
The interior is also new, including the courtyard indoor garden and the seating that leads to the walls. The old milk fridge is pink and built up, and the paper cup you drink with the lime water is pink. The interior of the door as well as the interior is the backdrop for life photography.
Cafe accessories armed with sensual design
The neighborhood where the cafe 'Vending Machine' is located is Mangwon Market, not far from Mangwon Station (Line 6). It's been a long time since it became a hot alley loved by people. The appearance of the pink vending machine café also contributed to greater attention.
The uniqueness of the cafe “Vending Machine,” contained in small props
Enjoying the pink atmosphere at the cafe, you will find pink signs all over Mangwon Market. If the whole world is so pink, wouldn't it be a little brighter today and tomorrow? Fun Pink World Vending Machine Cafe Good energy.
Blue garden in the pink world
It's not a club, it's a bakery! Apgujeong-dong “a bakery”
The English name is OUR, and in Korean it is AU. Interesting thing is to start with the name. Underscores followed by the outer. What do we want to say? Our is one of the work of CNP, a marketing business startup created by a long time of friends. CNP is based on solid growth of young ideas such as branding, marketing and design.
Exterior without sign of Our Bakery
The Outer Bakery is the result and a brand of CNP to expand further. Beginning with bakery, the pasta, dining, and café's fields are endless. CNP's works include Bad Farmers, which delivers honest and healthy food, and Brother Hood Kitchen, a family restaurant serving American home-styles.
Luxurious design heavy door
It is contained in our world, our dream. People have different wishes. But what is clear is that everyone wants something. Our Bakery wants bread! It is also delicious, healthy and pretty bread.
Meringueberry
The appearance of the Outer Bakery is a combination of sophistication and simplicity. On the first floor of a building on the corner of the crossroad, the heavy door of a black tattoo-like pattern is hard to push. If you open the door with something thrilling, you will find a small cafe space rather than the size of the outside building. Overall, the interior is black and the furniture with the texture of wood and iron and the golden lights are combined like the colors in the picture.
Our Bakery in One Piece of Bread
The smell of bread and the aroma of coffee that irritate the tip of the nose also stimulate the salivary glands. There is a display stand in front of the bakery studio, and on top of that, SNS-hot breads are placed in different colors and shapes. A variety of breads are available, including spinach chiavata, sausage pastries, double cheeses, cranberry walnuts and whole grain breads. One of them is dirty chocolate.
Dirty chocolate and croissant coming out of oven
Bao chocolat, kneaded with balona or cocoa, is packed with cocoa powder. If you tear it off with your hands, you can feel the texture of the bread, but the rich cocoa powder is scattered around your hands, mouth, and surroundings. This is why people are more loved by people.
Even interior coffee is luxurious accessories
It's a bit unfamiliar to the cafe, but there's a waiting note at the entrance to the Outer Bakery. Those who come here are not just for bread. You're more inclined to stay in an atmosphere like a club or a bar and share your well-made bread and coffee with a good person. Cafe seats are always full. Putting your name on the waiting notes, holding a bread that won't flow too much and one of our drinks aiming for the finest coffee, you can take a walk around Dosan Park next door. .
Our Bakery Cafe Area
If bread is preferred over space, it is good to check the bread time before each menu and find a shop. Remember that popular menus quickly run out. If you check our SNS page, you'll find a variety of information, from bread making to menu introduction. Our bakery is gradually expanding the space where you can meet at home and abroad, including Dosan Head Office, Jamsil Lotte, Cyders, Beijing Sanlitun, and Gwangju Asian Culture Complex.
Interior of stylish outer bakery

item.title: A journey to Seosan's delicacies, from plain soup to traditional hotteok - Seosan, Chungnam, South Korea
item.description:
The soup is made with a blend of plain broth and crunch

A journey to Seosan's delicacies, from plain soup to traditional hotteok

Seosan, Chungnam, South Korea

The warm spring breeze blows softly and the hips are hilarious. The energy of spring multiplies the excitement of travel. It's a good season to go anywhere. The sea full of spring breeze is good and the market full of spring energy is good. If you add seasonal delicacies that will enhance your taste buds in spring, you can add icing. It would be better if the food is not common anywhere. So I chose Seosan, Chungnam, where the sea, the market, and seasonal delicacies are located.
What is soup?
If you are looking for Seosan on the west coast, many will taste Jukkumi Shabu Shabu or Urukhoe. If you add one, it's a local delicacy. The food is familiar to the Seosan people, but the name is strange to the outsiders. You can think of it as Maeuntang because it is a soup that is made with Urug. I might be worried that it will be rude. But the soup is a light dish with immaculate soup. It is closer to North Korea or Hwang than Thailand.
The main ingredient of the soup is Urugpo. Urug, also called zodiac rock, usually gives birth in spring. Because you gain weight before spawning, you can enjoy the spring season. There are many occasions where you can enjoy spring Uruk, which is full of flesh. Remove the guts and split in half and season with salt. Then, in the spring sunshine and wind, they usually dry for three days to complete Urugpo.
Now that the main character, Urugpo, is finished, let's boil the soup. You'll need a supporting shrimp sashimi, and prepare radish, green onions, and chopped garlic, which are usually served in a clear soup. Add tofu, which will add a lot of richness, and even dry peppers to give it a bitter flavor. Boil soup with rice water rather than plain water to make it taste stronger.
If you eat a piece of meat
In Urukukguk, it is 'one of the gods' that uses dried Urukpo instead of raw Urukpo. In the Seosan area, Urugpo was posted on a Buddhist memorial service, and it was said that the origin of Urugukguk was that the soup was eaten after it was finished. The dried fish makes the texture soft and chewy and doesn't have a fishy taste. The soup is so light that everyone can enjoy it. If you put the fluffy meat in your mouth, the flavor will spread. Once you drink a thick broth and bite a chubby meat, a bowl of rice disappears in no time.
Wagyu soup is made of rolled Urugpo
If you want to taste the soup, go to Seosan City's local restaurant or Samgilpohang. In Seosan city, there are several local restaurants serving local delicacies. The local restaurants, Sanhae Delicacy, and Seosan Flower Crab are popular among locals.
Restaurants for Sale
These restaurants specialize in Seosan's delicacies, such as Korean soup and crab soup, so you can enjoy the taste of local food. In addition, depending on the shop, they offer other specialties of Seosan, including crab soup, stew, and taeyeon. It is good to taste various local delicacies in one place.
Delicacies in Seosan, including Ecklonia and Gecko
Enjoy Seosan 9-mi Soup with Samgilpo Port
Samgilpohang is the best place to taste Urukhoe and Ukraint Soup against the sea. Samgilpo Port belongs to Seosan 9 View, and Urugukguk belongs to Seosan 9mi. In other words, you can enjoy special food in the beautiful scenery. Samgilpo Port, the gateway to the north of Seosan, is abundant with marine products.
Samgilpo Port
The large Uru-shaped statue built in the port and the annual Samgil-po-Luck poisoning festival represent Uru-san's main production area. In Samgilpohang area restaurant, you can easily find the menu. In the ship sashimi restaurant, the specialty of Samgil Pohang, Urug is the main character.
There is a large Uru statue in Samgilpo Port.
If you follow the signboard 'Flying Ship', the ships are lined up on the sea. Buying and selling fish is no different from any other fish market, but the space is the sea and the shop is a fishing boat.
You can buy sashimi at a sushi restaurant on board
The items sold here are mainly rockfish, songme, halibut, flatfish, and liver. Uruguay and flatfish can choose between wild and aquaculture. You can sashimi and go to a nearby restaurant to eat for a small table. After eating sashimi, you can try the local delicacy instead of spicy soup.
You can buy sashimi at a sushi restaurant on board
After a meal, take a walk through Samgilpohang. Sculptures installed in various places and seagulls flying in groups create a sight.
Sculptures are installed along the sea
Buy Urugpo and eat Hotteok, Seosan Eastern Market
You can buy Urugpo in Samgilpo Port, but if you go to Seosan Dongbu Market, you can find Urugpo and other seasonal ingredients. Seosan Eastern Market, located in the city center, is a traditional traditional market that opened in 1956. Being a central market in Seosan, I'm full of seafood and produce from the region. It's like looking around the fields and seas of Seosan even after a market round.
Seosan Dongbu Market, full of local seasonal specialties
The fish market corner is filled with fresh seafood such as jukkumi, clams, oysters and wild crab. It's as lively as the ocean. Enjoy the fun of the market with a great deal. There is a restaurant on the second floor of the fish market, where you can cook and eat seafood from the market.
Seosan Dongbu Market, full of local seasonal specialties
It's not just living seafood. As you walk inside the market, dried fish are a must. You can find various kinds of dried fish such as bakdae, flounder, and smelt. The most noticeable of these is Urugpo. Filled Urugpo is one of Seosan Eastern Market's most popular items. Aunt Merchant came to Seosan to buy Urugpo and try Urugup Soup or Urugpo Steaming. Once you're addicted to the taste, you keep buying only Urugpo.
We sell various dried fish such as Urugpo
Seosan Dongbu Market has many unique foods besides Urugpo. Emotions not common in other regions are noticeable. Eckloniagi looks like seaweed, but its color is clearer. Ecklonia vulgaris grows hard and grows wild, all of which are natural, with a rich sea scent and savory taste. You can eat it with oil like roasting, but you can just eat it.
Ecklonia can be found all over the market.
At this time, it is better to soothe soy sauce. Since soothe is mainly produced in Seosan, you can buy it all at the market until you can soothe it. Let's buy one more before we leave the market and buy it.
It can be found all over the market.
Grandmother Hotteok. If you enter the market place from the parking lot of the market, you will see the trade name 'Old Bakery'. You can feel the 'force' from the hotteok plate like the green drum. These days, it's hard to see these hot cakes. The oil is lightly brewed with a very light coat. The secret to the taste is the dough made with makgeolli and acorn jelly instead of chemical additives. The chewy and delicious taste is attractive. It is also fun to see the skillful work of grandmothers who have worked for decades.
'Old Bakery' and 'Marketing Original Ho-teok'
There is another famous hot rice cake at Seosan Dongbu Market. If you enter the alley where Sundae Gukbap and Kalguksu are gathered to the side of the direct market place, you will see 'Market aid Ho Tteok'. This is also a decades old hotteok house. Seosan is a shop where locals chew on their memories. The cast iron pan and the pot lid are impressive. Bake it in a pan, cover it with a pot, and steam it slightly until it is cooked. It uses less oil and makes the rice cake taste lighter. In both houses, two hot cakes cost 1,000 won. It is a good price. After eating a bowl of soup, enjoy a hot cake of Seosan Dongbu Market as a dessert.
Let's taste old-fashioned hotteok
Travel info

Samgil Pohang

item.title: Flowering in front of the beach, Gimnyeong Metal Craft Mural Village - Jeju, South Korea
item.description:
Metal art murals that have naturally penetrated the village

Flowering in front of the beach, Gimnyeong Metal Craft Mural Village

Jeju, South Korea

A gentle change began along the coastline in a tranquil seaside village north of Jeju. Metal crafts with warm stories of the village bloomed on the walls of the house.
'Gojangnan-gil', which embroiders Kimnyeong village, is a Jeju dialect, meaning 'flowering path'. Sea breezes and sea water flow in the villages, and metal crafts that look wonderful as time goes by bears the warmth.
'Troubleshooting Road' starting at Jeju Olle Trail 20 Course
Permeable metal craft work
Jeju sea is always new. The moment you see the mysterious color, it's likely that fluttering will happen. Jeju's pretty beach is lined with hostels and cafes overlooking the sea. Another way to meet Jeju sea is to walk slowly along the coastline.
The sea and sky of Gimnyeong that is so blue
Gimnyeong, the starting point for Olle 20 course, north of Jeju, is a quiet village with emerald sea. In winter 2014, the change began in an ordinary town where travelers are sparse. Metal art murals were made naturally as if in a village.
Good way to walk along the beach
You can find metal crafts about 3km from the beginning of Olle 20 course to Seongseon Beach. White wings emerged from the blunt cement walls, and whales seemed to jump into the sea right now on the black stone walls. The works of Haenyeo, Gimnyeong Village, which consists of Manjanggul Cave, Cheongsugul Cave, Yacht and Wind, are included in each piece.
Interesting work that applied wall
Take a map and enter the village on Olle Trail 20. By Kim Sung Sook Welcome to this traveler. Travel is a work that expresses the root of the mind with interesting imagination.
It's fun to look for each piece on the map one by one.
The roots of her blunt feet are traveled, and metal leaves hang on top of them to form a rich tree. Works well with Jeju, the romance of travelers.
The work which soaks naturally as if originally attached
Gentle changes to bring villages to life
Did you walk 10 minutes from the start of Olle Trail 20? He enters the cafe 'Backroom Project', nestled under a green roof in front of the beach. The house is remodeled as a farm house, and the outside is used as a workshop for metal crafts. It is run by Nam Hyun-kyung, the artist who planned the streets of Gimnyeong.
Representative Nam Hyun-kyung of Café ‘Dabang Project’
She majored in metal crafts at university, and her dream was to have a workshop in front of the sea, which she settled here two years ago.
Warm room is seeping again
At first, it was a cold village, but curious seniors often visited with vegetables or fruits, and she began to tell her story. Indulged in the charm of the village, the writer searched for warming the neighborhood and chose what he could do best.
Warm room is seeping again
Painting murals are well peeled off by rain and wind and may look heterogeneous, so I chose achromatic metal as a material. In his mind, Nam wanted to make a mural that penetrated the landscape naturally. The village secretariat and the Rural Development Corporation were persuaded for nine months to complete the “Trouble Road Project. As a result, 34 works embroidered the village from the end of October to mid-December 2014.
There are many works that unravel the hearts of women
At first, the village elders did not have the opposition. I didn't know the metalwork itself, and most of all, I had to pierce the walls of my old house. But I was satisfied with the finished mural.
Sneaking through the wall, cat
12 artists participated in the project. It was recruited through SNS, and was introduced to the artist by knowing through school seniors and juniors. Gimnyeong is a seaside village, and its works are mostly made of copper rather than iron because the works can be quickly destroyed by the influence of sea breeze and seawater. “Iron is corroded, but copper is colored. The color changes nicely with sea breeze and sea water. As time goes by, the work gets more and more valuable. ” Representative Nam
Yongcheonsu can be found all over Jeju
The copper is red at first, but as time goes by, the green color rises. The emerald work creates another mood. This is also an attraction of metal crafts. Copper is twice as expensive as iron, but it is more economical because it costs no maintenance and repair.
Colorful roofs along the beach
Works that contain the story of Gimnyeong Village
Leave the project again and walk near the sea. On a wall, we discover Chu-sky's work, Island Kid. It is a work that expresses the strong mother and haenyeo of Jeju. Knowing that there are many fishing points in Kimnyeong, Lee Jung-geun's <WORLD'S BEST FISHING SPOT> shows. In his work, you can see the vibrant and dynamic village.
She stands in front of the haenyeo who goes well with the orange roof. When I look closely at the net that Haenyeo has rescued, it is a flower that bloomed in a lump. Kim Sun-young's <Blossom Wave> expresses that the flowers they have rescued for the rest of their lives are flowers, and their flower-like youth. Lee Hyun-jung's <Cantabile>, which means that fish are harmonized in the life of a haenyeo according to the sound of the sea, is as beautiful as a soft coastline. After this piece, the grandfather is drying up the starfish in the courtyard of an old house. I lived in this village for a lifetime and was bored. One day, a mural blooming like a spring flower is pleasing and the calm change makes me feel happy.
Grandpa drying his starfish in the courtyard of an old house
There are many works that portray Haenyeo, but it is a different feeling when faced with garlic artist 'Wonder HaeNyeo'. I wanted to break down the prejudice against the female divers by expressing the female divers as a wonder woman. “I think Haenyeo is a person who is doing hard work. Especially, women in Gimnyeong are strong, blunt and clunky. Because the land was so poor that I had to make material, and because of the wind and the sound of the waves, I was short and thick when I spoke. The girls and girls I met face to face with exciting music, fun work, and warmth for strangers. I wanted to express it cheerfully that the women were forced to be strong. ”
A mother and a woman who is strong like a wonder woman
In addition to the walls, there are also works that look more detailed when you look up. Lee Jung-geun's Blue Water Glass (Let's Go) is located on a stone wall. In the form of webtoons, it was a fun way to express blue water, a healing water for sick people, a swimming pool for local children, and a spring water for farmers to relax with cows.
Emerald colored metal craft in sea breeze and sea water
Lee Sung-sik's <Walk the Road> contains the mysterious legend of Duruksan, which shows off the sea in Gimyeong. It tells the legend of Durucksan that the grandmother she met on the road is always in the water.
A work that just popped out of a cartoon
Did you walk for about 2 hours? It stands in front of a work that tells the story of Gimnyeong's specialties and the wind. The story of Kim Ning, who is told by the murals, seems to tickle her.
Wall and work that seems to be one originally
Deep in the village, it is filled with works that allow the elderly to feel the wisdom and old fashion of Jeju. The broken roads throughout the seasons will make the town more daunting.
Go

item.title: Exciting basketball game, delicious cooking bout! - Anyang, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
A professional basketball arena with a wide audience

Exciting basketball game, delicious cooking bout!

Anyang, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

Korea professional basketball season has begun. In Anyang-si and Goyang-si, Gyeonggi-do, there are indoor gymnasiums where you can watch home games. Enjoy a basketball game with exciting cheering and stop by the nearby restaurants. If the team you support wins, you can celebrate with a warm dish and lose if you lose. Now go to the nearest basketball court!
You don't even have to know the ‘ㄴ’ character of watching the game or playing basketball!
Basketball stadiums are visited by visitors from a variety of floors than other sports. Tickets to the stadium are cheap and the rules of the game are easy to understand. The professional basketball season is held at the end of the year and at the beginning of the year when the winter turns. The 2015-2016 KBL-D (Korean Basketball League-Development, or D-League) kicked off with the first match at the Goyang Indoor Gymnasium. Anyang KGC Ginseng Corp. and Goyang Orion Orions are the teams in Gyeonggi-do. The indoor gymnasium in each area is used as a home stadium, so you can feel the enthusiastic cheering.
Tickets are divided into seats and seats, and seats vary in price depending on the number of floors and locations. Wherever you sit, the stadium is at a glance, and the large screen is set up so you can see the game. But if you want to be more enthusiastic, I recommend the seats in front of the cheerleader. The eyes of the cheerleaders keep coming into contact with each other, so you can have a great time. When you enter the stadium after ticketing, you will be given cheering tools. Two hours will pass quickly and the alarm clock will ring in your stomach. Now it's time to enjoy the game with people and delicious food.
The D-League Games will be held nationwide until February 16, 2016. home page( www.kbl.or.kr ) Or call (02-2106-3000) to see the schedule.
Enjoy a thrilling basketball game on site
Pretend to have a thumbs up! Restaurants in front of Anyang Indoor Gymnasium
If you cheer and sweat as much as the athlete, the style of eating is perfect. Located in front of the Anyang Indoor Gymnasium, 'Koryo Yaksen Samgyetang' is a yakcho cuisine restaurant based on Sanyacho.You can taste Samgyetang and Haesintang.
Anyang Indoor Gymnasium Night View
The samgyetang with abalone, as well as the seafood boiled with various kinds of seafood seems to be full of energy.
Haesintang of `` Koryeo Yaksen Samgyetang '' in front of Anyang Indoor Gymnasium
The broth used for food is Sanyacho broth containing camphor. The precious Sanyacho of Jecheon, located around Sobaeksan, Woraksan, and Chiaksan, and the camphor ginseng grown around Heungjeong Valley flowing below Pyeongchang Heungjeong Mountain are the main ingredients of the main broth. If you add mussel juice to this basic broth, you can make Samgyetang broth. If you add seasonings seasoned with various ingredients, you can make Haesintang broth.
Haesintang with various seafood such as abalone and wild octopus
Sanyacho and camphor broth containing broth is common, but the secret here is to use salt and soy sauce at all. When you eat hot soup, the soup is drowsy and the salty taste is stronger. Then, you can pour more broth, but the soup in this house is not salty at all. Thanks to the harmony of the golden ratio of wild vegetables and seafood found hundreds of times. It looks like an old restaurant, but it's now in its fifth year. The background is the love of Sanyacho over 20 years.
Samgyetang soup with basic Sanyacho broth and mussel juice
Business hours 11: 30 ~ 22: 00, New Year's day and Chuseok holidays, all year round. Samgyetang costs 13,000 won, and Haesintang costs 35,000 won.
The outer skin mixed with perilla and perilla oil
Another restaurant in front of Anyang Indoor Gymnasium is the Chinese restaurant, Janggang. The owner, who has been running the shop for over 20 years, boasts 50 years of Chinese cuisine. One of the most popular dishes in this house is cold champon. It's hard to imagine how champon can be chilled with oil and broth. The cold broth seems to be floating, but the cold champon is very clean and refreshing. Spicy broth filled with seafood is the secret. The seafood in the cold broth is tangle, and the seafood tastes better than the hot broth.
The owner of 'Janggang' sponsors Anyang Sports Team
It is a Chinese restaurant that does not deliver to show delicious dishes. Since the noodles are picked by hand, cooking takes a long time after ordering. If you make a reservation by phone before visiting the store, you can eat right away.
Cold champon, special menu of 'Janggang'
Business hours 11: 00 ~ 21: 00, 7 days a week. Jjajang noodles 5,000 won, cold jjamppong 6,000 won.
The spicy but refreshing seafood is tangled up.
Goyang Indoor Gymnasium, Hidden Neighborhood Restaurants
It's sports spirit that doesn't dwell on the game, but it's hard not to be upset if the team that cheers hard. Sweet food then is the best comfort. On the way to Goyang Indoor Gymnasium, there is a sweet and spicy 'Ilsan Tangsuyuk'. Three years ago, the owner, who was contemplating the restaurant menu, chose sweet and sour pork as his main item. I didn't know much about Chinese food, but because of the belief that sweet and sour pork would be popular and could be transformed into a new taste. The people first tasted sweet and sour pork. Since then, rumors began to appear on the Internet, and people from all over the country came. There were also chain stores in Goyang, near Madu Station, Bucheon, and Uiwang.
`` Ilsan Tangsuyuk '', a glutinous sweet and sour pork restaurant with crispy texture
Sweet and sour pork in this house is sweet and sour pork fried with glutinous rice flour. Crispy and chewy than fried with flour. The sauce is usually two flavors and spicy. Sweet and aftertaste slightly sour but not too sweet or too sweet. Another secret to sweet and sour taste is to season the meat in advance and not add soy sauce to the sauce. This winter, the fish cake soup appeared as a new menu in the shop, which only stuck to sweet and sour pork. It is a menu prepared for the constant demands of regular customers who enjoy sweet and sour liquor along with sweet and sour pork. It also sells a variety of Chinese liquors. After ordering, sweet and sour pork is fried, so it takes about 15 minutes for food to come out. It sells wraps, but does not wrap leftovers. Sweet and sour pork with sauce loses its original taste over time.
The sweet and sour pork of 'Ilsan Tangsuyuk' has a large amount compared to the price
Business hours 17: 00-24: 00, all year round. Sweet and sour pork 12,000 won.
On the way to Goyang Sports Complex Glutinous rice soup of 'Ilsan Tangsuyuk'
Spicy dishes are good for unraveling regardless of the game. The most popular local gourmet restaurant is Choi Bul Bak Chicken, which has been in operation for over 10 years. It is not long ago that a small pub, which used to serve as a love room for residents, became known as a gourmet restaurant by word of mouth.
'Best Chicken', a local restaurant where you can see many years
The secret to earning the reputation as 'the best fire chicken restaurant in Ilsan' is in sauce. Only the master knows the secret sauce. The use of smoked chicken there is a well known trick. Grill the grilled chicken in the kitchen next to the entrance. Selected smoked chicken is grilled crispy on charcoal, put on fire, and sauced over the grill. The spiciness can be selected to a degree, which is divided into spicy, less spicy, and moderately spicy. It's okay to have an obscure order that says, "Please make it hot enough to eat properly." If you want to check the reputation of this house's Bulgogi, spicy is recommended. A set menu where you can eat egg soup, fish cake soup, udon noodles and other spicy rice balls. Packing and delivery are also available.
Unstoppable spiciness heats the whole body
Business hours from 16:00 to 01:00, 7 days a week (excluding national holidays). Bulgogi Set 23,000 won.
Bulgogi set with an egg bath and rice balls

item.title: Take care of your winter health with a cypress sawdust enzyme! If you raise the body temperature by 1 ℃ double your health! - Uijeongbu-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea
item.description:
Suraksan Cypress Garden Footbath

Take care of your winter health with a cypress sawdust enzyme! If you raise the body temperature by 1 ℃ double your health!

Uijeongbu-si, Gyeonggi-do, Korea

I found a hot place to release the joints that are firm in cold wind and cool my mind. Suraksan Cypress Garden where you can enjoy Cypress Forest Bath and Sawdust Enzyme Bath. The advantage is that you can enjoy short sleeves without worrying about the cold. Find a cypress enzyme bath that boasts excellent anticancer effects.

The body temperature of modern people is lowered by 1 degree on average compared to half a century ago. Hypothermia is known as the leading cause of modern illness. Body temperature of healthy person is 36.7 ~ 37 ℃. At this temperature our internal organs and cells are actively moving. If the body temperature drops here, the function becomes weaker. The same is true for adults saying "warm up your body."
Suraksan Cypress Garden
Thanks to various air conditioners, the room temperature is comfortable regardless of the season. This allows us to live indoors in short sleeves. Our bodies make less effort to maintain body temperature, so they build up excess energy and gain weight.
Suraksan Gbaekwon Information Desk
Is body temperature more important than weight?

The protein enzyme bath has an excellent effect on raising the body temperature. The body temperature of modern people suffering from chronic diseases with low body temperature is raised to 37 ~ 38 ℃. It is a natural treatment using cypress sawdust without the help of artificial heat such as electricity or gas. After 15 minutes of the enzyme enzyme bath, you will feel warm. As the body's temperature rises, the pores expand and enzymes penetrate into it, activating skin cells. Metabolism becomes active as warm energy spreads throughout the body. This is why it helps to improve the constitution of those who are obese.

The beginning of Suraksan Cybaekwon course is the hot rock bed
I'm not sure if I only hear it. What is the protein enzyme bath? It's roughly the same when you think of Jjimjilbang. The difference is that there is an experience course in order, and the enzymatic sawdust enzyme bath is added. The cypress sawdust enzyme bath is an extract of cypress one.
Relax and add a massage pack to your face
Wear a Jjimjilbang costume without underwear, and then enter a hot bedrock bath. It will warm you up for 20 to 30 minutes on a rock made of germanium, charcoal and gravel. Drinking cypress tea, which is served indefinitely, goes to low temperature bedrock bath. Less comfortable than before, you can put a massage pack on your face. The time is about 15-20 minutes. Next, go to the footbath and take a rest as a forest bath.
Suraksan Cypress Garden Footbath
Once you've done all of this, it's time to experience the enzyme protein bath. When you enter the enzymatic bath, put an enzyme-containing proteinaceous sawdust on your body. Think of the sand baths that are common at summer beaches. Covering the cypress sawdust that self-heats instead of the enzyme instead of sand.
Relaxation in the forest bath after the foot bath
By the way, the temperature of enzyme sawdust is quite high. The whole body becomes hot. There is no fire, no heating equipment, but the sawdust itself produces heat. If you feel uncomfortable to touch bare skin, talk to your manager. Towels are often applied to hot spots.
Cypress Sawdust
100% natural fever emitted by enzymes from cypress sawdust
“Put the enzyme in the cymbal sawdust and it is a natural fever. The temperature goes up to 70 ℃. If you have hot spots, don't wait. Enzyme bath time is about 15 minutes, but the crowd is not able to fill all the way out first. Fermented bacteria are subtilis that live on straw and grow in cypress sawdust. During the enzymatic bath, negative phytoncide and unique scent relaxes the body. ”
Entry into cypress sawdust enzyme bath
This is the explanation of the surrender ceremony. He started a baekwonwon to take care of family members suffering from cancer and skin diseases. If your body temperature rises by 1 ° C, your immune system will increase by 50%. Is it because he was under stress in the winter? I couldn't feel it only by listening to words, so I decided to try it. It is open on weekdays and on weekends, but fortunately it was possible on weekdays. The minimum time required to fully enjoy the baekbaekwon is 90 minutes, and the fare is 30,000 won for junior high school students and older.
Moisturizes the dry face in the enzyme bath
Perfect for a one-day winter health trip

The bottom line is that the manuscript has always made my back harder. Perhaps because of the sweat from the bedrock bath, the skin is as smooth as the bath. I am suffering from varicose veins. Three times more money than jjimjilbang was not waste. In particular, the enzyme bath, which is excellent for women, was too hot to touch bare skin. I put a towel on my butt and sawed my toe with a sawdust.

The protein enzyme bath is known as an alternative therapy for chemotherapy, female disease or inflammatory disease. Especially if you have an atopy or allergic disease, the cypress sawdust has a direct effect on your skin. Let the body cool down for a while after the enzyme bath. Then rub your whole body with some cypress sawdust. Massage your neck, back, legs and arms. For this purpose, it is better to find Cygwonwon in pairs of two. After the massage, rinse off with water only.
Popular drink pairing tea of cafe
Less burdensome than spas and hot springs. Although it has a price range than the jjimjilbang, it is okay to leave the family alone on one winter day. You can also add a cup of Ssang Hwa tea at the cafe inside the house. Why don't you raise the temperature in my body and take care of the health of your loved ones? After the enzymatic bath, you can add cool Dongchimi Makguksu from a restaurant located in Gapbaekwon, a day trip.
Bibim Makguksu at Dongchimi Makguksu Specialty Shop

item.title: Jeonnam Sightseeing Loop Bus Tour - Suncheon, Jeonnam, Korea
item.description:
“Namdo One Wheel” Tour Bus Tours Jeollanam-do

Jeonnam Sightseeing Loop Bus Tour

Suncheon, Jeonnam, Korea

The Namdo One-Wheel Tour is a popular way to travel all over Jeollanam-do. Unlike the City Tour, which operates only in each city and county area, 'Namdo One Wheel' makes a much more efficient and richer journey by combining adjacent tourist attractions such as Damyang, Gokseong, Boseong, Bolgyo, and Jangheung in one course.

Adjacent places in one course freely

The Namdo One Wheel Bus Tour, which tours various tourist attractions in Jeollanam-do, consists of six routes including the eastern, western and suburbs of Gwangju. It runs every day or every weekend depending on the course. Most of all, you can take a bus to visit the main tourist attractions at once, so you can go around without any hassles.

This is convenient because the tour bus departs from the train station and the bus terminal. If you are a train traveler with a ticket tomorrow, you need to pay more attention. Even in places where the train does not reach, you can travel evenly without using the 'South Island One Wheel'.
Bus tour platform in front of Gwangju Station
Unlike packages and group tours, which all have to move together, Namdo One Wheel is a free tour. There are no leaders, so you can freely visit every tourist spot and ride the bus until the scheduled time. The tour fee is 9,900 won per person, regardless of course. Admission to the tourist spots and food expenses are paid separately.
The latest bus ride will take place
4 courses in Gwangju
Gwangju 4 courses in Damyang and Gokseong are perfect for this time of year. Departs from Gwangju and travels to Damyang in the morning and Gokseong in the afternoon. In Damyang, you can have a relaxing time walking along the cool bamboo fields and green metasequoia road, and you can experience the rail bike and steam locomotive when you arrive at Gokseong Train Village. Beautifully decorated in the old Gokseong Station railroad, the rose garden is a nice walk.
Damyang Soswaewon, the first settlement in Gwangju suburbs 4 courses
The four-course tour bus departs at 9:20 and 9:35 from You Square (Gwangcheon Terminal) and Gwangju Station, respectively. The latest buses are spacious and comfortable. Thanks to the large windows, the view outside the window is cool. Before the departure, the driver will hand out the name badge of Namdo and introduce the day schedule. Expectations for travel are full of people's faces sitting alone or in pairs.
Afternoon day spends in Gokseong Train Village
10 am, Damyang bamboo field full of green

Would the bus have left Gwangju Station for about 30 minutes? We arrived at Damyang Soswaewon, one of the representative gardens in the middle of Joseon. Yang San-bo, a disciple of Jo Kwang-jo, lived in nature after his teacher was exiled. The house built on the valley where the clear water flows resembles the elegant Seonbi. On one side, explanations of cultural commentators are in full swing. It's time to get together as we're counting the meaning of Soswaewon in the gap.

Soswaewon Garden, along a lush green valley
Shortly after getting on the bus, I reached the Korean House of Literature. Green trees surrounded by folding screens under the blue sky, and the scene with the sperm in front of the pond, are broken into a few temples.
Korean Literature Museum with lyrics and literature
Inside the house, there are a variety of lyrics and literature, including Song Soon's The Noodle House and Jeong Chul's Song Kang House.
Tourists on a bus tour to the Korean House of Literature

The bamboo forest road arrives at the famous Juknokwon. It's lunch time. If it's Damyang, don't you think tteokgalbi? Many restaurants offer rice cake ribs around Juknokwon. Chopsticks have no time to rest on the taste of Tteokgalbi that melts in your mouth. How about overeating in Damyang? Juknokwon won't be enough to take out the boat.
In order to avoid the midday sun and to take a walk after dinner, everyone dives through the large forest. It is also cool to see bamboo that stretches high in the sky. The wind blowing through the forest is sweet and cool. While wandering through the forest with the blowing wind, the daily life of the gray color is filled with fresh green.

Juknokwon, a representative tourist attraction of Damyang

The final schedule in Damyang is Metasequoia Garosu-gil. Alongside the 24 national road, 2,000 trees of metasequoia are lined up along the streets of Dalian. The metasequoias that grow to about 30m in height form a green tunnel. There is a middle bench and coffee beans to take a slow break.

Metasequoia Garosu-gil, a summer walk
2:00 pm, Gokseong train village full of roses

It takes about 40 minutes from Damyang to Gokseong. Take a nap for a while on the bus. Gokseong Dorimsa, the word of Hwaeomsa, is a small temple located at the foot of Dongak Mountain. I want to be so pretty, I have a beautiful scene. Even though the scale is small, the relics are large. Torimsa Temple is enshrined in Gwanbultang (Treasure No. 1341) designated as a cultural asset and the wooden Amitabha Three Buddhas (Type No. 271).

Pretty Revelation, Gokseong Dorimsa

The road to Dorimsa gives another time of healing for the city people. A stream of clear, clean water runs along the way. Many people spread out tents and mats along the valley and enjoy weekend outings. There are still traces of the ancient poets who admired the beauty here. Next to them, children are excited about the water slide. I press the heart that wants to join the play and get back on the bus.

Children playing in the rock where their ancestors carved poetry

The final journey of the tour is Gokseong Train Village. Train Village is a landmark of Gokseong, which has been renovated from the abandoned railway and port station as a tourist destination. It is one of 50 beautiful places to visit in Korea, cited by CNN. Once inside the Gokseong station, a fairy-tale landscape unimagined outside unfolds before your eyes. Did Alice in a strange country feel like this? In this place, both adults and children return to concentricity.

Rose park where various varieties of roses bloom

It takes more than an hour to look around the cutely decorated train village. Fortunately, the time given is many. The rose park promenade in the train village is like a baby angel's garden. A hum comes out as you walk through the flowers blooming. The rail bike, which pedals directly with two feet along the old railway, is fun, and the steam locomotive that runs with a chunky sound is nostalgic.

Rail bike along the old railway

Now it's time to go home. Traffic congestion and tired driving along with weekend outings are both common. Buried in a soft seat, I arrived home while I was in my dream country. Next time, let's take a look at the course of Namdo.

Experience the nostalgic steam locomotive
