item.title: Harmony of the red fish cake and sweet glutinous rice cake - Jecheon, Chungbuk, South Korea
item.description:
Jecheon's specialty “red fish cake”

Harmony of the red fish cake and sweet glutinous rice cake

Jecheon, Chungbuk, South Korea

Fish paste is one of the popular street foods when the weather gets colder. A glass of broth and a glass of broth will withstand the cold energy. Fish cake is Busan, but 'red fish cake' makes Jecheon come to mind. Eat a few skewers of spicy and warm red fish cakes and taste glutinous rice cakes made with decades of care. In addition, you can enjoy healthy and delicious delicacies in Jecheon, including yokan made from herbs, steamed buns, and donuts.
The taste goes hand in hand, red fish cake
If you go to downtown Jecheon, you will see many shops named `` red oden. '' Red fish paste is a food seasoned with red fish paste. Although there is no accurate record of how and when red fish cake began in Jecheon, it has been popular as a snack of Jecheon for decades.
In Jecheon, there are many snack shops named `` red oden ''.
Fish paste is usually one kind in other local snack houses, but it is divided into red fish paste and bite fish paste in Jecheon. The fish paste is the fish paste we usually eat in soup, and the red fish cake is accompanied by spicy chili sauce. There are two kinds of bitter breadth and round one, but red fish cake usually uses only wide bread.
In Jecheon, there are many snack shops named `` red oden ''.
Fold the fish cakes in a twisted shape, put them in wooden chopsticks, and put them in the broth. And the red sauce transfers it to a sizzling wide plate. At this time, align the fish cakes to the sides. Top it with seasoning and sprinkle with chopped green onions.
Warm bite
In some stores, long rice cakes are placed in chopsticks and seasoned like red fish cakes.
Spicy red fish cake
The recipes and appearances do not vary greatly from shop to shop. There are only slightly different sauce tips for each shop. Some are spicy and some are less spicy. You can choose according to your taste. Generally, they are served with tempura and gimbap, and some places offer other foods. Red fish paste is strangely addictive. If you eat one, you will eat two or three. The price is good so you can eat more than one. It is 1,000 won for 4 red fish cakes.
How to make it is the same
The red fish cake, which was loved by Jecheon locals, became widely known to foreigners through the Jecheon International Music Film Festival. So now more people are coming to Jecheon to eat red fish cake.
There are many red fish shops around Jecheon Central Market, Nato Traditional Market, and Dongmun Market. The Jecheon Red Oden near the Central Market is one of the oldest, and the Red Oden House at the entrance to the Nato Traditional Market and the Oatgad House in the Nato Traditional Market are popular among locals. Note that some shops are closed on the first and third Sundays of each month.
How to make it is the same
Take a bite, Dengsil Dunk ~, 'Dunksil' glutinous rice cake and donuts
A must-try snack in Jecheon with red fish paste is glutinous rice cake of 'dunkilssik'. I'm so excited about the name of the store. The name "Dengshil" means "to everyone in the world," and "to taste deliciously." In front of the shop, there is a small signboard with a friendly greeting. The signs that change every day bring little fun. The rustic store facade reflects decades of history. Following his mother-in-law, daughter-in-law has been handed down for the second generation. So many old regular customers. If you want to taste glutinous rice cakes and donuts on the weekend, hurry up a little. It's because it's so popular that it's too early to be a full version. Remember that Sunday is closed.
‘Dunsil's meal’ shows signs of time
Dengsil Bun makes both glutinous rice cakes and donuts by hand. It's fun to see how red bean paste is put into chewy glutinous rice dough to make crunchy rice cake. Seeing glutinous rice cakes filled on a large tray makes mouthwatering. Even in chilly weather, a fan runs to cool the glutinous rice cake on one side. When the hot seaweed of glutinous rice cake falls out, put it in a box.
Glutinous rice cake made by hand
One large glutinous rice cake is just 700 won. Glutinous rice cake made with domestic glutinous rice and domestic red beans is very affordable. Try a bite of glutinous rice cake. Rather than a board draws, chewy chewy lives. Red bean is filled in immaculate glutinous rice cake. Bean jam is not sweet. The color and taste are very different from those of ordinary glutinous rice cake. This is because not only red-red beans in dunsil's meal, but also dark green gray beans are used to make red bean paste. Boil red beans usually twice a day.
Glutinous rice cake made by hand
Dungsil is not only glutinous rice cake but also donuts. Unlike regular donuts, it has a chewy texture. It is chewy like glutinous rice cake. In Dungsil, ferment the dough with rice wine and rice water instead of yeast. Donuts are sold hot as soon as they are fried. There are two kinds of donuts. Dongle adzuki bean donuts with red beans inside, and dungling donuts without beef. On weekends, you can only taste Dungling Donuts. In response to a customer question, "What's in this?" Dangling donuts are chewy and sweet even if nothing is in them.
Glutinous rice cake of Jecheon 'Dunkilssik' with decades of history
Donuts are best eaten when they're fresh, and glutinous rice cakes can be left at room temperature for a day or two. If you leave the glutinous rice cake for a long time, you can store it in the freezer.
Freshly fried chewy donuts
Acorn King Songpyeon, Herbal Yokan, and Hwangdogi Nuts
There are many healthy snacks in Jecheon. First, let's go to Jecheon station square heart market in front of Jecheon station. If you go to the 'Taechang Tteok Mill' located in Hanmaeum Market, you can taste the acorn Wangsongpyeon. Its size is almost the size of an adult fist, and its name is Wang Peng.
Large Acorn King Songpyeon
The rice cake kneaded with acorn powder is filled with beef powder and nuts. Chewy taste and chewy taste go well together. It's also big and it's full of cows. It's light and sweet, so everyone loves it.
Large Acorn King Songpyeon
In the Hanmaeum Market, the high-speed rice cake mill sells yokan made with mulberry leaves, longan meat, and donkeys. The smell of herbs is not strong, sweet children eat well. Try one by color or one by one.
Sweet yokan made with herbs
As a breakdown of herbs, the jeonjuburi using herbs was also noticeable. In Hanmaeum Market, you can taste herbal donuts in addition to yokan containing herbs. Medicinal donuts are made by kneading flour and mixing Angelica powder with Jecheon-san Astragalus and Jujube. Use canola oil for frying donuts. Blow freshly fried donuts and bite a bite.
Sweet yokan made with herbs
In addition, you can also taste steamed buns made with Astragalus delicacies in Nato Traditional Market and Dongmun Market.
Steamed Bread Kneaded with Astragalus Water

item.title: A relaxing time, a day to enjoy in Sinjindo - Taean-gun, South Korea
item.description:
Sunset seen from Sinjindo Port Maddo Breakwater

A relaxing time, a day to enjoy in Sinjindo

Taean-gun, South Korea

Take National Road No. 32, pass through Taean Eup, and take Local Road No. 603, which goes south from Duya Intersection, to Anheung Port and Sinjindo Port. Sinjindo, which is famous for its crab and jukkumi collection, is not an island that can be reached by crossing the bridge. There are many marine products, as well as a village where many underwater artifacts have been excavated to be called “underwater racing,” and the sunset of the West Sea is spectacular. Enjoy a relaxing day in Sinjindo.
Winter beach on the way to Sinjindo Port
The journey of winter day to Sinjindo by 603 local road in Taean-eup is a great trip. There's no special place, and it's been a long time since the bustle of the port has passed since the Chukumina and Blue Crabs. At the very least, only buses with anglers head to Xinjin. But the winter sea is a pleasure to enjoy. On the way to Sinjindo, there is a beach showing the essence of the winter sea. Yeonpo Beach and Maneul Beach. This is a place to stop by on your way to Sinjindo.
Yeonpo Beach from Yeonpo Dock
Yeonpo Beach is the first place to meet. Sol Island, with its pine trees growing in the middle of the beach and the sea, is eye-catching. It is also unique as it is a beach facing south from the west coast. The beach spreads out right after the pine forest. Yeonpo Beach is a place where you can watch the sunrise and the Sunrise Festival is held on January 1 every year. When the sun rises over the low mountains of the Taean Peninsula, Solseom, which floats in the middle of the sea, adds to the flavor.
Yeonpo Beach from Yeonpo Dock
About 6 km away from Yeonpo Beach, Gaeulyi Beach can also be found on the way to Sinjindo Port. The beach is impressive with fine white sand. The sand is piled up at the entrance of the beach, and the sand is blown away like a desert, but when it is on the beach, the fine sand hardens to form a soft white sand. At low tide, traces of crabs, shellfish, etc. have been drawn over the beach like a picture. Mane Beach has been restricted to civilian access to military areas since the late 1970s. Civilian access was then made possible in the late 1990s.
Beach landscape at low tide
Mangae Beach became famous as it was known as a filming location. In the movie <Bungy Jump> starring Lee Byung-hun and Lee Eun-ju, a film was shot here where a male and female protagonist danced to Waltz No. 2 in Shostakovich's Suite for Jazz Orchestra. The dance and music of the two people, which were spread between the silhouettes of the pine trees and the pine trees that stained the beach, are still new in memory. In addition to the dramas such as Dragon Tears, Yeocheon-cheon, and The Man of Princess, Gwae-ri Beach has appeared.
Pine Forest on Maneui Beach where the movie <Burn Bungee Jump> was filmed
Enjoy Sinjindo Port after Anheung Port
After exiting the beach, take the 603 local road, which is divided into the road to Anheung Port and the road to Sinjindo across Sinjin Bridge. Anheungseong, where the two roads are divided, is worth a visit. Anheungseong, located at the end of the Taean Peninsula extending southwest, is a castle built during the late Hyojong period in the late Joseon Dynasty. Only the west gate, now called the "Su Hong Ru," remains, and the castle runs along the northern slope. Built on the back mountain of Anheung Port, it was a strategic point of view overlooking the coast and a path through which the Chosun Ship passed. Beyond Anheungseong is Anheung Port, which was once a big port. Since Sinjindo Port was designated as the first national fishing port in the 1970s, it has become a quiet port where fishing boats and small fishing boats only travel. The port landscape as if time has stopped is lonely.
Suh Hung-ru, an introductory person
Crossing Sinjin Bridge leads to Sinjindo, which doesn't feel like an island. Although the exact story is not told, Sinjindo was originally land connected with Anheung Port, and it was called Sinjindo as a new naruto that became an island. It is a long way from Sinjin Bridge to Sinjindo Port adjacent to the sea. Along the well-appointed road, accommodations and restaurants are side-by-side, and the breakwater extends to both sides as if the arms were wrapped in front of the harbor. The breakwater with the red lighthouse is connected to the island called Bueokdo, and the breakwater with the white lighthouse is connected to the island called Mador. From Sinjindo Port, cruise ships returning from Gaido and Jung Jeong-do and cruise ships leaving Ongdo 12 km away.
Breakwaters and lighthouses that lead to maternity and magic
In particular, Ongdo is one of '16 beautiful lighthouses of the whole country 'selected by the Ministry of Land, Transport and Maritime Affairs in 2007. If you take a boat going to Ongdo, you get off the island, look around the lighthouse for about an hour, and return to Sinjindo Port. The flight schedule may change according to the weather, so it is recommended to inquire in advance (Xinjin Anheung Cruise 041-675-1603).
Pleasure Boats from Sinjindo Port
There are dried fish shops around the cruise ship docks. In addition to anchovies caught on the west coast, they also sell dried squid.
Sinjindo Port Dried Fish Stores
Fish dried on sea breezes, such as cutlass and vocal cords, are also easily seen. Dry anchovies are especially good in color and taste.
Dried squid straight from the fishing boat
Sashimi is also concentrated like a port where seafood is collected. Most of the side dishes come with a typical sushi restaurant. Hoes enthusiasts use the Sinjindo Fishing Village's Seafood Market near Sinjindo Upper Plateau. In addition to live fish, sea cucumbers, sea urchins and shellfish are sold. If you sashimi to go to the restaurant on the second floor, you can eat at a cost. It is small for a large port.
Sinjin-do Fishing Village
There is a restaurant specializing in soy crab called 'Hwahaedang' on the way to Sinjindo on the 603 local road. It is a house where soy crab is soaked with female crab filled with eggs coming into Anheung Port in spring.
Sinjin-do Fishing Village
Care is taken to trim the crab so that the crabmeat retains its original form. Thanks to it, it doesn't taste fishy or gritty at all. This is a salty soy crab with the original taste of crabs. It is soft and light because it does not contain seasonings and preservatives. Even though the price is expensive, the side dishes don't come out so I feel like I'm treated properly.
Soy crab in ‘화 해당’
Beautiful sunset on the village
In winter, the sunset from the Mado breakwater is spectacular. Mado Sea is a place where many underwater relics have been excavated, so called 'underwater racing'. In the Chosun Dynasty, Maundo Line 4 was excavated, and in 2007, more than 25,000 artifacts have been excavated since Jukumi picked up the treats of Goryeo celadon from Jukdo near Sinjindo Port. The sea area of Mado was the path of Choun-sun Line from Jeolla-do since the Goryeo Dynasty. It was also an international port where trade ships with the Song Dynasty entered during the Goryeo Dynasty and Chinese messengers entered the Joseon Dynasty. However, the tide of the tide was big and the tide was fast, the vessels were frequent accidents. Therefore, this sea area was called the “hard track” because it is a difficult sea road, and since then, it is called “Anheung-yang” in the hope of calming the boat.
People enjoying fishing at the village breakwater
Mado, a treasure island, can be easily reached from Sinjindo Port along Mado-gil to a landing bridge. As soon as you pass the Ritz-Carsley Resort, follow the road to the right for about 1km until you reach Madoka Breakwater. Mado breakwaters are famous for fishing spots and are lined with anglers on weekdays. Especially mackerel and mackerel are caught well, so you can easily enjoy fishing if you buy simple equipment from nearby shops. In winter, the sunset that falls from the Madeo Breakwater to the West Sea is spectacular. The sea begins to glow golden at about 4:30 pm when the sun begins to lean slowly. It is also spectacular to see fishing boats rushing to the port after finishing the operation. It is especially beautiful when fishing boats pass on the golden waterway that runs in line with the sun. The sun slowly falls to the south of Gaido, west of the village.
Sunset seen from the village breakwater
Travel info

Sinjindo Port

item.title: Gochang Up and Down Farm, Rustic Enjoyment with Honest Food - Gochang-gun, Jeonbuk, Korea
item.description:
Farm Hall with Farmers Market and Exhibition Hall

Gochang Up and Down Farm, Rustic Enjoyment with Honest Food

Gochang-gun, Jeonbuk, Korea

Different forms of happiness are pursued by people, but the essence is the same. Breathe in the fresh air, eat innocent food, and keep your mind and body healthy. Occasionally, if you feel that little happiness far away, go to Gochang, North Jeolla Province. There is an up and down farm where there is a workshop where you can see healthy food made with reliable ingredients, food production process and various experience programs.
'Build, Play, Eat', The Values of Up and Down Farms
The word well-being that has come in and out of us. It is now a powerful motto that cannot be separated from our lives. It means that people's attention is focused on purifying the body and pursuing peace of mind beyond eating well and living well. The most responsive to these changes is the food market. Super farms such as lentil beans and aronia are popular as well as simple farm meals.
Foods for sale at farmers market
The reason for the existence of Gochang Up and Down Farm is in line with the above flow. It opened in April with the intention of informing the importance of food. The slogan of 'build, play, eat' was also suggested as 'a place where everyone enjoys together by making honest and right food'. Sangha Farm is now attracting the attention of family travelers as it has become an experiential healing healing destination that leads the future of Korean rural areas.
Milk cube bread produced in-house
When you enter the farm through the ticket office, you will first notice the environment designed according to the natural order. Not long after its opening, some buildings are still under construction, but if you look at what has been built so far, you can see that nothing has been built. In particular, the man-made swale (dented terrain) is impressive. Called a rainwater garden, the swale prevents bad phenomena, such as flooding caused by artificial pavement of dirt, and helps the garden to be more effective by using the time the rainwater has stayed. If a rainwater garden plays a role in returning rainwater to nature, there is a place where rainwater is collected like a reservoir. The stored rainwater is purified and recycled into toilet water, which saves both water and money. As soon as you pass through the ticket office, the large garden is not only a task of beauty. It is not only a space for the viewer to feel intuition and leisure in entering the countryside, but also functions as a device to show the proper food production process. Today, only cabbage and a few kinds of herbs are ready to be harvested, but until recently it was said to have been a green field full of green barley.
Garden with harvested traces
Make sausages, feed veal milk, and enjoy popular programs
The structure of the upper and lower farms is simpler than you think. It is a workshop that produces foods honestly with ingredients given by nature, stores where you can buy homemade foods, restaurants where you can eat healthy meals, experience classes where you can make ice cream or sausages, and various animals. There are five major categories, including animal farms that can communicate with each other. Among them, the experience class is required to make a reservation in advance, which is the usual order of making a phone call two to three days in advance and making a payment on the spot.
Experience Class B Building with Sausage Experience
There are four types of food experience: sausage, cookies, blueberry crumble cake, and glutinous rice cake. The time required is 40 to 50 minutes, but sausages and crumble cakes require additional processing time such as smoking and baking. You don't have to sit back and wait. You can freely visit the farm and return to the station to get your ticket.
Sausage making process: take the sausage ingredients
Prices range from 10,000 won to 15,000 won per person. You can make a reservation only in an even number because the ingredients are provided for one set of two servings. Adults can enter as a child's assistant for free, so please ask in advance for permission.
Sausage making process: Sprinkle starch, water, etc. on the minced meat
The most popular thing to try is the sausage making. On the weekends with crowds, the class is held three times a day in the classroom B.
The process of making sausages: knead by hand
One day before the experience, the farmers grind pork and prepare the ground, so participants can simply add the starch flour, parsley and water and knead the meat once again into the sheep casing.
Sausage making process: put meat in the filling body
The training is undertaken by the farm. If you wait 30 minutes, you can pick up delicious casings that are juicy and fill your mouth every time you bite the casing.
Sausage making process: inject the contents into the sheep casing
Because the process of putting kneaded meat in both casings is surprisingly difficult, parents with children under 8 years of age should opt for a milk bread or ice cream experience.
Sausage making process: makes a shape
Even if it is not a paid experience program, you can watch the sausage, bread, fruit and vegetables produced over the glass wall of the studio and keep in mind the importance of safe food.
Bread is made in the bread shop
There is also a way to go inside, but since the operation time of the studio changes according to the order quantity, the time to open the tour road is not known. At that time, it is best to go to the open workshop and check the situation yourself.
Cows spending leisure time at animal farm
You can't miss the experience of feeding hay or milk to the animals. You can feed the animals under the caretaker's care by visiting the animal farms in advance on the website.
Papillon goat dreaming of escape
The calf is fed milk every hour on an organic ranch just behind the animal farm and is always fresh and warm.
Gentle personality that doesn't get angry when you touch the horns
The calf eats the milk as if they know it, but this is a bit aggressive and the children are surprised.
A sheep couple having a quiet conversation with their eyes
If you miss the feeding experience, don't be disappointed.
Calf waiting for milk
Cute piglets and goats roam freely around the farm, so you can approach them and hand them over.
Calf Eating Storm
Favorite local food of all ages
When the experience is over, we recommend you stop by the farm restaurant for a meal. The top and bottom set meal is a cauldron of Shindongjin rice and stir-fried chicken with 4 kinds of side dishes and 1 kind of soup.
Relaxing scenery of the plantation restaurant
You can take assorted cabbages, lettuce, trout truffles, onion pickles, donkey leaf pickles, and ssamjang at the self-table. On this day, uncooked egg stew, plain and savory soybean paste, and delicious miso soup were the first to be sure.
Delicious top and bottom set meal
The advantage of a farm restaurant is to transparently disclose the ingredients and cooking process. The origin of all ingredients is domestic and most of them are grown and grown in Gochang, including 9-minute sea bream and fresh meat delivered by farmers, side dishes made with seasonal ingredients, and long-lasting miso. Anyone can see through the open kitchen how these ingredients become a dish.
Self table at the side of the restaurant
Seeing various vegetables, such as chicory, red lettuce, and kale, grown in a glass greenhouse on the second floor, doubles your faith and attachment to food. Some of the crops grown in glass greenhouses and open-air gardens are also used as food ingredients for farm-style restaurants and Western-style kitchens.
Hearty wraps with vegetables
If you are planning an experiential trip with young children, take note. The Sangha Farm is adjacent to the old Sipo Port and is suitable as a one-day course to look around the farm and the sea. The parking lot is large, and the restaurant and restroom are equipped with baby chairs, diaper changing tables, and small toilet seat covers for children. If you need to travel long distances to Seoul or Gyeonggi-do, stay at Farmers Village, a farm accommodation facility. Opened in 2017, the facilities are clean.
Nong
Travel info

Sangha Farm
-Address: 11-23 Sangha Nongwon-gil, Sang-myeon, Gochang-gun, Jeollabuk-do
-Hours: 09:30 ~ 21:00 / Open year round
Inquiries: 1522-3698

http://www.sanghafarm.co.kr/


week
-Sperm Tree Sashimi Restaurant: Sashimi, Tzugumi / 135, Gusipo Beach-gil, Sangmyeon

item.title: Wiesen Village, an oasis of body and mind that wants to relax life - Jeju, South Korea
item.description:
Jade sea is the pride of Jeju Island

Wiesen Village, an oasis of body and mind that wants to relax life

Jeju, South Korea

'Summer vacation is one year.' How long have you been dreaming? Like the squirrel wheel and the freedom of the gold that leaves the fixed life frame and seeks a strange sun, it is the golden time that is allowed for us.
I unfolded the map and pondered where to go. Tourists face the tropical mood, palm trees, the jade sea running over the white sand, and the hot sun. Jeju Island has already become a landscape by its name. There is also a resting place to quench my thirst like an oasis in my body and mind that wants to rest.
Bizen Village where various spaces coexist
Bizen Village is in the middle of the Hadori Carrot Field on the east side of Jeju Island. Although it opened this year, it is already a cultural space with industrial design and vintage props among those seeking a trendy lifestyle. Travelers are sheltered with dormitories, penthouses and camping trailers, but they are not just places to sleep. It is a complex cultural space with various facilities for relaxation such as a restaurant hard table, an organic farm cafe beer round, a loft market selling vintage props and longboards, a gallery displaying lighting collections and an outdoor swimming pool.
There is a large swimming pool in the middle of the yard.
There is nothing urgent in Bizen Village. Move slowly and enjoy nature, and relax without doing anything. Above all, it is better to interact with travelers. The worries here are: 'Swim or read a book or a beer?' I only do it. Therefore, Bizen Village is not called a hotel or a pension. It is said to be a hangout of stylish travelers.
Basketball court on one side of Bizen Village
Industrial Design meets Boutique Hotel Design
It is just the first meeting with Bizen Village. Buildings and containers like warehouses say 'what is this?' It makes you think. But when you look at the rooms that are stylish and vintage, you change your mind. It's like looking at a boutique hotel in Europe.
6-Bed Dormitory <Photo courtesy of Bizen Village>
Rooms vary in dormitory, couple room, penthouse and camping trailer. Considering the purpose and taste of travelers. If you are traveling alone, a dormitory, a couple's room for couples or couples, a penthouse is a good choice if you want to spend a luxurious night. If you want to have a special experience with the romance of your trip, we recommend camping trailers.
Utilizing the texture of wood, you can feel warm sensibility.
Dormitory is the pride of Bizen Village. The name 'village' is used because it stands for 'village inhabitants'. Six and four rooms were set up in three buildings so that more than 100 people could relax.
Neatly decorated couple rooms
If you think 'the dormitory is there, what's wrong'. The dormitories here are different from those of a typical guest house.
Penthouses in Bizen Village
Travelers who have used dormitories know. How hard it is to find a good bed. Bizen Village is a bed made of wood for the traveler to stay as comfortable as possible. You don't have to worry about sleeping. Classic joint lighting is used as an interior accessory to add a warm atmosphere.
Bathroom in a penthouse
The composition of the three spaces is the same, and the color of the room and the material of the furniture have changed. It is a space where anyone can rest casually and form a consensus among travelers.
A lamp is both a light and an interior accessory
The penthouse can be thought of as a royal suite of a deluxe hotel. The exterior is a container, but the interior is finished with wood texture and filled with furniture collected by the owner, giving the 1970s vintage sensibility.
Gield's joint lighting reveals the traces of time
Vintage furniture and lights are Orissa chairs by Wim Rietveld, famous for their lighting and vintage furniture designs by Kaiser Idell, Louis Poulsen and Gielde All.
There is no ordinary lighting in Bizen Village
None is inadvertently placed. Under thorough calculations, it is properly positioned to feel the analog sensitivity. The stylish interior space meets the analog sensibility and is born as a place where present and past coexist. The same design concept was applied to the Avion camping trailers obtained from the United States.
Unique furniture and arrangement avoided the monotony of the room
The special lighting in each room is related to the history of the owner Choi Jung-hoon. He ran the interior company dot-to-design and vintage lighting & furniture shop loft market in Seoul. Then I came to Jeju with the idea of creating a boutique hotel where old and modern emotions coexist.
Stylish rooms with simplicity
I found a landscape full of carrot fields in Hadori and built a Bizen Village. Then he brought a selection of precious vintage lights, furniture, and speakers. This allows visitors to and from Bizen Village to encounter original vintage props that can only be seen in museums, rather than beautifully imitated interior props.
Bizen Village Night View
Vintage and chic but modern
Bizen Village's cafés, restaurants, editorial shops and galleries have a strong industrial feel. Exposed concrete, crunchy design, old props… . The vintage, chic but modern atmosphere makes you feel like you are in a foreign country.
Industrial Café Beer Round
The editor's shop Loft Market sells longboards and high-low furniture as well as outdoor goods and clothing. It is a selection of things that the owner likes.
Loft market selling items collected by the owner
Restaurant Hado Table is a great place to enjoy brunch dishes made with organic vegetables grown directly in the garden. It is a restaurant during the day, but at night it is transformed into a pub & club where you can drink beer and dance.
Breakfast made with organic ingredients
Organic Farm Cafe Beer Round is Jeju's favorite spot for women. There are many cute accessories to take pictures in unique atmosphere. JBL and Altec's vintage speakers are installed at one side of the café for use as a guitar or performance.
Glass bottle decoration of cafe
Choi Jung-hoon dreams that all spaces in Bizen Village will be used as wedding halls for small weddings, flea markets for artists, and ballrooms for dance parties. It is not a place to sleep and go to Jeju Island, but to enjoy a new culture, interact with people, and hope to be a cultural space.
Cafe Beer Round is a favorite spot for women
Hado Beach and Bijarim with the beauty of Jeju
Listening to nature is a way to use Bizen Village. Hado Beach is a 10-minute walk away. Woljeongri Beach and Bijarim are not far away. Hado Beach is a great place to surf. Even if you're not surfing, you can enjoy the sea with snorkeling and kayaking. You can walk on the sand while listening to the subdued sounds of the waves, or dive into the sea.
I want to take pictures
It is also happy to walk into the bizarre forest and take a refreshing wind to escape the hot sun. Bijarim is so luxuriant as the Millennium Forest. Walk the promenade and you'll find many different sized trees. The reason why it looks small compared to the age is because the growth rate of the non-tree is slow. It is the world's largest single-forest forest.
Bijarim, called the Millennium Forest
Travel info

Bizen Village

Contact: 064-784-8216

item.title: All of the red snow crab, winter snow on the scab! - Sokcho, Gangwon, South Korea
item.description:
Steamed red snow crab

All of the red snow crab, winter snow on the scab!

Sokcho, Gangwon, South Korea

Sokcho is known as the red crab producing area called red snow crab. Among them, Dongmyeong Port boasts abundant quantities thanks to the red crab boat going in and out. Most people choose “Grab crab” as their delicacy on the east coast, and “Hong crab”, which is being pushed by snow crabs and treated as a two-factor, is also a delicacy. Today I searched for red crabs that can be tasted cheaper than (normal) snow crabs throughout the coast of Gangwon-do.
Snow crab is one of the best on the winter coast. Usually crab legs are elongated and named like bamboo. If you solve it in Chinese characters, it becomes Jukhae (竹 蟹). Red snow crab leading to red crab is similar to snow crab, and sometimes it can be mistaken as snow crab.
Where is it? The neighborhood where you live is different. Most crabs live in depths of 30-1800m and red crabs in soft mud or sandy bottoms. At the depth of 450 ~ 600m, blue crab, a hybrid of snow crab and red crab, is located. It resembles a snow crab and is called ‘You too snow crab’.
It is not difficult to distinguish snow crab from red snow crab!
Before tasting red snow crab, let's take a look. The highest peak of snow crab is bakdae crab. Some people consider ‘박달대게’ as a proper noun. Whether it is domestic or imported, if the flesh is full, it is ‘박달대게’. Normally, domestic prices are set by maridang and imported by weight. You can also see snow crabs in Sokcho, known as the main area for red crabs. The price is flexible, but the average kg is about 100,000 won.
snow crab
It is usually crab although it is less full. The snow crab has a slightly dark brown color instead of the bright red color of the red crab. The color of the snow crab is more noticeable. After the crab is boiled, it turns into a pale pink color with a golden color. The red crab, which was red before steaming, is vivid after it is boiled. There are differences in appearance, but the difference is obvious in taste. If you taste crab and red crab together, you can feel the difference in taste.
Red snow crab
The crab's flesh is sweet. Sweet mussels melt gently in your mouth. When the soft and sweet crab comes into red rather than taste, it comes with a salty taste. Red crabs, which have a relatively salty taste, are often thought to be cheaper than snow crabs. Some of the crabs are filled with red crabs, boasting a ransom equivalent to snow crabs. Still, most of them cannot keep up with the price. Hong crabs, which are caught a lot at this time, boast a ransom ranging from 20,000 won to 6-70,000 won per kg. Red crab with various ransom, where should I eat something?
Snow crab and red snow crab
Some ways to taste red snow crab
“Finding Sokcho Dongmyeong Port with red crabs is the first way to eat fresh red crabs at the cheapest price. It's the cheapest way to buy red crabs at the Dongmyeong Port market and eat them on the 2nd floor of Dongmyeong Live Fish Center. You should eat red crabs at 30,000 won per kilogram. If you hold about 1kg per person, you eat For example, for a family of four, you can taste red crabs for about 120,000 won. ”
Directed red crab market in Dongmyeong Port, Sokcho, Gangwon-do
The red snow crab caught in a trap or net can be eaten all season except July-August. If you spray the traps in the deep sea of more than 1000m and save them, you will come with red crabs that came into the trap. The crabs caught in the trap are fresher than the nets laid in shallow water.
Sokcho-si Suyeong Livestock Center
Even when it's hot, it often dies on the way, and the cold wind is now red. The meat is full and the catch is plenty, which makes it relatively cheap.
Sogecho-si Suhyup Red Crab Plate located behind the Dongmyeong Live Fish Center
I have to pick a red crab at the market. How do I find a crab filled with flesh?
Dongmyeong Live Fish Center 2F
“When I look at the red crab, I see a white strip. Right now, most of the crab meat is full, and this white string is 80% full. Less white lines or faint whites are almost 100% full. It's a different color. Actually, the color is dark and vivid. Knowing this will help you pick a red crab. ”
If you see a white line on your belly, your flesh is not full.
This is the description of the owner of Sokcho Dongmyeong Port. Instead, it's cheaper than eating at a restaurant, but there's no service to cut crabs.
Nearly 100% full of red crab
If you buy crabs at the market, they give you a service. You can take the crab to the 2nd floor of Dongmyeong Live Fish Center or eat it.
Steamed red snow crab
The rice cooked in the crab is also special. When you put crab in a scab and mix it, it tastes like honey without soy sauce or other condiments. On the 2nd floor of Dongmyeong Live Fish Center, you can order rice cooked separately.
If you mix crab with rice, you can feel the rich taste.
You can add a spicy soup to 4,000 won (2 people or more) per person.
Dongmyeong Fresh Fish Center Maeuntang
Of course, there are many places where you can taste red snow crab besides Sokcho Dongmyeong Port. Sokcho Tourist Fish Market Underground, restaurants around Dongmyeong Port, and restaurants that boast red snow crabs around the public playground. It is no exaggeration to say that red snow crabs are caught throughout the east coast, but Sokcho is one of the areas that are not to be missed.
A red snow crab with a vivid red color like its name
Just steamed without any seasoning, delicious red crab. In Sokcho, where there are abundant red crabs, there are specialty red crab restaurants where you can taste various red crab dishes such as black crab radish and red crab ramen. When you eat a variety of cooked crabs, the crab-shelled chitin can help lower cholesterol while preventing fat from accumulating in your body. Not only does it taste good, but it also takes care of your health. You can eat red snow crab with a little bit of cheongju and steam for 15 minutes. Before spring, why don't you go on a trip to enjoy the red crab with fresh sea.
Toss with red crab seasoned with seasoned red snow crab

item.title: Enjoy ski slopes in advance at the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics! 'Parallel Rotation' and 'Cross' Course at Phoenix Pyeongchang - Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon, South Korea
item.description:
Skiers relaxing on snowy slopes

Enjoy ski slopes in advance at the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics! 'Parallel Rotation' and 'Cross' Course at Phoenix Pyeongchang

Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon, South Korea

The skiers and skaters, who cut through the snow at 140 km / h and tumble over high obstacles, sweat their hands just by looking at them. The opportunity to meet in advance the impression of the Pyeongchang Winter Olympic Games that have been coming up for a year, or to enjoy it. where? Phoenix Pyeongchang! how? If you are curious, let's leave.
Winter Olympic Games in Phoenix Pyeongchang
The Pyeongchang Winter Olympics Games, which will open on February 9, 2018, will take place in three cities, Pyeongchang, Gangneung and Jeongseon, Gangwon-do.
Skiing and boarding 9 events in Phoenix Pyeongchang
Three ski resorts, Phoenix Pyeongchang, Yongpyeong Resort, and Alpensia Resort, are located in Pyeongchang, where snow sports are held. This means that you can try out slopes for athletes before the Olympics. It's a thrilling news for those who ski and board a bit.
Skiing and boarding 9 events in Phoenix Pyeongchang
Phoenix Pyeongchang will host 5 freestyle skis and 4 snowboards during the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics snow games. Two athletes start at the same time to compete in parallel parallel rotation, a slope-style called the circus on snow, a moggle that uses techniques to turn and turn using jumps, the most exciting aerial among freestyle skiing, and air smoke on a semi-cylinder slope. Unfolding half-pipes and crosses that have to compete to speed through various obstacles. Six of the 21-side slopes of Phoenix Pyeongchang are used as Olympic venues.
There are eight lifts, six sunkids and eight-seater gondola.
Exciting Parallel Spinning Course
The parallel large round, a snowboard only race, is located at the left end of the Phoenix Pyeongchang ski base. The parallel rotation, with two players starting at the same time and winning quickly, is the most exciting of the snowboard games.
A parallel run is a game that passes a gate designated as a board game.
When you snowboard, you can think of brilliant skills such as spin and jump, but parallel rotation is a game that enjoys speed as much as technology.
Both board and ski can be used during the opening period
Parallel turns must pass through at least 18 gates on the slope to the finish line. Therefore, it is important to be as close to the gate as it is to speed, so it is how to come down while reducing the radius of rotation.
Both board and ski can be used during the opening period
The parallel anti-rotation slope has a length of 581 m and an average inclination of 16 degrees. Theoretically, anyone with an intermediate level of skill can use it, but to experience the beauty of the slopes, you need more. That way, you'll experience the thrill of rotation and the thrill of turning your body like a motorcycle rider every time you switch speeds and turns.
Parallel course course has a length of 581m and an average inclination of about 16 degrees.
It is a snowboarding arena, but skiers can also use it during the open hours. Compared to other slopes, there are few people who use it, and the slope management is the best for riding.
Parallel course course has a length of 581m and an average inclination of about 16 degrees.
Freestyle splendor added to the speed of downhill
The cross course that is open to the public along with the parallel run is exciting. Crosses take place on a variety of terrains, including banks, rulers, spines, and jumps.
Kroos is a combination of freestyle and downhill.
The cross course consists of 1275m, starting in the middle of the champion's slopes, crossing the Hawk 2 slope to the extreme park. It is 20% longer than the Olympic course standard 1050m, making it more thrilling.
Extreme Park, one of the cross courses
The attraction of this course is its ability to use various skills such as speed and jumping. As you fly through obstacles such as waves and jumps, you can soar as if you are flying in the sky, and you can feel as fast as a bobsleigh when you pass a sloped S-shaped bank like a velodrome in a cycle race.
Skaters Enjoying Snowboarding In Extreme Park
When flying over 10m from the last jump pad that is over adult height, even the viewer can feel the heart chewy.
A cross is played on a course consisting of various features
Be careful not to challenge yourself with motivation. You can't slow down a single moment on the entire slope, so make sure you have the right skills.
A cross is played on a course consisting of various features
It is a sport that requires physical strength to handle intense races and the skills to run a course with a lot of change.
Cross course to digest both jumps and downhill
Crosses are ranked first in the order of crossing the finish line, similar to the parallel run. Crosses play skis and snowboards. There are four ski crosses and six board crosses.
Mogle, one of the Winter Olympics courses
Test event presented by top players
If you've experienced the slopes your players want to use, don't miss the test event at Phoenix Pyeongchang. Starting February 10, a test event will be held to prepare for the PyeongChang Winter Olympics. The test event is an international competition to check the preparations before the Olympics. It's a great chance to see some of the best players in the world before the Winter Olympics. FIS Freestyle Ski World Cup (Airreal, Moggle, Halfpipe) from February 10-19, FIS Snowboard World Cup (parallel, half-pipe) from February 12-19 do. Lee Sang-ho, who emerged as the expectation of the PyeongChang Olympic Games, and Sean White, the emperor of snowboarding, will participate in this snowboarding world cup.
Phoenix Pyeongchang <Picture Credit: Phoenix Pyeongchang>
Travel info

item.title: Happy time, even on the riverside - Cheorwon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
Songdae beef with columnar joint

Happy time, even on the riverside

Cheorwon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea

Image 9 degrees. The weather is very late. It's been a while since Dae-eun dies with a cold. Besides, this is Cheolwon, the coldest place in Korea. It's not a pity that I left in anticipation of the frozen river and the white snow that threw down on it. to be. Although not officially named, the name of this road is called 'Hantan River Trail'. We will meet the Hantan River a little closer along the road once a year.
Cheorwon-gun hosts the Hantan River Ice Trekking Festival every mid-January. This year, the seventh year, the festival is held for nine days from January 19 to 27. It's the only ice trek theme in Korea that walks on frozen rivers.
Travelers trekking along the Hantan River Trail
The fun of walking on the transparent ice like glass is that you can meet the unexplored view of Cheorwon, which Hantan River embraces while walking such as Songdaeso, Jusangjeolli, Seungil Bridge, and Goseokjeong.
Travelers trekking along the Hantan River Trail
The Hantan River Trail runs from the Taebong Bridge, which is the starting point, to the Goseokjeong which is the destination, and most of the sections overlap the ice trekking course. That's because the road was designed to compensate for the lack of ice trekking. In other words, even the coldest weather in Cheorwon is not enough to freeze the entire Hantan River, which is famous for its roughness, so that people can walk on it. Therefore, the Hantan River Trail is designed to make it possible to bypass only high velocity or deep water sections.
Seungil Bridge, a landmark of Cheorwon-gun
Therefore, the Hantan River Trail is a supporting role for the Hantan River Ice Trekking Festival. To be honest, it's a star, but it's as good as another walking trail at the Ice Trekking Festival. That's the fun of walking.
Goseokjeong is famous for Cheorwon
The Hantan River Trail begins at Taebong Bridge, just like ice trekking. After walking down a short staircase, you will pass through a small park with rest facilities such as toilets and wooden chairs. Hanging close enough to smell the fresh water, the Hantan River sparkles in jade as if it were against the seasons. Even after descending to the river, the trail is clear. There is no rough surface because it is not the original way, but the sandbags are stacked in the chin to adjust the height, and the signal ribbons indicating the direction of progress are also tightly attached so that you can walk comfortably without getting lost.
The shape of the strange rock formed by the Hantan River
The bridge was installed where the river that flowed without hesitation took a breath. If the river was frozen, I would not have to cross it, but now I can't find the 'ㅇ' of ice. In fact, it was the biggest disappointment of the 6km Hantan River Trail. Why not? The famous Songdae place is a place where you can see the frontal view and bend around with a jujube joint spreading like Buchatsal. Songdaeso's columnar joint towering on the transparent ice floor is one of the representative images of the Hantan River, or Cheorwon's winter. Song Dae-so is deep enough to lack a bundle of yarn, so when ice trekking, do not approach the columnar joint, but only pass the designated course.
On the Hantan River Trail, pedestrian bridges and bridges were installed everywhere.
After the pedestrian bridge, the road mixes with the two courses for a while. Climb the short slopes and pass the refreshing deck road to see the birch forest. It's not luxuriant, but it still feels like a surprise gift. Passing through the smooth shape of the birch forest, you will find the Songdae Observatory. The songdaeso, which was hidden in a tree and scattered like a puzzle piece, is completely united here.
Songdaeso and Jusangjeolli
The path that descends from the observatory to the riverside turns into a mountain path. After you climb the mountain, pay a little attention. If you sell yourself, you can miss the road.
Travelers Through Birch Forest
Missing the way here does not mean getting lost. However, if you miss the yellow ribbon with the words 'Hantan River Ice Trekking', you will follow the middle of the road. That means about 3.5 kilometers, or more than half, along the wrong road, from the bridge that meets the Songdaeso Observatory to the Seungil Bridge where the driving site is located. The road that descends to the riverside is about 100m ahead of the signpost in front of the bridge.
View from Songdae Observatory
After descending to the riverside, the Hantan River is always on the way from Seungil Bridge to Goseokjeong. Like a dandelion dandelion does not leave for a moment.
Yard Rock
The large waterways silently follow the traveler's side when walking past the yard rock, which was once famous as a nude location among photographers, as well as walking on the sand that falls to the ankle. Sometimes rough and sometimes calm. Travelers don't have to be bored with the changing rivers.
Ragged Rock Segment
In the resting areas around the riverside streets such as Songdaeso, Madang Rock, and Naedaeyangjang, there will be exciting busking performances that will inspire the participants during the festival.
Seungil and Hantan Bridge
When we arrive at Seungil Bridge, the Hantan River Trail is now in its final stage. It is about 1km from Seungil Bridge to Goseokjeong. Even if you walk slowly, you can reach it in about 30 minutes. This year, the course extends from Goseokjeong to Sundam Valley, completing a trek of 7.5km.
The section connecting Goseokjeong from Seungil Bridge
The sand dunes under the Seungil Bridge will be used as driving areas for the Hantan River Ice Trekking Festival.
The last tusks leading to Goseokjeong
Various performances such as fusion gugak and b-boys will be prepared on the main stage, as well as ice sculptures that symbolize Cheorwon such as Gungye King and Labor Party.
Old stone from the bridge
There are also exciting winter events such as dog sledding, a hot air balloon experience, a kite flying experience, and a sledding range.
Travelers looking at the Hantan River from Goseokjeong
Cheolwon-gun plans to operate two shuttle buses from Goseokjeong to Seongil-gyo to Taebong Bridge during the Ice Trekking Festival.
Goseokjeong is the destination of the Hantan River Trail and Ice Trekking
The Hantan River Trail and Ice Trekking Course will be open until the end of February after the festival.
A huge icicle ran on a rocky cliff
Travel info

Cheorwon Hantan River Ice Trekking
-Place: Cheolwon Hantan River Taebong Bridge ~ Sundam Valley
-Date: 2019.01.19 ~ 2019.01.27
Inquiries: 033-450-5255 (Cheolwon County Office, Tourism and Culture Division)

item.title: Walk on the tranquil island in Yeosu red gold island - Yeosu, Jeonnam, Korea
item.description:
Red gold village landscape

Walk on the tranquil island in Yeosu red gold island

Yeosu, Jeonnam, Korea

Sometimes I travel for my own time. Journey for me. But not once or twice have been beaten by people. Here is an island in the South Sea where you can confuse these memories. Yeosu Red Rim. There are no gourmet restaurants or tourist attractions. There is a landing bridge that can be used to cross the road at Kep, but the time in Red Geumdo is still slow.
Island where walk is obligatory, red gold road
Jeokgeumdo is located at the entrance of the women's bay which Yeosu-si and Goheung-gun bear. Although it belongs to Yeosu-si in administrative area, it is closer to Goheung-gun by location. At the end of 2016, the completion of the Palyoung Bridge, which connected Goheung-gun and Jeokum-do, made the two locations more convenient.
The name of Geumdo Island in the early Joseon period was Red Lake. It has another name. It is also called 'Jakmimi Island' because there are many pebbles in the seaside. 'Gimmy' means the corner of the sea. In fact, the shoreline was filled with black pebbles that were rounded and polished by seawater. By the time of the Japanese colonial rumors that there was a gold mine in Red Geumdo, people who tried to dig gold came in, but all failed and left. The name Geumgeumdo (積 金 島) is made by combining the theory that there is gold in the pronunciation of small island.
Currently, the construction of a landing bridge that connects Goheung-gun from Yeosu-si to Jobal-do, Nando, Dun-byeong-do and Jeokgeum-do is in progress. For this reason, the construction site is found when you cross Palyoung Bridge and arrive at the island. There is also a sign that it is difficult to enter a car. Stop at the entrance to the island and start walking. This is because you have to walk slowly and look around in order to feel red geumdo. The entire coastline is about 9 km long, so it's not too much to trek. Two to three hours is enough to go around the center of town.
Pal Young Bridge
At present, there is a lack of amenities for travelers. As soon as you cross Palyoung Bridge, there is a rest stop at the Geumri-ri Station. You'd better have your meals prepared here or buy what you need. It is also good to take pictures with Palyoung Bridge in the parking lot of the Rip Geumni Rest Area. There is also a shop in the building behind the warehouse.
The village of Geumgumdo which is good to take a slow walk
Rim Road Main Street Walking
Red Geumdo Island is long to the north and south and bent to the east. Houses are gathered along the eastern shore of the hills in the center of the island. The start of the walk along the Geumdo Island begins from the back of the Geumgeum Crossing Palyoung Bridge to the west of the island. Stairs are visible into the forest on the left before entering the village through the construction of the bridge. There is a hyoyeol door at the end of the stairs.
Hyoyeol door
It is a place to store two rains that were set up to convey filial piety and enthusiasm to future generations. Filial piety means filial piety for parents and fidelity for females. If you don't lock the door, you can go in and see. The fence is low, so you can see the monument well outside.
2 monuments stored in a filial door
Walk a little further along the back of the road and go up to the alley along the bank of the Red Gold Agricultural Cooperatives. In order to go to the red gold branch school Since it was closed a long time ago, children cannot play but it is a good place to spend time thinking about childhood. It's a closed school, but it's not old-fashioned. The sky-painted roof and the lush trees are nice.
Closed Red Gold School
The playground, which only seemed wide when I was in elementary school, now feels small and compact. Only the low, rusty gate tells us that this is a closed school.
Red Gold Branch
It's a simple fun to enjoy at the Red Geum branch school. In front of the reading statue is a small artificial pond where no fish live.
Girl statue reading
Continue walking up the way to the main gate of Jeokgeum branch. The Red Geum Church, Red Geum-ri Office, and the Security Center are next. Jepumum is also the center of the city. The appearance of Red Geum Church painted white outside goes well with the atmosphere of the island. In the courtyard of the Red Interest Rate Office, there is a zelkova tree that is over 400 years old. It is a protective water with a perimeter of only 370cm and a height of 25m. From the highest position of the village, it stands overlooking Red Rim and the sea.
Red gold church
It is an alley where only two people can pass from the church to the security center. It's not as noisy as a famous destination, but it's a relaxing course. The security center with the window frame in yellow looks friendly and cozy.
Red Geum Metropolitan Security Center
Where to meet all the trucks and well jars
Now it's time to go down to town. It doesn't matter which alley you go to. Just follow the inclined path towards the sea. You exit the alley at a slow pace and you're in front of the dock that tied up the boats. An all-time truck that has just visited Red Geumdo is in operation with attracting new residents. It's nice to see all the trucks I've met in a while. It is a mobile home shopping that is still active in the age of advanced technology.
Fishing boat tied to the dock
The elderly person who came out to buy things looks curious. If you greet someone with a good smile, they will answer you with a smile like a cup of warm tea from the vending machine. Say hello to the elderly while walking along the island. They are gently greeted and tell stories of islands that can't be found on the Internet.
All-purpose trucks selling daily necessities to residents
There is a well jar in Red Geumdo. The island is usually short of water, with the exception of Red Rim. Water filled in pots are used by residents to drink. A well that receives water from a jar. You can't just go past Red Geumdo. On the dock, walk north along Dokseom Daepyeong-gil and find a jar covered with a lid.
Strollers and bicycles commonly used by seniors
The jar is really stuck in the ground. When I open the lid carefully, there is a small bar floating like water. Inside the jar was a hole to prevent water from overflowing.
Well Jar
It's a mystery staring into the jar, and the villager who was riding his bicycle seemed to be indifferent. "The water, you can drink!" The cold well water tasted late winter passed over my neck.
Bench installed for seniors
Return to where you came from and end your short trip. This is to make a really long trip to a busy daily life. I only stayed for a few hours, but the peaceful journey in Red Geumdo would serve as a support for my life. After entering Red Geumdo, one of the road cats, who shook their heads, greeted him with caution.
Red gold long cat
Travel info

Red gold

item.title: From King Sejong's narrative sensation to 'Winning of doubt', Asan travel story without hot springs - Asan, Chungnam, South Korea
item.description:
The side of Gujeong Art Center resembles a turtle ship

From King Sejong's narrative sensation to 'Winning of doubt', Asan travel story without hot springs

Asan, Chungnam, South Korea

In addition! Asan Onyang, again! Are you talking about hot springs? Today's travel story is a bit different. The first Korean architecture of Itami Jun, which built the Jeju Grape Hotel and the Ark Church, will be reviewed and the reason why Lee Jong-ho's architect covered Chungmugong Yi Sun-shin Memorial Hall with soil. We will also listen to the eco-friendly story of Asan, the observation deck on the chimney of 150m high incinerator, the first comedy theater remodeling the abandoned warehouse. The Mediterranean villages in <My Known Hundreds of Miscellaneous Dictionary 2> (hereinafter referred to as 'Aldish Shinjab 2') of some programs are a bonus.
Wait, Onslaught
But it's Onyang. First of all, in ‘ruff shinjab’ style Who was named Onyang? Onyang people say it is King Sejong the Great. This is because King Sejong the Great went to Onyang-gun after he found Onyang-gun therapeutic car. The trace of King Sejong's visit to Onyang is cultural property data # 314 Onyang Fish Euijeongjeong (溫陽 御醫 井). Euijeongjeong is on the way to Onyang Middle School.
Shinjeongbi in Onyang Tourist Hotel
There is also a young band that appeared in <Red Goddess 2>. Jang Hun-se-ja (aposto-the-ce-ce-ja), who was later deemed a major, found his father Yeong-jo and Onyang, and bowed his martial arts. To commemorate this, three zelkova trees were planted. Later, King Jeongjo built a stand in honor of his father, Jang Hun Sei, and wrote in his own words, Youngdae. Why did you use a picture tree bull when it was zelkova? When the ancestors refer to zelkova, they used the same one.
Onyang Folk Museum also has beautiful architecture
Onyang wins the first question in Jeju
Back to the origin! The Ark Church and the Museum of Water, Wind, and Stone are essential courses for Jeju travel. It is the work of Itami Jun (Korean name Lee Dong Ryong) along with Jeju Grape Hotel. He is a well-known architect who has won the Chevalier Prize of Best Art and Culture of France. But his first building is in Onyang. About 20 years ahead of the grape hotel.
Brick of the Chinese New Year Art Center baked in Asan soil
Onyang Folk Museum is located 1.5 ~ 2km from Onyang Oncheon Station or Yeongdaedae. It's difficult to overlook it as fat. It is one of the best in the country for exhibition planning and experience. There is another gem in the museum. Gujeong Art Center, an old Gujeong Art Museum. Itami Jun's first work in Korea.
Gujeong Art Center in front of Hanok
He reflects the nature and local environment in architecture. Gujeong Art Center was also made of Asan clay. The front is Hanok tile style. The interior is the structure of the Chungcheong-do house of ㅁㅁ. There are left and right exhibition halls and the walls inside are largely emptied to allow complex arts to be digested.
Exhibition of Gujeong Art Center
Especially interesting is the roof that crosses the hanok facade. Shaped the turtle ship. This is why Admiral Yi Sun-sin grew up in Asan. The shape is even more clear when you look at the road in front of the museum (Chungmuro).
‘ㅁ’ inside the building that is the courtyard of Hanok
There is another famous architect who put Yi Soon Shin in the building. He is the late architect Lee Jong-ho, who built the Soon Shin-Sin Memorial Hall. He built a memorial, covered it with dirt and made it like a hill.
Exterior of Chungmuong Yi Sunshin Memorial Hall, reminiscent of hills
Rather than revealing the hero, Yi Sun-shin, he paid attention to Yi Sun-shin, a man who worries like Kim Hoon's sympathy. Therefore, the exhibition hall seems to enter the inside of Chungmugong.
Entrance view to the memorial
The exhibition is a structure coming out to see the underground 4D movie theater on the first floor. One interesting fact. The architect originally planned to arrange General Yi Soon Shin's <Diary Diary> in the 4D movie theater as the final exhibition. It is a system that reads the diary of the same day as the date of reality. Unfortunately, it changed in the process of building. The Diary Diary is in the exhibition room on the first floor.
Interior showroom
Travel Europe in Asan
If you are curious about Asan in <Aldish Sinjab2> besides Young Daedae? We recommend Jang Young-sil Science Museum and Asan Mediterranean Village. Jang Young-Shil Science Museum delivers it as an experience rather than a text, as shown in <Aldsin Shinjab2>. For example, “In the toilet of my house,” the ball was put in a large set of toilets instead of particles of water and decorated like a playground. Children experience the siphon principle in secret. 'Start! Similarly, it is similar to 'Frimride' or 'Let the train tracks'. Become familiar with science as children play.
Experience-based Exhibition of Jang Young Shil Science Museum
Next to Jang Young Shil Science Museum is Asan Ecological Insects. Good for exploring the natural sciences. Adults are encouraged to visit the Asan Green Tower Observatory, 150 meters high, connected to the Asan Ecological Insect. Above the observation deck are cafes and restaurants. Enjoy a meal or coffee while looking down at Asan city. Actually, Jang Young-sil Science Museum and Asan Ecological Insect Garden are sewage treatment plant and waste incinerator. It is also called Asan Environmental Science Park. Of course, environmental pollution control facilities are applied.
Asan Green Tower Observatory using 150m incinerator chimney
Asan Jungjung Village, Tangjeong-myeon, is 8 km from Onyang Oncheon Station. Hyeonchungsa Chungmugung pass the Sunshin Memorial Hall, so I can connect. Tangjeong-myeon was changed due to the industrial complex. The Aboriginal people decided to move to a new home, which is the Asan Middle Sea Village. Alpsinja 2 is modeled after Santorini, Greece, but includes other Provence landscapes. The neighborhood is bright and lovers love it.
Mediterranean town panoramic view
It is funny hotter than hot spring water
Come back to the hot springs again! What if the destination is Dogo Onsen, not Onyang? What about Asan Showtime Comedy Hall? It is the first comedy theater in Korea. It opened next to the old Dogo Onsen Station, which was closed in 2014.
Asan Showtime Comedy Hall Concert Hall
Comedy Hall is largely divided into exhibition halls and performance halls. The exhibition hall was newly built, but the performance hall has been renovated and closed to the Dogo Onsen Station. A gag performance is held for the whole family to watch together. On weekdays, it is available for group reservations, and is held at 2pm, 5pm and 2pm Sunday. The performance schedule may change, so please check beforehand.
Familiar faces in the exhibition materials
The exhibition hall consists of an exhibition room on the first floor and a sunset cafe on the second floor. The showroom has a lot of Korean comedy history. Look for a familiar gagman by generation. The second floor was a wild field outside the west with a window, so the view was wide. After the show, you will have a cup of coffee and wait for the sunset. In front of the comedy hall was a railroad track. Now it is the section where Asan Rail Bike comes and goes. It operates in December in a circular fashion. Comedy Hall is 2.5 km from Dogo Onsen Station. It forms a triangle with the same distance as Paradise Spadogo. Traveling on public transport is also suitable for families and lovers on a train.
Exterior of exhibition hall on the first floor and sunset cafe on the second floor

item.title: Blue waves run over Samcheok's winter sea - Samcheok, Gangwon, South Korea
item.description:
Chuam Beach seen from Chuam-Jungsan Coastal Trail

Blue waves run over Samcheok's winter sea

Samcheok, Gangwon, South Korea

Listening to the group's blue sky song, `` Winter Seas, '' I miss the winter sea so much that I want to leave right away. I remember going to the sea long ago listening to this song. The bitter sea breeze and cold winds up the body, but the deep blue sea and the dazzling white waves dig into the chest. The winter sea meets comfort and hope more than beauty. The waters of Samcheok, Gangwon-do have the most beautiful colors and have cute beaches and coastal roads. Let's meet the winter sea along Samcheok's coastal road that leads to the coast instead of National Highway 7.

Samcheok begins, from Jeungsan Beach to Alley Beach
Samcheok's sea begins at Jeungsan Beach. Jeungsan is a village nestled between Chamjae, which leads to Chuam, and Wowsan, which passes to Samcheok Beach. The beach just over 200m ahead of the village is named Jeungsan Beach.
There is a coastal trail connecting Chuam Beach and Jeungsan Beach in the East Sea. It is a short walk of less than 300m along the coastal cliff, but it is an observation point where the landscape of candlestick rock, which is a specialty of Chuam Beach, and the surrounding rock formations unfold. If you drive by car from Jeungsan Beach to Chuam Beach, you have to travel at least 4km long.
Jeungsan Beach
Santa Rosa is the only cafe on Jeungsan Beach. You can eat as well as a variety of drinks. If you sit by the window, you can see Jeungsan Beach. It is a good place to enjoy a cup of tea while looking at the winter sea.
Santa Rosa window at Jeungsan Beach
Santa Rosa is also home to a homemade burger. From hamburger buns to patties.
Homemade burgers in Santa Rosa
In order to move from Jeungsan Beach to Samcheok Beach, you have to go over one head. When you pass from Samcheok Beach on the other side, Gwiam Park, Suwon Park and Chuam Beach are the must-see points.
Lovers on Samcheok Beach Looking at the Ocean
Samcheok Beach is visited by many Japanese. This is because Yon-sama Bae Yong-joon is the filming location for the movie Staring Out. The original name was backward beach, but changed to Samcheok beach because it was not good. The small beach that goes further south from Samcheok Beach still remains as a small backward beach.
Samcheok Beach Sculpture
There are many cafes on Samcheok Beach where you can spend a relaxing time. Among them, one cafe decorated with sky blue is outstanding. It is a sea pepe that means “a cafe in front of the beach.” The “I love you” sculpture of Samcheok Beach is directly overlooked. The interior is impressive, with two windows on the right side of the cafe, allowing me to look out through the window.
Window
Serve homemade cookies and cakes to match your coffee. Cookies and cakes made by the owner are popular with travelers looking for a buffet.
Samcheok Beach Bamp
Samcheok's representative coastal road is the Millennium Coastal Road. The road was built to commemorate the Millennium in 2000. The road along the coastal cliffs makes the landscape quite impressive. There are always coastal roads bent along the coastline, as well as cool waves that drive off the seashore and the shore. The Millennium Coastal Road runs about 5 km from Samcheok Beach to Samcheok Port.
Millennium Coastal Road and Ocean Landscape
The Beach Sculpture Park and the Tower of Hope, where you can see a variety of sculptures, serve as a shelter as well as a sunrise spot for Samcheok.
Sunrise seen from the Tower of Hope on the Millennium Coastal Road
From the center of Samcheok, Gungchon to Yonghwa Beach
When you exit the Millennium Coastal Road, you will see National Highway 7 toward Uljin. Follow Samcheok-ro instead of National Highway 7, which is like an expressway at Obun Intersection. Samcheok-ro, the old national road, is the way to meet Samcheok's most beautiful seas, from Alley, Gungchon, Munam, Chogok, Yonghwa, and Jangho Beach to Gopo, the southern edge of Samcheok.
Gungchon to Yonghwa is a famous section for marine rail bikes. Rail bikes are famous, but few people find coastal roads from Gungchon to Yonghwa Beach. Crossing Gungchon Bridge, you will find coastal roads leading to Wonpyeong Beach, Munam Beach and Chogok Port. The road runs alongside marine rail bikes. As you approach Chogok Harbor, you can see the observation deck on the rocks. It is worth noting because there is a bow-shaped Moonam beach, the surrounding sea rocks, Chogok Harbor Breakwater, and a rock that resembles a Maison Samjon Buddha with a coffin.
Maison Samjonbul Rock on Munam Beach
Chogok Port is the home of Montjuic's hero, Marathoner Hwang Young-jo. Overlooking Chogok Port in Hwang Yeong-jo Memorial Park, set on the hill of the village.
Chogok Port, the hometown of Hwang Young-jo, the hero of Montjuic
From Chogok Port to Yonghwa Beach, there is more than one big pass. It is also known as mal soup. Malgukjae Summit is the best view point of Samcheok overlooking Yonghwa Beach and Jangho Port. Horses carry people and roll their feet against the seascape. The scenery is as beautiful as the legend this winter.
Yonghwa Beach and Jangho Port from the Top
Samcheok's Edge, from Galam to Gopo Village
Galnam Port is a secluded fishing village located south of Jangho Port. At one time, many ships gathered to be the mother port of Taichung fishing boats, but now it is just a fishing village. Before you enter Galang Port, take a look around the roadside deck. There is nothing beautiful about Wolmido, Gaetbawi Rock, calm blue sea, Galnam Port and village scenery. The water in the harbor is also transparent enough to see the bottom.
Galnam Port with Beautiful Water and Village
If you go down the path from Galnam Port, you will pass through Haesindang Park to the officers. Behind the executive port is the Nambu Volcano Hunhwa Park. There is a small road leading to Namhwa Volcano just before the officers' office. The road to the top of the park is also difficult. It is a narrow cement road that reaches 2.5km and is very steep. But if you reach the top as hard as you can, the open sea is waiting for you. The promenade is made with various sculptures based on the story in Samguk Yusa.
Sculpture of Waterway Women's Memorial Park
Passing officers is Wondeok-eup, the last home of Samcheok. As soon as you cross the Wolcheon Bridge from Wondeok-eup to Hosan Intersection, turn left and follow the Gigokcheon Stream, which leads to Wolcheon Beach and Gopo Village. Across from Gigokcheon, a huge gray structure catches the eye. LNG production base is located. Side by side with the gray structure, Sol Island, famous for being photographed by British photographer Michael Kenna. As the LNG production base enters, only Solsum remains, but the surrounding area is desolate. It is even more sorrowful than ever when the LNG production base enters Solseom, which was at the center of the legal battle against Michael Kenna's photographic copyright issue.
Solseom on the way to Wolcheon Beach
Passing Wolcheon Beach, you will reach Gopo Village, the end of Samcheok and the beginning of Uljin. North is Wolcheon-ri, Wondeok-eup, Samcheok-si, and Nagok-ri, Buk-myeon, Uljin-gun. Area codes are different and each polling place is different when dialing one street. It is a place where you can feel a special feeling even though there is no special sight.
Gopo Village
Dohwasan Garden, behind Gopo Village, is a park that has planted barren trees, which are colored in pink during summer, in the ruins of a forest fire. On top of the park are gazebos and benches. Here you can see the national highway No. 7 that connects the East Sea and North and South.
View from Dohwa Garden
Travel info

Millennium Coastal Road
Address: 86-3 Gyo-dong, Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do
Contact: 033-572-2024
www.samcheok.go.kr/tour.web


1. Nearby restaurants

Buil Makguksu: Makguksu / 7, Pyeongdeung-gil, Samcheok-si / 033-572-1277

2. Accommodation

item.title: 3 ways to enjoy Cheongyang - Cheongyang-gun, South Korea
item.description:
Ice bobsledding where children can hear laughter

3 ways to enjoy Cheongyang

Cheongyang-gun, South Korea

It's warmer than usual, saying 'Dong-gun disappeared'. If you don't want to spend a season without a change of memories, let's go to Chongyang where Chilgapsan is where winter is more enjoyable than summer when Anakne's Baeksam is soaked.
Just look at it! Ceiling arc bridge
How would you feel standing on a rocking bridge that is 207 meters long and 1.5 meters wide? Located at the tip of Chilgapsan Mountain, you can enjoy the thrill of the trekking all over with the luck of seeing the world's largest peppers and goji berry. Cheongyang Chilgapsan Cheolho Lake is the longest boasting bridge in Korea.
After the completion of 2009, an entertainment program visited and became a specialty of Cheongyang. At the beginning of this place, the bean field hawk, which appears in the song `` Chilapsan, '' greets us by stealing a hoe on one hand and a sweat flowing from the other. When you walked while appreciating the hearts of mothers during difficult times, you can face the ceiling of the ceiling. I am overwhelmed by the longer bridge than I thought, the picturesque ceiling, and the giant tower of 16m in size.
The beautiful view of the ceiling and the bridge
But the real pleasure to find here is the rocky bridge! The ceiling arc rocking bridge is designed to swing about 30 ~ 40cm. It's a bit more recoil than you'd expect to go on a tightrope, and you'll grasp the handle tightly. If you have less than you think, stop and look down. Looking down the ceiling of the middle of the bridge adds to the breathtaking feeling. Even if you want to enjoy more thrills, don't let them stumble for safety.
The tower of the pepper model is dignified.
If you are planning a pregnancy couple can not go too far. Cheongho Lake below Chilap Mountain has a legend about dragons and tigers.
Dragon model you can meet across the bridge
Hwangryong, who was waiting for the ascension of the millennia, dedicated his body to make a bridge to save the life of a child, and saw the tiger as a spirit to protect Chilap Mountain. If you cross the mountain and climb Chilap Mountain, you will be inspired by Hwang Ryong and Tiger, and you will have a healthy child.
Rock of Hope
In addition, you can also see Wish Rock here, where the story of the birth of a child born with wishes is extremely fulfilling.
Wish notes hanging in front of the wish rock
Called the Alps of Chungnam, Cheongyang Alps Village
There is a village nestled at the foot of Chilgapsan, the Alps of Chungnam. It is as high as a ceiling and is called the ceiling. It is more familiar to us under the name of 'Alps Village' with an exceptionally beautiful ceiling.
Snow Covered Wish Tunnel
Unlike other villages where there are many summer experiences, people visit here in winter. Alpine villages are not only steep, but also looking north, so rivers do not have sun all day. The temperature is also 3-4 degrees lower than other regions, making it vulnerable to farming. The locals, however, created a festival in which the poor natural environment was transformed into the best gift. The ice fountain is used as an ice fountain festival, and a sloped mountain is used as a sledding slope. Instead, it is an ice fountain festival where you can fully feel the countryside.
Alps that are likely to depart soon
The Alps Village Ice Fountain Festival is being held this year with the cooperation of villagers. It consists of seven themes including attractions, things to do, things to eat, things to eat, snacks, sleeps and things to see around. Although there are some unpleasant parts of the sights due to abnormal temperatures, it is not enough for children to enjoy.
Alps village where dogs come to play
The highlight of this place is ice bobsleigh! In the colorful light tunnel, the children's clear laughter runs through the ice.
The children are riding in a bobsled.
Even the foods that are indispensable at the festival can be felt in the countryside. Baked with oak firewood and delicious roasted sweet potatoes and hot roasted chestnuts are very popular.
Bake yourself in a bonfire
In addition to this, there is also a charm point such as Sagol Tteokguk and Sagol Beef Soup Rice.
Best popular menu, chestnut
Star Park, Chilgapsan Observatory, facing the Sun
If you want to combine children's education and play on a fine day, visit the Chilgapsan Observatory Star Park located on the hillside of Chilgapsan. Opened in 2009 and operating as an astronomical themed science museum, it is more popular because it allows you to directly observe the sun as well as stars.
Korea's largest refractive telescope installed in the observation room
Observations take place in the main and secondary observation rooms on the third floor. In the observation room where the largest refractor is installed in Korea, sunspots and irises are observed. The secondary observation room, designed as a hemispherical sliding dome that surrounds the main observation room, observes the objects in the night sky such as planets, nebulae, and clusters at night. The astronomical projection room, where you can project constellations and celestial objects by projecting a virtual object like a real night sky on a 10m dome screen, is by far the most popular program that embodies the mystery of the universe in the hearts of children.
Different types of telescopes installed in the auxiliary observation room
Cheongyang offers a variety of experiences, including a jewel-free scenery and nostalgic winter festivals in rural villages and astronomical programs that can bring you closer to the sky. Why don't you visit this place for the first time this year?
Mask with polarizing film that can observe sun spots
