item.title: Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival - Hwacheon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
Mountain Trout Ice Fishing Boat Scenery

Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival

Hwacheon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea

There are two ways to enjoy winter. One is to find a warm indoor fun to avoid the cold, and the other is to experience the best of winter with the whole body. The latter example is Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival. At Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival, ice fishing, ice sledding, ice football, ice bicycle, skating, and other winter games were gathered. All the fun in winter can be enjoyed. Even if it is not explained with the title of “World Four Winter Festival” and “7 Wonders of World Winter,” it has become a representative winter festival in Korea. The reason why more than 1 million people visit the Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival each year is 'being fun and fun'.

Enjoy Mountain Trout Festival and Flowers of Mountain Trout Festival!
The beauty of Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival is the fishing of perch. Many people have been waiting for a year because they have not forgotten this taste. Are you worried about the cold? Don't be afraid. I'm rumored to be cold, and I've been looking for Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival for 4 years. The time I wait for an errant mackerel on an ice sheet to ask for my fishing rod is as exciting as waiting for a lover in my love life. The lover may soon appear, or may not appear forever that day. But waiting time is expected to inflate. If you hear the sound of 'caught' here and there, you may be in a hurry.
Hundreds of emotions pass through ice fishing. Then, the trembling trembling through the fishing rod, and the joy of picking up wild trout seems to be lacking compared to winning the lottery. There is no room for the interruption of the cold and the time of expectation and pleasure repeated. The minds of those who lie down on the ice floor and look at only small ice holes are understood only by those who have ever tried fishing.
A child who likes to catch wild trout
Parents with small children are more inclined to expect children's expectations, 'When will my mom and dad catch mountain trout?' But where is fishing going? If your children are waiting, but you can't fish mountain trout, use the infant ice fishing. The infant's special ice fishing beneath the bridge is only available for preschoolers. One guardian is allowed per child. The volunteer also explains how to fish for the child. It operates for one hour once and can catch up to one bird per person. There are few anglers and there are a lot of mountain trout, so most of them are raised one by one. A young child may catch a wild trout caught by mom and dad. Infant ice fishing runs twice a day from Friday to Sunday. The fee is free.
Infant fishing spot for preschoolers
If you can't help yourself, try more aggressively. The most obvious way to put a wild trout in my hand in a short time is to experience the hand-held trout. Wear shorts in short sleeves and jump directly into the cold water where mountain trout plays. You can get wild trout at once without waiting as boring as fishing. Instead, good luck can only be obtained by those who have the courage to cope with the cold. There is also a children's corner.
Challenge of courageous people, Sancheon bare hands
Surprisingly, many people participate to create a true scenery. Those who dive into the cold water, and those who watch it, have a lot of fun.
Children's Mountain Trout Bare Hands Experience Center
If you caught a wild fish, it's time to taste the wild fish. There is a pottery and meeting center near the fishing grounds. You can eat wild trout in a large grill and eat it freshly. It's more valuable because it's a dish of ham that I caught. The cost of grilling wild trout or sashimi is 2,000 won per fish. Even if you haven't caught the wild trout, you can try the wild trout at the various food venues around the festival. San-cheoneo sashimi, Sancheon-ebi bibimbap, and grilled fish from the San-eup Festival. Sancheon Fish Restaurant, located upstream of Baumori Bridge, offers a variety of dishes using Sancheoneo Udon, Sancheoneo Gas, and Sancheoneo Fish Cake. You can also find snacks such as mountain trout shaped breads and sausages with wild trout.
Hot Sancheon Bread
'If you want to taste more special mountain trout dishes, go to Daecheong Maru', a restaurant located in Hwacheon-eup. There is a unique menu called Mountain Trout Boiled Stone Rice. There are plenty of wild salmon in hot stone rice. I'm worried about the fish, but if you try it, it doesn't taste fishy at all. This is one of the specialties that can be tasted only during the Mountain Trout Festival.
Recreational Stone Pot with Wild Trout
From Sancheon fish coffee museum to astronomical projection room, there are many new experiences
The Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival is another advantage of fishing and fishing. In the heart of the festival, Earl Bear Castle enjoys ice sculptures, ice tunnels and ice slides.
Sledding on the Tube
In the future, there is a large ice sledding range. From wooden single-man sledges to multi-seater family ice sleds and bikes on ice, you can experience a wide range of experiences.
Slippery Football on Ice
There's also plenty to see and do, including sledding on a tube, bobsled down a long tub-shaped track, ice football, curling and ice hockey on an ice sheet.
Bike ride on ice
This doesn't just mean ice-related play. Last year, he ran the astronomical projection room from the Landscaping Astronomical Observatory, which opened in Hwacheon. They also see constellations in space made of air domes and observe sunspots through astronomical telescopes. There is also a wooden experience center where you can play with the tree.
Enjoy astronomical experience at the Mountain Trout Festival
Don't miss the fun outside the festival. If you go to Multipurpose Plaza in Hwacheon-eup, Sancheon Fish Coffee Museum, Indoor Ice Sculpture Square, and Sancheon Fish Cinema are well located.
Sancheoneo Coffee Museum opened in December
The Sancheon Fish Coffee Museum opened in December last year. Various collections of coffee are on display. There is also a cafe space on one side for tasting. It is good to take a break to cool down.
Sancheoneo Coffee Museum opened in December
The way to the indoor ice sculpture square is like entering a frozen warehouse. The Frozen Kingdom is full of ice. Various pieces of ice are on display including turtle ship, statue of Admiral Yi Sun-sin, Sungnyemun Gate, Taj Mahal, Vatican Cathedral and Venus. The sculptures are made by sculptors of the ice lantern festival in Harbin, China.
Korea's largest indoor ice sculpture square
The Coffee Museum and the Ice Sculpture Square are adjacent to the leading street and are open until 9 pm during the Mountain Trout Festival.
Another highlight of the Mountain Trout Festival,
Travel info

item.title: “Fishing is not everything ~” Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival - Hwacheon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea
item.description:
Tourists Enjoying Wild Trout Fishing

“Fishing is not everything ~” Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival

Hwacheon-gun, Gangwon-do, Korea

The Hwacheon Sancheon Fish Festival, which has been selected as the representative festival of the Republic of Korea for four consecutive years, announced its opening on the 14th. Thanks to the powerful cold weather that had been visited two or three days ago, Hwacheoncheon was not frozen. More than 200,000 tourists went to the first weekend. They faced the wind and heated up fishing for trout. The best part of the Mountain Trout Festival is silk fishing. From zip wires to ice sleds, you won't have 24 hours a day to chill out. Let's go to the winter kingdom Hwacheon to fully enjoy this winter.
Hwacheon's natural festival
Hwacheon is a beautiful country rich in mountain resources. Surrounded by Ilsan, Byeongpungsan, Maebongsan and Duryu, the Bukhangang River flows southwest of the county. In particular, Lake Paro is famous for its superb view of the lush trees that surround it. However, it did not receive much attention as a tourist destination due to the surrounding cities such as Chuncheon and Pocheon. One of the reasons was the relatively low accessibility due to the twisted national road and the limited development of tourism resources due to the military area.
In this situation, villagers developed a winter festival that reversed the closed environment. The main program is to catch mountain trout, a first-class cold water native fish, on the ice. Hwacheon's average winter temperature of minus 7 degrees made the burdensome content of ice fishing possible. The festival, which was first launched in 2003, was selected as the 'Festival Festival' selected by the Ministry of Education in 2006, followed by the 'Excellent Festival' and 'Best Festival'. Now its reputation and recognition are comparable to the world's three major winter festivals, such as the Sapporo Snow Festival, Harbin Ice Festival and the Canadian Winter Carnival.
Mountain trouts of various sizes caught in the hands of a Kang Tae Gong
This year's Mountain Trout Festival will be held for 23 days from January 14 to February 5. In order to prevent tourists from escaping at low tide in the evening, the city has greatly enhanced the benefits such as expanding night ice fishing and free admission to night fishing when using accommodations in Hwacheon-gun. Hwacheon's strategy of attempting to transform into a stay-type festival without compromising on the exceptional record of mobilizing more than 1 million tourists for 10 consecutive years is already ahead of expectations.
Busy Hands to Supply Wild Trout
Ice fishing in the morning and ice experience in the afternoon
The early-bird spirit is needed to enjoy the Mountain Trout Festival more effectively. The festival is so large and crowded that the series of experiences leading to entry, fishing, dining, and night events is not memorable.
"Where are you?" Sharp eyes focusing on the fishing rod
Usually, people line up like dawn to get a ticket. The time required for grilling and circuit-cooking the caught mackerel is at least 30 minutes, so it is important to be prepared to start fishing at 9:00 am, the opening time. If you settle well, you can achieve '3 per person,' which is allowed during the morning. If you ever get out of the fishing field empty hands do not need to be too sad. There are many restaurants selling wild trouts throughout the festival. If you meet your talented neighbor Kang Tae-gong and get a free fish, you can get a free prize.
Mountain trout caught at the end of trouble
The taste of wild trout sashimi is very sweet. It is cloudy and dark in color compared to the red-colored trout, but lacks the earthy or fishy taste of freshwater fish. It's even slightly oily like saltwater fish. Moderate salted grilled sea trout also grabs the taste of both ages.
Floating mackerel sashimi
It is a big fish with a length of 2 ~ 30cm and its flesh is thick. The lack of taste attracts tourists to Hwacheon every winter.
Hearty mountain trout
From late afternoon after fishing and eating, you can enjoy ice skating at the Ice Sled Square and the event booth. You can experience ice sledding, figure skating, snow sledding, bobsleigh and other items at a low price of about 5,000 won.
Straw wire that crosses the sky
There is also a wide range of winter culture villages where you can experience skiing across rivers, make sweets, make traditional games, and burn wishes with straw wire.
Adults enjoy thrilling sledding
If you have time, you can drop by at Santa Post Office and send a message directly to Santa. The pure eyes of the children expecting Santa's reply color the white hearts of the passing adults.
Hey ~!
More fun place at night
Hwacheon night is more beautiful than day. A bright red with thousands of bulbs is a sign that another world is open.
Hwacheon live in street lamps
On the first street, there are big and small events such as free beer tasting, pierrot ballooning, celebrations, and spinning wheels.
Twinkling
A glass of free beer reflects the spirit of Hwacheon residents who overcome the winter with an unconventional spirit.
Tourists bringing in a tasting beer
You can feel the romance of winter night even in indoor ice sculpture square. Created by the ice sculpture experts of Harbin Ice Festival, this space is colorfully decorated with landmarks from around the world. There are many cute photo zones, and lovers and young children are particularly happy. The indoor ice sculpture plaza is located a little away from the riverside, but if you take a slow walk through the food plaza and the leading street, you can arrive in about 15 minutes. In front of the indoor ice sculpture plaza, there is also an event where the Cho Kyung Chul Observatory installs an astronomical telescope and allows tourists to observe the moon and the planet.
Little boy coming down the ice sculpture slide
If you enjoy playing, seeing and eating, the day feels very short. If you want to experience the best of the festival and Hwacheon's specialty, we recommend you to visit for a night instead of the day. Staying at Hwacheon will give you the benefits of free night fishing, so be sure to stay motivated. In addition to the entrance fee, there will be various additional costs, but most of them are cheap and a certain amount can be returned to Hwacheon Love Gift Certificate. Hwacheon Love Gift Certificates can be used like cash at farms and specialty stores located throughout the festival. Popular items include tomato laver, tomato juice, and homemade jam. Hwacheon also hosts a tomato festival every August using its specialty tomato, so if you feel sorry to leave this small country village, let's pledge this summer.
Colorful fireworks show for the opening of the Mountain Trout Festival
Travel info

Hwacheon Mountain Trout Festival

Contact: 1688-3005

http://www.narafestival.com/01_icenara/

item.title: If you want to leave alone this fall, Anmyeondo - Taean-gun, South Korea
item.description:
Blooming shoreline, one of the three best sunsets on the west coast

If you want to leave alone this fall, Anmyeondo

Taean-gun, South Korea

Autumn on the west coast is abundant. From lobsters to fat seas to right-sized tuna and crabs. If the sky rises with the shaking sea, if it becomes lonely or weak, why don't you go with the best friend of the world and yourself? It smells like sea and goes to Anmyeondo to taste the wonderful fall and wild lobster.

Taean travel can be largely divided into Taean and Southern Anmyeon and Anmyeondo. The face bridge bridges the two. In terms of administrative area, it belongs to the same 'Tae', but the distance between the island and the peninsula is quite legal. For example, Anmyeondo Flower Garden Coast and North Taean Sinduri Coastal Sand Dunes are about 70 minutes by self-drive. That's why you have to move around thinking about copper lines. If you have time, you may want to add Seosan, Hongseong, and Boryeong, which is the path to Taean and faces Cheonsu Bay. Hongseong and Boryeong, located near Cheonsu Bay, easily reach across the Seosan embankment.

Besides, it is autumn. This season is full of West Coast food festivals. Daeha is in full swing at Baeksajang Port in Anmyeon-do (Baeksa Pogu Daeha Festival · 10.8 ~ 10.30) and Hongseong Namdang Port (Hongseong Namdang Port Daeha Festival · 9.9 ~ 10.30) facing Cheonsu Bay. West Coast autumn specialties musketeers and crab also gained weight. If you go up the road after the wind, it is heaven.

Anmyeondo Tour from Seosan Ganwoldo

The center of this Taean trip is Anmyeondo. Seosan Ganwolam will be added here. When you first bite Gamwol

http://www.badatime.com/129-2016-09-01.html

Checking and weaving travel routes is easy. The Ganwol-do can be viewed for about 1 to 2 hours before and after the low tide time when the sea level is lowest.

If 'knock out' is the point of this trip, it's better to see where to go. You can choose either Kwanwoldo or Kyojiji to catch the line. They are all hot spots known as the West Coast's sakura point.
Kanwoldo, which has lost water
The reporter visited Gwanwoldo and decided to see the fall from the flower garden. Starting with Gwanwoldo, we decided to head over the white sand to the flower garden. We decided to visit the white sand beach Pogu which is famous for the wild lobster festival. Both the heat and the heat are fading, and the vacancy of the season, when the autumn begins in earnest, soothes the beaches along the coast of Anmyeondo and wherever small muzzles touch.
Kanwoldo where you can walk when the water runs out
The high tide of September 22, 2016, at Gwanwol-do, is 2:00 pm. Ganwoldo is Ganwolam, and Ganwolam is Ganwoldo. The deep flesh of the West Sea, far from the sea, is rough and gentle. It is located close to the land, so you can enter without limitation. The Goryeo Horse Academic Ambassador was named Ganwolam because he was enlightened at the moon during the capital. When the water is full, it resembles a lotus floating on the sea, and it is also called 'Yonhwadae'. The west sea, which was considered muddy, is green. It looks like the green sea I saw somewhere.
Kanwol-do, fish dried in the sea breeze
Why did Anmyeon Island become an island?
There are many oyster dishes near Ganwol-do. You can taste nutritious oyster rice from <Mtd Garden> and <Ganwolpogu Nutrition Oyster Rice>. Get out of Ganwol-do and enter Anmyeon-do. Anmyeondo was originally a land, not an island. Most of the ships loaded with three songs from Samnam in the Joseon Dynasty headed for Hanyang through the West Sea, passing Boryeong offshore, Taean Anheungyang and Dangjin. Among them, Anheung was off the coast of the Taean Peninsula with a large tide and a high speed and a lot of reefs.
There are many specialty oyster rice shops near Ganwol-do.
This was a loss of state finances. The alternative found in the mediation at that time was fortune. In 1638, an ant wood was dug out of a canal between Sinon-ri, Nam-myeon and Angi-eup Changgi-ri, north of Anmyeon-do. Anmyeondo became an island like this.
Nutritious Oyster Rice with Oysters Added to Jujube and Nuts
White Sea Port of Paradise, a natural paradise
As soon as it crosses Anmyeon Bridge, it reaches the White Sand Port. As the name suggests, you can walk from the fine white sandy harbor to the flower gardens along the sandy beaches and coastal roads. The white sandy beach is a big festival every fall. This year is scheduled to run from October 8 to 30. There are many specialty shops along the muzzle. Every shop attracts visitors with delicious crab, lobster, and fried shrimp.
Anmyeondo white sandy beach scenery
Anmyeondo, which is famous for producing Daeha, is a place where you can see and taste wild lobsters. How can I clearly distinguish wild manure from aquaculture? First of all, the beard is long and the color is clear. There is a big difference in size and color. The wild crayfish, frozen last spring, are much larger than this fall. The nature is so urgent that it is hard to see alive, but you can also taste the fresh treats that you just caught.
Fresh lobster frozen in spring
Most of the alive swimmers we've known as treats are white-legged shrimp. On September 22, 2016, at the White Cove Port Suhyup, Sunghan's wild lobster was traded for about 35,000 won per kg, and around 25,000 won for wounds caught in the net. The price fluctuates depending on the amount of catchers.
Big chick frozen, little chick caught this fall
In Suhyup, you can buy treats cheaper than restaurants. If you pay 15,000 won, you can taste it at restaurants.
Anmyeondo Baeksaeng Harbor Suhyup
The beautiful legend of the Kami and Granny Rocks
The path from the white sands to the flower garden. White beach, Sambong beach, and Anmyeondo beach are followed.
The flower when the water fell out
Among the numerous coasts and harbors of Anmyeondo, the flowery shoreline is recognized as one of the three great west coastal estuaries. The best of them is the sunset falling between a pair of sea rocks called Khalmi Rock and Khalabi Rock. He has a heartbroken legend that he's been a rock while waiting for his life to go to war.
High tide
If you hit the tide, you can go to Halmi Rock and Halabi Rock in about 30 minutes. Add a walk of 3 kilometers to the white sand beach to enjoy the relaxing sunset.
Tranquil white beach

item.title: Comfort and hope to all with the new light! The 21st Pohang Homigot Korean National Sunrise Festival - Pohang, Gyeongbuk, Korea
item.description:
Majestic Homigot Sunrise

Comfort and hope to all with the new light! The 21st Pohang Homigot Korean National Sunrise Festival

Pohang, Gyeongbuk, Korea

On the first day of the new year, the 'Homi Cape Korean People's Celebration' is held at Pomi Homigot Square.
Homigot Sunrise, a new hope for all
Homi Cape, located in Nam-gu, Pohang, is the tail of the Korean peninsula, the Korean peninsula. Speaking of tails often comes to mind negative meanings such as end and back. Like the crowned crown, it can be used to mean incompleteness such as failure or abandonment.
Homigot's morning dawn
But tails are very important to animals. Especially for predators of carnivores, the tail is directly linked to survival. When hunting, the tail turns and balances. The tiger runs with the power of the tail, and conducts the flock with the tail. This is why the tiger tail is regarded as a symbol of national fortune and national security. Homigot New Year's first sunrise, which will be comforting and hopeful for everyone, is more meaningful.
Sculpture representing the Korean Peninsula in the form of a tiger
The sunrise spot of Pohang is by far the Homigot Sunrise Square. The New Millennium Memorial Hall, the Korea Tourism Luxury Museum, and the Yeon Orang Seon Statue were built around the square.
Win-Win Hand Golden Sun Rising Through Fingers
The win-win hand, the symbol of the Homigot Sunrise Square, is the two hands on the sea and land facing the palms.
Foreign tourists enjoy watching sunrise at Cape Homi
In front of the left hand on the ground is a torch and a thousand-year-old pupil. The embers in the eyes of the millennium are kept in the 'Eternal Embers', which combines the last 20th century embers cultivated on the Byeonsan Peninsula, the embers of the earth cultivated in Fiji South Pacific, the Zhuhai Sea embers cultivated in Dokdo, and the beginnings of the new millenniums cultivated at Homigot. It is.
Win-win hands and eyes of a thousand years
On December 31, at the sunrise, Haeoreum Busking Festival, Changhyeon Street Karaoke <Homi Hen>, Madang Play <Homi Cape Hyo Woman Shim Cheong Jeon>, 퐝! 퐝! Various programs are held, including the fireworks festival and Daewol Hanmadang. Additional events such as Homie Freemarket and Homie Visible Radio are also held.
Yeon-ang Rang O
The Sunrise Hope Radio, 70th Anniversary! There will be a painting of North Korea and a performance of <The Year of Visit to Pohang>. In addition, `` Feast of rice cake soup is a pig '' event, which is made with rice cake soup in the largest pot in Korea and shares the first meal of the new year, is also held. The 2019 Homigot New Year sunrise is 7:33.
Yeongildae Beach, a night view spot in Pohang
Many things to see and do around Cape Homi
If you have been deeply impressed by the sunrise of Homigot Sunrise Square, it is time to look around. The first place to visit is the National Lighthouse Museum. Located at Homigot Sunrise Square, the National Lighthouse Museum is Korea's only lighthouse museum. The National Lighthouse Museum provides a variety of information about the lighthouse, including the history of the lighthouse, including Korea, as well as the types and principles of the lighthouse.
Homigot Lighthouse, the tallest in Korea
There are many interesting exhibits, such as a diorama, which reproduces the life of the lighthouse keeper called the lighthouse keeper, and the experience of making Morse code using a touch screen. It is also interesting to look at the history and history of Korea's lighthouse. Korea's first lighthouse is Palmido Lighthouse in Palmido, Incheon. The Homigot Lighthouse, which can be found at the National Lighthouse Museum, is the tallest lighthouse in Korea.
National Lighthouse Museum is Korea's only lighthouse museum
Don't miss the Millennium Memorial Hall, which embodies the round sun. The Millennium Memorial Hall is an exhibition center where visitors can meet Pohang's geographic characteristics, history, and future vision with various panels and dioramas, and about 2,000 rare marine life fossils, including the world's first photosynthetic organism, stromatolite and fossil fossils. There is a museum and the Korea Seokpo Pohang Museum where 300 rare heads are gathered together.
Homigot Sunrise Square from the roof of the Millennium Memorial Hall
Climb up to the rooftop observatory on the 3rd floor and you'll see Homigot Square and the blue East Sea.
Ammonite fossils displayed at the Marine Natural History Museum
Pohang's best gourmet in winter
Guryongpo, about 10 km from Cape Homi, is home to Guamegi. When talking about Pohang's winter, Guamegi does not fall with the sunrise. Guamegi originated from shrubs that were herringed through her eyes and is now in season. It's a bit weird to eat lettuce and seaweed, and it's a bit grotesque to eat with chopped guamegi and chopped green onions. The texture is chewy and chewy. If you are a liquor lover, you can have a cup of Pohang's representative makgeolli, “Young-ilman Friends,” made with Pohang rice and rice cakes. Darakbang, Guamegi Restaurant, located in Yanghakcheon-ro, Buk-gu, Pohang-si, is famous for aging over 10 months.
Guamegi is full of luster now.
If you enjoyed the taste of savory guamegi, it's time to learn about it. As Gumaegi's hometown, there is Guamegi Cultural Center in Guryongpo. The official name is 'Pohang Guryongpo Guamegi Cultural Center'. Guamegi Cultural Center is located in the back of Kowloon Park, where Kowloon Pohang is located, and was opened in May 2016. The four-story cultural hall includes the Guamegi Research Center, a public relations hall, an ocean experience center, and an ocean hall.
Pohang Guryongpo Guamegi Cultural Center
The origin and efficacy of Guamegi are also reproduced, as well as the famous Guryongpo fishing village houses and the famous saury fishing boat built in 1945. Touch pool where you can touch fish such as willowfish and albino trout, and VR video experience space that virtually experiences the Arctic is popular with children.
Exhibition of drying Guamegi

item.title: When darkness falls, Santa appears! Qingdao provence photoland - Cheongdo-gun, Gyeongbuk, South Korea
item.description:
Snowman in Qingdao Provence

When darkness falls, Santa appears! Qingdao provence photoland

Cheongdo-gun, Gyeongbuk, South Korea

The end of the year, when the carols rang around. Does your heart flutter in the dark? Is there a child who can't sleep because he wants to meet Santa? Then this year-end destination is right here. Let's go to Qingdao Provence, a place filled with beautiful lights.
Romantic love story told by light
If the sun is falling, tell them to shout out together, and the countdown will begin. When we shout '5, 4, 3, 2, 1' together, the world before our eyes transforms into another romantic world.
Beautiful romantic tunnel, Rain Road
It is the largest light theme park in Korea, Qingdao Provence Photoland (hereinafter referred to as Qingdao Provence), where the whole village is dyed by 10 million colorful lights.
A feast of beautiful lights just by looking
Provence, southeastern France, famous for a town loved by world-famous artists such as Gogh, Cezanne and Chagall. A place full of idyllic abundance for growing grapes and raising sheep in the warm sunshine. Qingdao Provence captures the romanticism of southern France, which is so familiar to us that the 'Provencal interior' is so popular.
A feast of beautiful lights just by looking
If you want to enjoy Qingdao Provence properly, visit the afternoon before sunset. Camera is a necessity here! Like Photoland, more than 100 different photo zones welcome visitors.
A picture of a sweetheart taking pictures
There are also sledding slopes and simple rides that run all four seasons.
Sledding all year round
Real beauty begins when the ground spider falls. When the small bulbs start to shine in different colors with the countdown, the shutter is continually pressed.
Romantic Qingdao Provence
In particular, as the darkness grows deeper, such as Love Road, Cupid Road, and Proposal Road, the colorful tunnel of light is like a holy place for lovers. Visiting with your family is perfect.
Feast of Colorful Lights
In the Forest of Lights, where cute feasts of animals and feasts of animals made of light unfold, as if from a fairy tale, children fall into a fascinating conscience without forgetting the cold.
Feast of Colorful Lights
Rovaniemi Santa Village in Qingdao
Santa, a big fan of children all over the world. Rovaniemi Santa Village in Finland is a place where even adults dream. To. Anywhere in the world. If you write a letter with Santa Clous, you will go to Rovaniemi. The rumor that "Santa lives in Rovaniemi's town of Corvatun Turer" spread on a Finnish radio came true to the children and became one of the must-visit places for Christmas.
Welcome Santa Grandpa
But instead of Finland, you can dream of Qingdao Provence this winter. The light festival changed once again for Christmas.
I'm excited about Santa and my kids taking pictures
Santa, who reads books, Santa who carries gifts, and Santa who skis, waits for the children in the light with Rudolph's sleigh, and the sparkling tree keeps everyone excited. Snowman standing up here and there is no excitement even if it doesn't snow.
Santa prepares sweet cake as a gift
Not only that. A variety of paid experience halls, such as “Tale of Luminous Fish,” which decorates the unknown with the night sky, and the thrilling ghost trains that make you scream and sit down with mirror images that are hard to break out when you enter, present conscience for not only children but also adults.
Mysterious Undersea World Shining with Glow
Qingdao Provence is new in winter. If you haven't decided on a year-end trip yet, let's go out to enjoy the romance of night, as the darker it adds to the mysterious experience in fantastic light.
Spooky Ghost Train
Travel info

item.title: Suncheon's young taste, youth warehouse - Suncheon, Jeonnam, Korea
item.description:
People spending time in youth warehouse

Suncheon's young taste, youth warehouse

Suncheon, Jeonnam, Korea

Suncheon is a garden city with beautiful wetlands and reed fields. Recently, young people who visited this place have become more frequent. From the old granary warehouse transformed into a youth store to the original city that took the lead in local culture and art. Spent a young day in the city flowing backwards.
Treasure warehouse containing dreams of youth
10 minutes walk from Suncheon Station. There is a youth warehouse that leads to a hot place near the Chogok-dong Nonghyup. Traces of time are felt at once on the dark outer wall. This is a complex cultural space that remodeled the grain warehouse built in the Japanese colonial period as a founding place for young people.
A view of the youth warehouse remodeling an old grain storage warehouse
As of mid-July 2018, 14 restaurants (private establishments) and 1 liquor store (co-operational establishments) are on the first floor, and six workshops including paper crafts, ceramics and candle crafts are on the second floor.
Movable table can be taken anywhere with stepped seats
Invited performances such as youth festivals, failure studies concerts, and YOLI busking festivals were also held. It is a place with food, entertainment and entertainment in a single space.
Couple Eating Beer and Fried Rice
The bosses are young people aged 19 to 39.
Inside the youth warehouse
All gathered here to sell the idea of popping youth into the fabric.
The restaurant is rounded around the terraced seats.
The contract period with Suncheon is up to 2 years. During this period, low rents and three months of exemption from electricity, water and gas costs are provided.
Inside the youth warehouse
As the burden on initial capital is low and peers gather to sell, it has a positive effect of exchanging opinions and utilizing business experience.
There is a separate experience room in the studio on the second floor.
Individuality young taste ’s
There are a total of 15 food store shops in the youth warehouse, none of which overlap.
Youth Warehouse Stores
All stores are loved evenly, so you can exercise your free will according to your taste. Once, I went round the warehouse and quickly scanned for the menu.
Youth Warehouse Stores
Shrimp boxes, meat bibimbap, homemade burgers, yaki curry, and octopus rice bowls are full of mouthwatering food.
Youth Warehouse Stores
First of all, I stopped in front of today's Tokatatsu. Although ramen is the main menu, only 15 bowls a day were sold at Sake-dong. The boss cut the thick raw salmon thick at the same time as the order. Even if the fish is large enough to wrap around the cutlery, it will be eaten in more than 10 pieces. The boss, 31, said he had never touched salmon before. When asked how he thought of the challenge, the answer came back, "I like salmon." The taste is as it looks. The fresh raw salmon fillets with sweet crispy onions and crispy rice. Even if you eat a lot of spicy raw wasabi will not eat the thick salmon to eat until the end.
Fresh salmon flavored sake dong
The visuals of the cloud-like visuals were impressive. Domestic sirloin was kneaded round with glutinous rice flour and fried. The sauce is added to your liking. Fruit sauces like grapefruit and citron and spicy Sichuan sauce are available. If you want to taste evenly one by one, you can order additional sauce and pay more.
Dongle dongle cute cloud sweet and sour pork
Was the pure heart of twenty-eight young men who returned to Suncheon after learning Chinese food in Gyeonggi-do? Even without sauce, sweet and sour pork has a pure and clean taste. It's also a good idea to feel the harmony of soft and light meat and chewy tempura.
The grapefruit is put in the sauce.
In 'city fish cake', there are many dishes that can be eaten one by one, such as shrimp fish cake, cheese fish cake, red pepper fish cake, and octopus skewer balls. Cheese sticks, which are especially popular among women, are plunged into the barrel to create a salty and savory flavor. Pepper paste contains minced meat with whole peppers. It's just one spicy flavor that adds a totally different taste. All menus are made in-store and fried so you can trust them. The fish cake gimbap wrapped in the surface of kim rice with fish cake was not sold because it was sold out early.
Spicy chili paste with whole red pepper
For dessert, I chose Eclairs of Bianvenue. The main menu is Mont Blanc, which has a strong night taste. Moist and soft night cream is filled with pastry.
Soft and sweet clair
It melts and disappears in your mouth without having to chew a few times. It's not too sweet so you can eat 2-3 pieces. In addition to Mont Blanc, raspberry, vanilla, oreo, tiramisu and other menus are various, so I recommend you to have a bite with your friends.
Suncheon's young taste
The only self-designed mug in the world
After filling the boat, I went to visit the studio on the second floor. The cute props are on display in the studio, so your eyes are fun. It is a good idea to make a reservation if you are visiting for an experience.
I have drawn Yumi, the main character of Naver Webtoon 'Yumi's Cells'. indeed?
Since the workshops of craft artists are outside the youth warehouse, they are often left out of business when making products or having business meetings. On this day, the owner of the pottery workshop, the workshop and workshop for pottery, stayed in place. Representative experience is making warrior mugs.
Yumi mug making process
You can make your own cup in the world by drawing it with colored pencils on a transfer sheet and putting it on a mug and baking it at a high temperature of 350 degrees. The advantage is that the experience time is short, and the result can be taken today.
Yumi mug making process
Art wind blowing in the city center-incense walk
The remaining half day decided to take a walk in Hyang-dong, the original city. Unlike Suncheon Station, where many apartments were seen, it is a friendly atmosphere with a low slate roof and narrow alleys. Hyanggyo, the oldest bakery in Suncheon, has a 200-year history. I seem to be clichéd here to witness Hyangdong's rejuvenation.
Information Center, Heath Shelter, Art Exhibition
Hyang-dong was located in the ruins of Suncheon Bueupseong for 700 years and enjoyed revival for a long time. Then, as part of the urban regeneration project, the streets of culture, gardens, and alleys for 700 years have been established. The village became clearer and the floating population increased noticeably.
Preface Information Center
The beginning of the walk is the preface information office. You can get a map of the town or ask for a comment. Based on the West Gate Information Center, there are numerous studios and art spaces such as Garden Street, 700-year-old Alley Street, Gong-madang Dulle, and Changan Creative Madang to the south, and Eco-Gio Village to the north.
Old new, strangely used incense
It may seem complicated, but it's close enough that you can explore it all within an hour on foot except for the Gongmadang perimeter.
Old new, strangely used incense
Navigate the familiar alleyways as if you are unfamiliar with the hidden story of Suncheon. Changan Creative Madang, which has a strong presence throughout the streets of culture, is an art village and restaurant open to everyone in the village. It is characterized by receiving rent or program participation fee as food, which is stored in shared refrigerators and used by people who need it.
Ecoji Village's unique landscape
Eco-Geo Village, in keeping with its name, practices eco-friendliness for each house. To build a garden or install a solar generator. The path has a rainwater reservoir that can store rainwater and use it like tap water.
Ecoji Village's unique landscape
The 700-year-old alley is literally a 700-year-old alleyway. The road that was used since Suncheon was called Suncheonbu still remains. As the road is paved with yellow soil during the urban regeneration project, it is easy to distinguish it from the new road.
Ecoji Village's unique landscape
Gongmadang Dulle-gil is a place where you can enjoy drawing a cute mural on the mountain trail that has been used by residents for a long time. After the walk, why don't you enjoy your meal and tea at Cheongsujeong, located at the entrance of the entrance? Cheongsujeong is a social enterprise run by the members of the village cooperative and supported by Suncheon.
700-year alley paved with ocher
Seniors cook their own meals using locally grown vegetables and fresh local produce. It is popular with tourists as well as villagers because it can taste warm house food without chemical seasoning at an affordable price. There are interesting rumors that the staff's hospitality for grandchildren is so generous that there is a lack of city funding. Meals are from 11am to 2pm, and the price of one house rice is 6,000 won.
Hyangdong's specialty Cheongsujeong

※ The above information was written in July 2018 and may change afterwards, so please check before you travel.

item.title: Bang Tae-san Natural Recreation Forest - Inje-gun, Gangwon, South Korea
item.description:
Fall of Bangtae Mountain

Bang Tae-san Natural Recreation Forest

Inje-gun, Gangwon, South Korea

Bang Tae-san is a natural beauty when hit by humans. Often, when you meet a beauty, you can't even know 'wow' and admiration comes out. This is the case with Bang Tae-san. My heart beats up and down the moment I see it. If you ask for a night in the backcountry landscape, you will dream of autumn leaves.
Two-stage waterfall and autumnal world
The road to see the beauty is long and rough. After exiting the expressway from Donghongcheon IC, the remaining distance for navigation is 61km. The vagueness that there is a place where you have to run an hour and a half after getting off the expressway in the times when the highway stretches up and down for a while, grabs the handle and enjoys the excitement toward the back country. The closer you get to Mt. Taetae, the farther it is from the expressway. On the side of the winding road, the descending river and Bangdong Valley spread out the pristine landscape. While immersed in the scenery, we arrive at Bangtaesan Natural Recreation Forest ticket office without any boredom.
The maple leaves greet you first
Did you say 'land from heaven, Inje'? On the way to the campsite past the ticket booth, people who are so close to this beautiful landscape begin to spring. The foliage is lined up on both sides of the street to welcome.
Valley colored with autumn leaves
At the ticket booth, you'll be welcomed by the maple trees. It is the most beloved place in Bangtaesan Natural Recreation Forest. In particular, in autumn, the heresy falls to the point of performing orchestras. The main character on the stage decorated with colorful autumn leaves is a waterfall that falls to heresy. In front of the stage is a crowd of clouds. He constantly presses the camera shutter toward the main character who unfolds a white thread in heresy. Similar to the airport where the idol star appeared.
Ethanol Falls, a trademark of Bangtaesan Natural Recreation Forest
A waterfall of 10m and 3m high water falls into heresy and the collaborative performance of the maple forest that surrounds it are the works of the gods that fascinate. Wash away the old thoughts fluttering in the sound of the cool water and be a romantic lover of the pieces of autumn leaves.
Falls and Falls
Even if you're not a photographer, you can put a picture of a two-level waterfall with autumn leaves in your chest.
Scenery to put in the chest
Go a little further past the campsite from heresy falls to the forest exploration trail. The Forest Experience Trail, which starts from the parking lot above the 2nd Campsite, is a promenade that allows you to appreciate the unexplored mountains of Bangtae Mountain. It's only 2km away, so a slow pace of 1 hour is enough. But it's not just an hour. It is an hour to admire interjection all along the walk.
Forest Experience Trail with Foliage Tunnels
Autumn in Jeokgargol is the world of autumn leaves. The first step on the promenade makes you feel as if you are in a different world. It is a waste to walk the scenery where the pure valley like the ancient times is colored with red leaves. Even if you walk slowly, you want to walk more slowly.
1 hour of autumn leaves along the forest trail
If you like to hike, you can walk all the way to the sum peak. The hiking trail that leads to Maebong-ryeong, Guryongdeok-bong, and Jueumbong-bong takes 10.2km and takes about 6 hours.
Visitors who can't leave their enemies
Join the forest commentary at 10 am every day to get closer to nature. At 2 pm, there will be a woodworking experience to make pencil holders and key chains.
Forest Commentary and Woodworking Experience
Holy Land of Camping in Autumn
For those who enjoy camping, spending a night at Bangtaesan Natural Recreation Forest with beautiful autumn leaves is a wish that you want to achieve once. The campsite sits in a maple forest next to the valley, so where is the better place? It is the land of Bae-pung-byeong, which is comparable to the name of Baesan-byeong. When you open the tent door, clear water flows through the pristine valley, and as you look up, the forest of burning autumn leaves spreads out.
Campsite for dream camping under the foliage forest
The camping site is divided into the first camping site across from the resort and the second camping site past the two-stage waterfall. There are a total of 50 decks, 10 at the 1st campsite and 40 at the 2nd campsite. The first campsite is better for relatively quiet camping. The second campsite is close to the two-tier waterfall and forest trail, which is good for walking around the autumn leaves.
Campground morning with colored leaves
The deck size is relatively small, 3.6m × 3.7m and 3.6m × 3.0m, so minimalist camping is suitable. There are three bathrooms and two kitchens, and one shower room is located at the second campsite. You can't park your car right next to the tent, but it's relatively close, so it's a good idea for auto camping. It is a pity that there is no hot water and electric facilities, but as it is a camping nearer to nature, it lasts for a long time. Warm sleeping bags are essential at this time of year when the temperature drops sharply.
Tents under the autumn leaves
There is a house in the forest and a forest culture and recreation center where you can enjoy a night in the autumn leaves without camping. In the forest house there is one 12 person room of 83m2, and the forest culture and recreation hall in the form of tenement houses has four 5 ~ 6 person rooms of 29㎡ and five 6 ~ 8 person rooms of 39㎡. There are small attic rooms for six to eight people who need to climb a ladder. Reservations can be made on the National Natural Recreation Forest website. However, Tuesday is closed.
Cooking at the campsite
If you had a honey-like night at Bangtaesan Recreation Forest, it's time to take a tour of the attractions of Inje. First of all, it is 5 minutes away. Because of its high carbonate content, sugar is famous for its delicious cider. Bear Beard, famous for its wildflowers, is 40 minutes away and Park In-hwan Literature Museum is an hour away. You can not miss the one-handed birch forest. The birch grove, called “Aristocracy of the Forest,” is an exotic landscape where visitors from all seasons line up.
Forest Culture Recreation Center
Travel info

Bangtaesan Natural Recreation Forest
Address: 241 Bangtaesan-gil, Girin-myeon, Inje-gun, Gangwon-do
Contact: 033-463-8590


1. Nearby restaurants

item.title: Chick chunky ~! Samcheok summer trip to train theme park, beautiful east coast scenery is a bonus! - Samcheok, Gangwon, South Korea
item.description:
High1 Chuchu Park Switchback Train <Photo courtesy of High1 Chuchu Park>

Chick chunky ~! Samcheok summer trip to train theme park, beautiful east coast scenery is a bonus!

Samcheok, Gangwon, South Korea

Summer wants to leave everyday. Gangwon-do, famous for its picturesque seascape, offers a unique train trip to Samcheok. The Swiss Mountain Train Incline, a switchback that has now disappeared into history, the mini train, a miniature train scaled down from the world's most famous trains, and one of the nation's fastest rail bikes. Chupark is the main character.
Samcheok High Wonchu Park (hereafter Chuchu Park) is located in the shed is closer to Taebaek than Samcheok. Therefore, to travel to Samcheok, including Chuchu Park must catch the line. This is true even if you stay at Chuchu Park.
Incline train to experience the Swiss Jungfrau mountain train
If you visit Samcheok during the vacation season, how about adding some time to cool down while looking at the cool East Sea. Let's add Haesindang Park, Madam Hunhwa Park, and Samcheok Sol Beach Aqua World around Chuchu Park.
It is made on the section of the railway and takes you to Sky Station
From the Swiss mountain trains to the switchback train of memories, High Cone Chu Park
Chuchu Station welcomes you when you reach Korea's first train theme park or Chuchu Park. Let's take a look at the four trains (incline, rail coaster, mini train and switchback) you can experience here. It also has cozy accommodation, so travelers with children can enjoy it.
Swiss mountain train, Incline train <Photo courtesy of High1 Chuchu Park>
The Swiss mountain train Incline train is the first thing that catches your eye. It is the only Swiss-style mountain train in Korea that rebuilds the railway that was demolished in 1963 and climbs up and down an altitude of 200m and over 15 degrees. Steel Railroad is a railway made in 1993 to overcome the altitude difference between Samcheok Symphony and Taebaek Tongli. The 15.6-degree sloping track made of the altitude difference pulled up the train. To put it simply, think of a steep uphill train. People walked around.
Tongli Station
The incline train at High Cone Chuchu Park was reconstructed from a section of the railway that was demolished in 1963. 10 minutes up the incline train to reach the Skystation at an altitude of 720 meters. He hears the wind blowing from Baekdudaegan from the observatory and comes back to Chuchu Station. You have to take a shuttle bus to take the rail coaster.
Rail coaster between Chuchu Station and Tongli Station
Rail Coaster. It's a common rail bike we go down the hill at 25km per hour. Unlike other rail bikes, the rail coaster runs down the 12 tunnels, so you only need to pedal for the first few minutes and the brakes are good for the rest. Although rattling, it's a relatively comfortable rail bike with legs and mind. In addition to the switchback, reservations must be made for popular trains at High One Chuchu Park.
High1 Chuchu Park base camp, Chuchu Station panoramic view
The following is a miniature train and mini train made by miniature foreign trains. As its name suggests, it's small and mesmerizing.
Popular among children, minitrain
Slowly run around Chuchu Station for 10-15 minutes at 3km per hour. After you experience the mini train, don't forget to take photos in the photo zone.
Popular among children, minitrain
Finally switchback train. It is a railroad made of “Galji” in order to operate a train on a sloped mountain range. I went forward, went back and climbed the mountain. It takes about 100 minutes from Chuchu Station to Dogye Station. Switchback trains are also popular and reservations are a must.
Tracks on the train switchback train going back
There are 4 types of lodgings in Hiwonchu Park where you can experience 4 types of trains. Natureville is a single villa, Cubeville with grass on the roof, Trainville with train, and auto camping ground. Natureville and Cubeville are family units, and Trainville is for two people. The price is quite high, but it can be used at relatively low prices in social, except for the polar season. Food and drinks are sold next to Chuchu Station. During peak season and weekend evenings, there is a barbecue party at Chuchu Station.
100-minute round-trip switchback train
Samcheok's shores at a glance
Now it's time to feel Samcheok's sea. Let's start from Hunhwa Park, the southernmost part of the Samcheok coast. It is at the end of the executive port which is highly recommended for those who want to eat thick sashimi in Samcheok.
Ascending the promenade, you can see Chuam Candlestick Rock.
The waterway wife Hunhwa Park, as the name suggests, tells the story of the waterway wife in <Hunhwaga> and the dragon in <Seascape>. The park is reborn with a sultry tale that is so dark that an old man picks flowers on a cliff.
Statue of Mrs. Hunhwa Park
The elevator goes up to the beginning of the park. It is better to avoid the day when it is too bright because you have to walk out of the elevator. The majestic gynecologic dragon sculpture with the backdrop of the sea is magnificent.
Panoramic view of Mrs. Hunhwa Park
Haesindang Park, which is similar to the Hunhwa Park, is also a must-see. It is an interesting place where you can get a glimpse of the idea of phallic worship, which has a legend that appeases the maiden who died in the sea waiting for a bachelor who promised marriage. The penis is located here and there in the sea, and it just laughs because it's not dismal and decadent. Use the sense of adding or subtracting according to the travel companion or the nature of the trip.
Jangho Port is the first to come to Samcheok's beautiful coast
If you're traveling by young couples or families who want to be active, marine rail bikes to and from Gungchon Station and Yonghwa Station located in the middle of Samcheok coast are fine. It operates 5 times a day from Gungchon Station (09:00, 10:30, 13:00, 14:30, 16:00) and 10 minutes from Yonghwa Station. The rail bike is a one-way shuttle bus, not a round trip. It operates at night (17:30) during peak season, weekends and holidays.
Marine Rail Bike between Gungchon Station and Yonghwa Station
If you go further north, Samcheok is a newly opened Daemyung Resort last year. The blue-roofed building is located on the waterfront, creating an exotic landscape like Santorini. It also has a state-of-the-art water park and Aqua World. Not far from here, the Chuam Candlestick Rock unfolds behind the deck connecting Samcheok and the East Sea.
Samcheok Sol Beach Aqua World
TIP. Samcheok High1 Chuchu Park
Address: 99 Simponam-gil, Dogye-eup, Samcheok-si, Gangwon-do
Contact: 033-550-7788
Fee for the experience facility: Rail Coaster 4 passengers 35,000 won, 2 passengers 28,000 won, mini train 4,000 won. 10,000 won round trip for switchback train

item.title: What if you are worried about where to go? Let's go to Gyeonggi Northern Three Musketeers! - Republic of Korea
item.description:
What if you are worried about where to go? Let's go to Gyeonggi Northern Three Musketeers!

Republic of Korea

'Where should we go again this year?' As soon as I leave the house, I am afraid of the traffic jam, but the innocent eyes of the children who want to enjoy the blue sky of May are very eager. If you are burdened with crowds of famous places and are tired of similar events, let's take a look at children's attractions in northern Gyeonggi-do with relatively few people, new sights and various experience facilities.
Amazing Park, located at the foot of Suwibong Peak, Pocheon-si, Gyeonggi-do, is a complex cultural space of nature + science + relaxation. It is a science playground where you can see, touch, feel and explore the principles of science. The first welcoming spectator on a winding mountain trail is the `` Suspension Bridge '', which is 130 meters in Nature Zone. This arched wag that connects the forest of healing across the valley offers an experience of walking in the sky.
At Science Zone's Amazing Park Science Museum, students learn science and engineering knowledge by moving around 200 engineering instruments. The Amazing Swing, a large swing that moves between more than 100 streams falling from a height of 4.5 meters, is the most popular item in the museum. It is a ride that can be safely enjoyed by both men and women of all ages.
Outside the science hall, the slopes include the Solar System, which rotates a large watermill, and a 23-meter Giant Fountain, where giant cog wheels engage, starting with a rotating table that spins round the water. With the recently installed house line, you can have all this under your feet and enjoy the thrill of flying.
The Northern Children's Museum in Gyeonggi-do, Pocheon and neighboring Dongducheon, opened in May 2016. Located at the foot of Soyosan Mountain, we are running a program to foster children's creativity and emotion with the motto of “dreaming children in the forest.”
The first floor is a dinosaur zone that every child likes. You can experience various dinosaurs in various ways, including fossils, models, and screens. Climber zones climb the giant herbivorous dinosaur Brachiosaurus and are always a popular course for children to line up.
On the 2nd floor, there is a forest ecosystem zone for exploring deep forests, a water zone for adventures of water droplets, and an architecture zone for exploring the homes of animals in nature. In mid-June, the floor fountain rises in the front yard of the pavilion, and a full-scale water park opens in the back garden.
Yangju City Hwangsaji Temple Museum in Yangju City was the main headquarters of Korean temples in the late Goryeo Dynasty. It is a specialized museum built to store, research, exhibit and educate the next generation. The shady temple, which is still under excavation, is not only huge but also characterized by palace-like buildings and architecture.
In the exhibition room, you can see the dragon gate black and white, which was used only in the palace, and the royal ceramics along with the sloppy.
The title of the special exhibition, which will continue until July 1, is <Back of Da-ram, 厠>. The discovery of the country's largest back ground (toilet and side) at the slate rock reexamines the eating habits and culture of the old man. Outside the museum, there are plenty of lawns, benches to relax, and tents.

Travel info

http://childmus.ddc.go.kr/

item.title: 2018 Pyeongchang Tourist Road 07, an expedition into pristine nature - Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon, South Korea
item.description:
Eomchi Village

2018 Pyeongchang Tourist Road 07, an expedition into pristine nature

Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon, South Korea

<Travel Course>
Eulchima Village and Pyeongchang-dong River Freshwater Fish Ecological Center

→ Baengryong Cave → Donggang Rafting → Byeolmaro Astronomical Observatory

The journey to meet primitive nature runs from Dongtan to Pyeongchang-gun from Mitan-myeon, Pyeongchang-gun, which is also considered a remote place in Gangwon-do. The enormous nature created by nature and refined by time impresses us infinitely. The wonders felt in Baekryong Cave, and the achievements of tasting through rough waters in the Donggang, are all gifts from nature. Many stars, filled with the night sky as if it's going to pour, give a little bit of excitement and present a precious time to look back on themselves.
Mittan-myeon, Pyeongchang-gun is one of the most remote areas in Gangwon-do There is a village where you can meet 20 minutes by car. The name is also a beautiful village. Pyeongchang-dong River Freshwater Fish Ecological Center is located at the beginning of Eulchi village, which is famous for ecotourism. When you enter the ecological hall, a cave model that is modeled after Baekryong Cave welcomes travelers. It is a space where you can meet the contents of the White Dragon Cave through sound and visual exhibits.
The Freshwater Fish Nature Museum, which exhibits freshwater fish in the East River, is the core space of the Pyeongchang-dong Freshwater Fish Ecological Center. There are 46 kinds of freshwater fish such as eojichi, oxeye and gorge. The catfish, which hides a huge body of 1.2m in the gap between the rocks, is a place for freshwater fish.
Pyeongchang-dong River Freshwater Fish Ecological Center
If the exhibition hall on the first floor is a viewing space, the second floor exhibition hall consisting of a fish exploration hall and a Donggang experience hall is a space for experience. Watching the live-action video on the big screen, the rafting experience over the rugged waters of the river is as thrilling as riding a roller coaster. You can catch fish with your bare hands at the outdoor experience hall connected to the exhibition hall on the second floor. After looking around the ecology hall, you can try various sports such as rafting, kayaking, skyline, sky jumping, etc.
1.2m long native catfish
White Dragon Cave (Natural Monument No. 260) was opened to the public as it was designated as an ecological learning cave in 2010. It has been 30 years since it was known to the world by villagers in 1976. Baekryong Cave has become the representative ecotourism destination of Pyeongchang, which is visited by 10,000 people every year within 6 years of cave opening.
Take a boat to the entrance to Baeryong Cave
Baekryong Cave visit begins with a change of clothes. If you bring your helmet, head lantern, gloves and boots, you're ready to visit. The reason why you need a visitor's suit is found in the cave. Go to the cave entrance by boat. The distance that once had to walk 40 minutes along the iron railings has been reduced to 10 minutes. The huge rock that meets the cave entrance is Ondol. Even after more than 1700 years, there are still traces of fire burned in the firewood under the ondol.
White Dragon Cave Entrance
The trail is rougher than I thought. In a lightless cave, the head lantern on the helmet is the only guide. Narrow trails are also embarrassing. Hitting the head against the ceiling because the sight of the helmet is obscured, there are several sections where you can keep walking by bending your waist 90 degrees to the suddenly lowered ceiling.
Ondol trail remaining at the entrance of Baekyong Cave
There is a section where the hips are attached to the ground and slide down, while there is a 'dog hole' that can be difficult to pass by waiting on the floor.
Some sections are narrow enough to crawl in
Only after exploring more than exploration did the white dragon cave reveal its deep inside. Stylized stalactites suspended from the ceiling like icicles, staggering towering stalagmites, and giant stalagmites where stalactites and stalagmites meet. The strange shape of the cave retains its original beauty. Pride egg-shaped stalagmite, which can be used as a camera lens if processed well, is the best among them. When you reach the end of the cave, you'll be able to turn off all the lights and have a special experience facing the dark.
Stalactites decorating the cave wall
The publicly-disclosed section of Baekyong Cave, which stretches for 1.8km, is A course 785m away. It takes about 2 hours and 40 minutes to visit the cave with a guide from the reservation and the number of visitors is limited to 240 people per day.
You can observe various stalagmite stalactites in Baekyong Cave.
Children under 9 years old and elderly people over 65 are not allowed to visit for safety reasons.
Stalactite in the form of a pipe organ
If you follow the Donggang River from Baekyong Cave, it leads to Yeongwol. In summer, Donggang is a rafting paradise. The representative rafting course is 12km from Munsan Naruter to Subsenaruter. It is the best course where you can enjoy thrill and pleasure at the same time as the rapids and the smooth water are mixed. Good luck in facing hidden secrets of Donggang, including Eorayeon, is a bonus. Eorayeon, one of Yeongwol 8 sights, is also the 14th scenic spot.
Donggang Rafting
The start of rafting is safety education. Over 30 minutes, you will learn how to use your paddle and learn how to handle emergencies. It is also important to get acquainted with water. 'Unification of spirit' 'We are one' is the best way to get acquainted with water to remind us of military training. Both the security guards who give up the spirit and the experienced visitors who receive the spirit are both happy and playful. One person is aboard the boat in response to the safety signals. The front of the boat is the strongest member of the team, and the back is the safety guard.
Warm-up exercises are essential before you start rafting
one two! one two! The success of rafting is in unity. All the passengers must paddle like a body in line with the command so that the boat will go in the desired direction. In the East River, where the rapids and the level are often reversed, you can't relax even for a while.
Enjoy the scenery of the east river effortlessly
The rush of water that has been driving roughly becomes mild as it passes by. Now, it is time to experience the highlight of Yeongwol rafting, Donggang Falls, which we only heard in words. Donggang Falls, as its name suggests, is a special event that jumps from boat to Donggang. If you dare to throw a boat or a river from the rock, the summer heat is already receding.
It's even more fun to meet the torrents
Once you enter Yeongwol along the Donggang River, it is time to finish the day. There is no place like Yeongwol Byeolcho Observatory to organize a day spent in nature. It is the third oldest observatory in our country, equipped with an observation room, an auxiliary observation room, and an astronomical projection room. Astro observation is divided into day observation and night observation. Observing sunspots and redness of the sun during the day and the moon at night. Astrophysical observations follow the observation of the sun, moon and planets in the secondary observation room, followed by observations of nebulae and galaxies. The assistant observation room of Byeolmaro Astronomical Observatory is the best observatory that can not only observe the celestial bodies but also the city of Yeongwol and Donggang at a glance.
View from Byeolmaro Observatory
Solar observations use astronomical telescopes equipped with special filters and round iron plates looking at sunspots. Observation of the sun's redness through the telescope's finder and the sunspots attached are identified by images on a round iron plate. It is surprising that sunspots that are smaller than the clear dust on the iron plate are many times larger than the earth. The most common thing in night observations is the moon. Depending on the atmosphere, planets like Jupiter can be observed, but there are not many opportunities.
Byeolmaro Observatory Astronomical Projection Room
The astronomical projection room is a space where you can look again at the celestial body seen from the observation room. You can see the celestial bodies filled with dome screens, find seasonal constellations, and hear interesting stories about the Milky Way connecting the weaver and the friendly. How to find the North Star by the location of the Big Dipper is a bonus.
In the VR experience room on the 2nd floor of the observatory, you can experience the exhilarating experience as if you are actually paragliding through realistic VR images. In Byeolmaro Astronomical Observatory, two teams conduct astronomical observation five times a day from 3:30 pm to 30 minutes.
Byeolmaro Observatory VR Experience Room
Travel info

Recommended trip: family, friends

Festival and Event Information

-Pyeongchang Donggang Ecological Experience: August. A festival to enjoy in the beautiful nature of the village. Creative pansori, musical gala show, Madang play, trout manhandling experience, trekking electric bicycle. / 033-333-1260

-Pyeongchang heat hunting festival: July 28 ~ August 6, the summer festival unfolds in Daehwacheon sweat strip park. Daehwacheon Bandou experience, Daehwacheon torch experience, bare hand trout catching, musicals, folk performances, etc. / 033-334-2277

http://www.꿈의대화캠핑장.kr/


-Yeongwoldong River Festival: August 2 ~ 6, summer festival held in Yeongwol Donggang Dunchi. Blowing the wind, catching trout, rafting, paragliding, and rafting. / 033-375-6353

http://ywcf.or.kr/ywfestival.php


-Donggang International Photo Festival: July 14 ~ October 1, the International Photo Festival to see the flow of the world of photography at a glance. Donggang Photo Award Winners, Theme Exhibition, International Competition, Yeongwol Photo Tour, etc. / 033) 375-6353


traditional market
Pyeongchangbong Flat
A marketplace that opens at the buckwheat's local peak. You can taste buckwheat noodles such as buckwheat noodles, buckwheat pancake, buckwheat jelly, and buckwheat nabi bibimbap. There is a wide buckwheat flower garden nearby, and the water mill is a great place to enjoy a walk while enjoying the native mood.

It's hard to get a good job because of employment shortages, job insecurity, and marriage and childbirth. This is why voluntary, selective non-marriage is bound to increase. item.title: Run, South Island! Enjoy a day trip to Namdo - Damyang-gun, Jeonnam, Korea
item.description:
Suncheon Bay Reed Field

Run, South Island! Enjoy a day trip to Namdo

Damyang-gun, Jeonnam, Korea

A bus that travels around Jeonnam tourist spots, “Namdo One Wheel” was born. If you have a pass of 9,900 won per day, you can take a day trip to Damyang, Gokseong, Suncheon, Boseong, Jangheung, Naju, Gangjin, Haenam, Jangheung, Muan, Hampyeong, Yeonggwang, Mokpo, Sinan, Yeosu, and Jindo. have. You don't even have to drive yourself. Choose your preferred course, make your reservation, and head back to your starting point for a relaxing trip to the South Island. Feel free to take a day trip to Namdo and get on the bus.
Take a trip to Namdo! Invincible bus, Namdo One Wheel
The biggest reason for worrying about the trip to Namdo is the streets and traffic routes. Because of the relatively long distances, our journey to Namdo is once again considered. Also, since I went down to Iwang Namdo, would I not be filled with the desire to see things here and there? But unless you're a self-driving driver, there's too much information to be aware of in order to enjoy your trip across the region. You too far to be close, Namdo! There is a way to solve the worries about traveling to South Korea like a mirage! The main character is 'Jeonnam Tourist Bus, Namdo One Wheel'.
`` Namdo One Wheel '' Suncheon 2-course Bus from Suncheon Terminal
Before we start, let's take a look at the flesh of the “South Road.” To put it simply, a single 9900 won bus ticket for Namdo is a day trip to see Namdo's precious space. Oh, once you get the price and space. What is the course? Where can I make a reservation?
Brief description of the bus driver
8 courses, mostly from Gwangju
First, there are eight courses. Looking around Damyang and Gokseong Gwangju 1 Course In conjunction with Suncheon, Boseong and Jangheung Suncheon 2 Course Except for all weekends. Gwangju 1 Course 와 Suncheon 2 Course Operates daily except Monday. Connecting Naju, Gangjin, Haenam, Jangheung Gwangju 3 Course Connecting Suncheon, Boseong, Hwasun Gwangju 4 Course Touring Muan, Hampyeong, and Glory Gwangju 5 Courses , Connecting Mokpo and Sinan Mokpo 6 Course Operates every weekend. Here is not the end. Of the popular score that runs for 2-4 weeks Saturday Yeosu 7 Courses Day trip to Yeosu Geumodo 8, 9 Course is indispensable, too.

How to buy bus tickets

http://www.kumhoaround.com/Home/Namdo/Tour.aspx

Departure terminal ticket office, bus ride homepage

http://www.bustago.or.kr/newweb/kr/index.do

Is possible. You can ride on-site during the off-season, but it is full during the peak season, so be sure to buy it in advance. In particular, Yeosu 7 course (25,000 won, which includes a bus ticket to Geumdo Island) is very popular. Bus seats are also available. When purchased on-site, you are free to sit on a first-come, first-served basis for the remaining seats.

Freely look around and gather by bus
If you booked in advance, you will be shown the text and boarding. Admission to tourist attractions is discounted if you have a ticket to Namdo. Pets are not allowed, and personal expenses such as food and entrance fees are not included. You will be informed of the time to return for each sightseeing spot included in the course, and you will be free to visit by then. Along with the cultural commentator who accompanied you on the bus, you can make a better trip. Since you are traveling to a group, you can travel the way you want if you keep the time you meet.
Admission to sightseeing spots is discounted with just one bus ticket
Suncheon 2-course experience connecting Suncheon, Boseong, Jangheung
Now, I decided to experience 'Namdo One Wheel'. I chose Suncheon 2 course that goes around Suncheon, Boseong, and Jangheung out of Gwangju 1 course and Suncheon 2 course that operate every day except Monday. Departs from Suncheon Terminal at 10 am and stops at Suncheon Station (KTX) at 10:10 to start a full-scale journey.
Pleasure boat to travel Suncheon Bay Eco Park by water
The course consists of Suncheon Bay Reed Field, Nak-An Eupseong, Root Museum, Boseong Green Tea Field, and Jangheung Woodland. Stay around 1-2 hours at each destination. After all trips, get off at Suncheon Station and Suncheon Terminal. This means that you can fully enjoy your trip to South Korea by public transport. If you want to stay for another day, you can either stay near the station or go to Gwangju, where most of the Namdo buses depart. All courses except Suncheon 2 course depart from Gwangju. If you take Gwangju as a base camp, you will be able to enjoy abundant travel in Namdo using 'Hando'.
Blue Waves in Suncheon Bay Reed Fields Begin Summer
The explanation of the cultural interpreter continues on the moving bus. The road to Suncheon Bay Reed Field (Suncheon Bay Natural Ecological Park) and Suncheon Bay International Garden Expo, which opened in 2013, also pass by. If the flower is in full bloom, don't forget to stay for another day and visit. Arrive at Suncheon Bay Reed Field in time. It is the largest reed colony in Korea. Tidal flat friends such as chubby and chilge greet people down the promenade. I would like to go up to the Yongsan Observatory, but the time allowed is about 1 hour and 20 minutes. I listened to the explanations and took pictures and walked up. If you want to go to the Yongsan Observatory where you can see the huge S-line of Suncheon Bay, you have to climb diligently from the beginning. This is because there is not enough time to walk slowly while listening to the explanation.
Suncheon Bay Reed Field
The admission fee for Suncheon Bay Eco Park is 7,000 won. Each time you enter a tourist spot, you must buy a ticket. You can buy tickets at a discounted price by showing them the “Namdo One Wheel” pass.
Scenery on the way to Yongsan Observatory
Next is Nagan Eupseong. Naganan-eup, one of the top three cities in Korea, along with Seosan Haemi-eup and Gochang-eup, has been designated as a castle and village due to the preservation of the prototypes of the Joseon Dynasty, Dongheon, Cheongsa, and thatch. Many people still live in folk villages.
A panoramic view of the village from the top of Nakanupseong Gugakdang
Various traditional experiences such as weaving experience and dyeing experience are available.
Nagan-eup Fortress Weaving Experience
The admission fee is 4,000 won, and the circumference of Namdo is 3,000 won. Lunch here and depart for Boseong.
Nagan-eup Fortress Weaving Experience
Boseong green tea field. What more explanation is needed? There are many ways to see the green tea field, which is a representative tourist spot in Boseong.
Boseong Green Tea Field
When you arrive at the plaza along the cedar forest road, you will see the Daehanwon Rest Area. Here you can taste green tea ice cream and green tea shakes. From here, it's easiest to climb the central stairway to the observatory and get off at the cherry blossom path.
Tea Garden next to Boseong Green Tea Shop
If you want to look around every corner of the tea plantation, it's a little steep, but when you go up to the sea observatory through the tea field observatory, you can see the sea far away. Of course, it is the scenery that can be seen only when the weather is clear.
View from the Sea Observatory
After sighing in Boseong green tea field, only the last course is left. Woodland is one of Jangheung's hot spots! A phytoncide from more than forty years old cypress soothes the tired body. Pass the Cypress Sawdust Promenade and climb the Male Road to reach the summit of Mt.
Jangheung Cypress Forest Woodland Cypress Healing Forest
In Namdo, 'maru' is called 'male'. Don't miss the 'bathroom', one of Woodland's specialties.
Male road leading to the summit
This concludes the full schedule of 'South Namdo One Wheel' Suncheon 2 Course. Now go back to Suncheon Station and Suncheon Terminal. Although there is no shortage of time spent in each tourist destination, traveling to South Korea is much easier just by getting on a comfortable bus and seeing a jewel-like destination in one day. In addition, there are still seven courses remaining. Whisper if you have a good person.
"What about your trip to Namdo this weekend?"
Wooden deck of cypress woodland which can walk without difficulty
tip. Jeonnam Sightseeing Loop Bus “Namdo One Wheel”

Jeonnam Damyang, Gokseong (Gwangju 1 course), Suncheon, Boseong, Jangheung (Suncheon 2 course), Naju, Gangjin, Haenam, Jangheung (Gwangju 3 course), Suncheon, Boseong, Hwasun (Gwangju 4 course), Muan, Hampyeong, Yeonggwang The name of the invincible sightseeing bus that covers Gwangju 5 course, Mokpo and Sinan (6 Mokpo), Yeosu Geumodo (7th Yeosu), and Jindo (8th Jindo 8th course) is called Namdo. All seven courses depart from Gwangju except Suncheon 2 Course, which departs from Suncheon. It is a sightseeing bus exclusive to Namdo that allows you to travel in various areas of Namdo for a day trip if you pay only 9,900 won per course (excluding Yeosu 7 courses). Tickets can be purchased online or at the departure terminal ticket office.

http://www.kumhoaround.com/Home/Namdo/Tour.aspx

Groups of 30 or more are 8,000 won. Personal expenses such as food and entrance fees, travel insurance are not included.
