item.title: Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon, South Korea - 2018 Pyeongchang Tourist Road 10, road trip along the river, along the mountain, along the taste
item.description:
Nami Island with trees stretching straight into the sky

2018 Pyeongchang Tourist Road 10, road trip along the river, along the mountain, along the taste

Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon, South Korea

<Travel Course>
Chuncheon Nami Island → Chuncheon Charcoal Grilled Chicken Ribs

→ Wonju Museum Mountain → Pyeongchang Bongpyeongjang

→ Muyi Art Museum

The road trip in Gangwon-do is lyrical. When viewed from a distance, it has a river that seems to stop and sparkle and a museum that resembles a calm river. The place where people gather along the river naturally stands and is full of food. That's why my trip is full of excitement. Let's go on a road trip to Gangwon-do, where you can travel like a river and fill your heart and enjoy the taste.
Road trip begins at Nami Island floating on the Bukhan River. Travelers are famous for the drama 'Winter Sonata' and become accustomed to it. The attraction of Nami Island is that it makes you feel as if you have traveled abroad in Korea. So I don't know if it's called Naminara. There are two ways to enter Nami Island. 5 minutes by boat, or a straw wire, 30-40 km per hour to fly in 1 minute 30 seconds.
The most popular metasequoia road on Nami Island
Stepping into the Republic of Naminara, you will see a forest of trees stretching high into the sky. If you walk along the cool shade, you will find a picture book playground, a restaurant, Metasequoia Road, and a hotel Jeonggwanru. You can walk as slowly as you can, or rent a bicycle or electric car to explore every corner. Cycling rides along the Metasequoia Road, Fir Road, Ginkgo Road and Birch Road in the wind, and the summer heat is forgotten.
Bicycles are an important means of transportation on Nami Island
The place where many tourists are attracted is the location of Winter Sonata. The metasequoia road, which looks like a scene from a foreign movie, and the place where Bae Yong-jun and Choi Ji-woo make and kiss a snowman are essential courses for lovers who dream of a romantic trip.
If you are with your children, I recommend you to stop by the picture book playground where picture books are placed on a large bookshelf that extends up to the ceiling of the second floor. There are more than 20,000 children's books on the first floor, and there are more than 5,000 picture books from 86 countries on the second floor.
Drama Winter Sonata is the theme of Nami Island's eternal love
Also remember that Nami Island has a tomb of General Nami. Nami Island was originally a land belonging to Chuncheon City, and it became an island when the Cheongpyeong Dam was built in 1944. Nami spent his life in exile in Nami Island, reversing the conspiracy as a mother of Yu Ja-gwang. Today's tomb is a mystery, and the actual tomb is in Hwaseong, Gyeonggi-do.
Cool motorboat running across the water
If you know that Nami Island is in Chuncheon, you should put chicken ribs in your itinerary. "If you come to Chuncheon do not eat chicken ribs does not mean come to Chuncheon," remember the saying of the travelers. There are many restaurants that display 'Chuncheon Chicken Ribs' sign everywhere in the big city, but it's not comparable to eating in Chuncheon. You will have to try Chuncheon Chicken Ribs before moving on to other destinations. Chuncheon chicken ribs are two kinds. There are chicken ribs grilled over charcoal and grilled chicken ribs with plenty of vegetables on the iron plate. The beginning of Chuncheon Chicken Ribs was to grill on charcoal, but with the spread of thick teppanyaki, the teppanyaki style became popular.
Chicken Ribs Cooked on Sizzling Grill
Chicken rib shops on the Nami Island marina are grilled with chicken, vegetables, and rice cakes on an iron plate. Its spicy and sweet taste makes it popular with foreign tourists. If you want to eat roasted chicken ribs over charcoal, you should go to Sinbuk-eup. Any type of chicken ribs wrapped in lettuce with plenty of meat and vegetables, and served with Makguksu will complete Chuncheon's delicacy.
Chicken ribs and makguksu are a combination of fantasy
The road bends and heads to Mt. Wonju Museum. Cross the hill to the sky and pass through the birch forest path to see the picturesque Museum Mt. The scene looks like a fairy tale scene or a private garden of a rich man in Europe. With the design of world-class architect Tadao Ando, light, water, stone, nature and architecture blend together as a work of art.
Each line of the building looks like a work of art
The water garden filled with calm water has a Seosan Haemistone on the floor that turns black when it touches the water. The calm water contains the sky, so the steps leading to the entrance of the exhibition hall seem to be walking in the air. Walk slowly and admire the formation of the lines and sculptures of the building reflected in the water depending on the angle of light. There is a work by James Turrell who works on the theme of light. It is an exhibition where you can experience a new perspective on light and space.
The water garden of Mt.Museum containing the sky
When talking about Pyeongchang, Lee Hyo-seok's novel `` When Buckwheat Peel '' is indispensable. The buckwheat blossoms, which wander around the country in fiction, are so beautiful that the buckwheat blossoms bloomed in beauty.
If you want to see the buckwheat's flesh, go to Bongpyeongjang.
There is a Bongpyeongjang that is the background of the novel. It is a permanent market, but on the day of the month 2 and 7, the oil market opens and the market is noisy. It is true that Bongpyeongjang, which has a 400-year history, has been in decline since the times changed. However, the local people joined forces to preserve the tradition and renovated. Tents and aprons were made by colorizing five items, agricultural products, seafood, food, clothing, and sundries. The merchants also made displays and made plates that marked the country of origin for the customers to see. Proud to show off signs and business cards with a merchant's face. On the day of the oil stand, there are about 100 shops, and there are many buckwheat restaurants near Bongpyeongjang.
Bongpyeongjang filled with buckwheat food and the smell of crowded people
Even on rainy days, you can have fun moving between tents and tents while listening to the sound of rain falling under the hood. Yega-Chef's hand-drip coffee, or a bowl of rice wine with buckwheat pancakes, can be tasted only at Bongpyeongjang.
Bongpyeong oil stand stands on the day of the 2nd and 7th every month
You can't miss buckwheat food from Bongpyeongjang. Buckwheat is grown throughout Gangwon-do, but buckwheat has become a modifier of Bongpyeong. Like the buckwheat, Bongpyeong has various buckwheat foods such as soba noodles, buckwheat pancake, buckwheat jelly, buckwheat pancake and soba liquor.
Buckwheat is famous for its variety.
On the day of the oil stand, there are many shops selling buckwheat pans and sorghum buckwheat inside the market. Kimchi, vermicelli, pork, vegetables, etc. are put in thinly buckwheat buckwheat before making it.
Cold buckwheat blows off summer heat
Soba noodles served with spicy fresh kimchi with garnish and sprinkled with sesame salt with plenty of vegetables, are popular with both young grandchildren and elderly grandmothers.
Rice cake and hand drip coffee
Mui-Art Gallery is 10 minutes away from Bongpyeongjang. Four artists, sculptor, potter, calligrapher, renovated Muyi Elementary School, which was closed. On the playground, where students played, there are green grass and about 100 sculptures by artist Oh Sang Wook. The interior of the school is filled with sculptures and exhibits, just like students arranged works in the hallway after the art class.
Muyi Art Museum
The sound of the squeaky wooden floor and the squeaky wood windows is soed every step of the way. The classroom was an exhibition hall where the artist's work was exhibited, and an open studio of the artist in full swing, so that you can meet the present and future of Bongpyeong art. If you are a young child with a mobile phone ring, fan making, print experience (group booking), you can leave new memories and souvenirs.
Art that fills the hallway
Go up to the second floor and there is a terrace where you can relax. It is a structure that protrudes slightly at one end of the school and has a great view overlooking the wide lawn and statues.
Elementary school classroom transformed into artist's studio and exhibition hall

-Chuncheon Romantic Market
It is a representative traditional market located in Chuncheon downtown. Every corner of the market is decorated with works of art and murals, and there is an alley where the old scenery remains deep inside. Adjacent to the Myeongdong Chicken Ribs Alley, it is a popular tourist attraction.

item.title: Gimje, Jeonbuk, Korea - Gimje Arirang Literary Village
item.description:
A panoramic view of Arirang Literary Village Public Relations Hall

Gimje Arirang Literary Village

Gimje, Jeonbuk, Korea

'Ginger blind gang other emmit'. 'Jinge' means 'Gimje', 'Meng Gang' means Mangyeong, and 'Oemit' means lazy people. It is the old saying of Gimje Mangyeong Plain, Korea's representative granary. The wicked horde of Japanese colonial beasts have been spreading the land since the early 1900s. To send military beauty to the battlefield to fill their ambitions. The novelist Jo Jung-rae wrote in Arirang the history of suffering and resistance that the minchos had to face in this process.
Meet the years of raging in the novel Arirang
Why is the title of the novel Arirang? Arirang is a song that our people shared with us when we were happy or sad. The background of the novel is from the pre-Korean merger to liberation, when Arirang's ringing is the loudest. Let's take a look at the audience watching Na Un Kyu's movie Arirang in Arirang. "Kim Young-jin is being dragged by the Japanese police and the melody of" Arirang "that the band plays begins. Arirang Arirang Aririo .... When the chorus was just over, "to the independence of Korea!" It was a man's cry. "To the independence of Korea!" The novelist Cho Jung-rae said that he easily wrote the title Arirang. This may be because there is no title as appropriate as Arirang.
The novel Arirang
Arirang Literature Village reproduces the stage of the novel Arirang in reality, revealing the painful days without filtration. Since the story of Arirang begins in Juksan-myeon, Gimje-si, it has been built around the old inner village and Oori village, so travelers can experience living literature. Arirang Literary Village is largely composed of public relations hall, Harbin station, Naechon and Oeri village, and modern seizure agency. The PR Hall is itself a friendly guide to Arirang.
PR Hall 1F
Although Arirang is a best-selling book, many of them have been burdened with reading because it is a 12-volume novel. The first floor of the PR building filled the walls with text about Arirang. The plot of the flow of the novel, the portrayal of the characters and the relationship of the main characters, and the excerpts of the core anecdotes in the novel are organized in a structure. Just look around slowly and read easily to find out what Arirang is.
PR Hall 2F Letter Sculpture
On the 2nd floor of the PR Hall, there are descriptions of independent militants from Kim Je. Unfamiliar heroes protested against Japan for fear of death. The devastation of an unjust age would have led to their consequences. Independence troops rushing with guns symbolically represent this.
Independence Army Statue
Harbin Station and Seolwoon Village, a village that recreates the best scenes of modern history
Harbin Station in Arirang Literary Village is a 60% reduction of Harbin Station in China in the 1910s.
State of Harbin Station
Combining the historical background of Harbin and Arirang, there is an incident that comes to mind quickly. According to Harbin Ahn (1909). When you go out through the waiting room in the area, the best scenes of modern history are realistically expressed in statues. When Ahn Jung-geun pulls the trigger, a bullet carrying the nation's core penetrates the heart of the empire. Ito Hirobumi was shortly after getting off the train, so steam locomotives also appeared in those days.
Harbin's scene of Ahn Jung-geun
Harbin Station itself is a two-story exhibition hall related to Arirang, just like a publicity hall.
Harbin station 2nd floor comfort women statue
There is an immigrant house in front of Harbin station square. Reproduced the house and the reed house built by people who went to other country because of the Japanese colonial exploitation. At least you and your house are likely to play a role, but the reeds are too poor. In Arirang, a reed hut appears. "People who gathered a bunch of reeds began to make huts. The huts were to dig the ground into man's height and cover the roof with reeds on it."
Immigrant houses
Naechon and Oeori villages were made by reproducing houses such as Son Pan-seok, Jisam-chul, Gamgol-d's house, and Song-in-ri.
Hand-painted houses
It is a village that has idyllic ambience with neighboring thatched houses with small backs. But the landlords' lives described in the novel are not as peaceful as the town's exterior.
View of Naechon Village
Son Pan-Suk works as a liaison to the medical and independent forces and suffers a lot. Ji-chul is retaliated by the pro-Japanese Jang Chi-ilmun for his misdeeds. Gamgol is suffering from debt because his eldest son is sold to Hawaii because of debt, and his two daughters are humiliated by Japanese minions. When my eldest daughter says she's going to a concubine because of poverty, she says, "We must starve together and die together." Anyone who knows the sad story of a peaceful town can't control his feelings.
Art work near town
Modern exploitation agency built by evil in Japan
The modern exploitation agency is the place where the pain of Arirang is best conveyed. It is composed of a cotton office, a representative office (the agency where the Japanese colonial rule was employed), a post office, and a rice mill.
Modern collection agency street
The municipal office is the leading organization in the exploitation of land. Baek Jong-du, a pro-Japanese leader appointed to Juksan-myeon in Arirang, opposes the peasants by forming a landlord commissioner (a vanguard that pursues the land inspection project of the governor general). It is a land survey project, but it is a trick to take away the land of Joseon by attaching a secret bad clause. In the Juksan-myeon Office, there are telescopes, compasses, cameras, abacus, and lighters. It is obvious that it was used as a tool for evil.
Exhibition office
Is there another place as scary as the Japanese colonial rule? As soon as you enter the shelter, the sound of the sound comes out, creating an eerie feeling. "The military police made the same sound every time they wielded. It wasn't what they wanted to answer. It was a beat to save my deity in the medium, and a spirit to cheer me up." There are all kinds of torture tools, such as a whip. Inside the barbed window, the sad eyes of the imprisoned prisoners are expressed in murals, accusing the cruelty of Japan.
Picture of the wall inside the iron bars of the detention center
The post office was nothing more than a Japanese-language intelligence agency, and the mill was the only place for rice for the Japanese.
Post Office Front View
The woman's scream is heard in the mill. It's the sound of a female employee who was so hungry that she burst into the wind while stealing a little bit of rice. We need to steal rice from our land… The lives of the lost folks are cruel.
Interior view of the mill
Travel info

item.title: Sunchang-gun, Jeonbuk, Korea - Put red pepper paste, beat rice cake, make rice, and experience Jangchang
item.description:
Sunchang Paste Experience Center

Put red pepper paste, beat rice cake, make rice, and experience Jangchang

Sunchang-gun, Jeonbuk, Korea

'Jang Jang Sunchang' is Sunchang's slogan. This is a good expression of Sunchang, famous for gochujang. If you go to Sunchang Gochujang, gochujang is Sunchang. I made a traditional Jangjang paste of Sunchang, cooked foods made with soy sauce, and made a hands-on experience program to make healthy snacks. The children are very funny and even eat delicious. It is an experience where even adults grow happy.
Spicy rice cake pizza dough ~
10 am Saturday. As soon as you arrive at Sunchang Jangjang Experience Hall, you will be busy. The Jangjang experience program will take about 2 hours, including gochujang making, gochujang cooking, and seasoning of rice cakes and tofu.
Gochujang Bulgogi Pizza Making Experience
To make an effective time arrangement, we first cooked the Jangjang, then make the Injeolmi and Tumbap outside, and finally, make Gochujang. Today's dish is made from gochujang pizza with gochujang bulgogi. In addition to Gochujang Bulgogi Pizza, you can choose from Kimchi, Gochujang Spaghetti, Cheonggukjang-jjigae, Cheese Tteokbokki, Gochujang Namul Gimbap, etc. What's interesting is that instead of pizza dough, cut the rice cake into thin pans like rice cake for rice cake soup. All you need to do is pour the dough on top so that the rice cakes don't fall and stick together. Place bulgogi seasoned with red pepper paste on top of rice cake dough and sprinkle chopped vegetables with topping. Sprinkle plenty of cheese on top and decorate with ketchup. Switch on the pan with the lid on and wait for it to finish.
Gochujang Bulgogi Pizza Making Experience
Close your ears and say "Yeah ~"
While the pizza is ripe, go outside to make Injeolmi and rice. Injeolmi is the key to rice cake making. At first, adults have to take turns to crush rice grains. Tteokme is more fun and less difficult to stand and beat each other by hitting each other.
Injeolmi making experience
When the rice is crushed in moderation, change it to children's rice cake and give it to the children. Like a funny play, the children wait anxiously for their turn. After hitting three or four times, the sound of rice cakes is getting louder and louder. The black hot frying machine is turned gently to increase the pressure. The children are squeezed the handles so that they can see them once, but I'm excited to know what's coming out. Finally, I'm going to explode. The children close their ears tightly and look at the machine. "뻥 ~!" White steam is rising with a loud noise. The children rushed in when they put rice rice in a large basket. Fill your hands with greed and bury your face. It is fried quickly and its taste is very delicious. Children eat more rice than any snack.
Tempura making experience
In the meantime, Injeolmi is completed and soaked with soy flour. Child who slices rice cake, child who gets soybean powder, experience that is behind the scenes and busy to eat… . They enjoy making and eating in different ways. Injeolmi is a good combination of soybean flour mixed with chewy rice cakes. I made it and ate it right away, so the cuts of rice and the rice are delicious. It is not a taste of memories, but a taste that surpasses memories.
Tempura making experience
Taste pizza and make gochujang
After the outdoor experience, go back into the experience room. A well baked pizza is waiting. Thanks to the red pepper paste on the dough made with rice cakes, the pizza is perfect for the taste of Koreans. Gochujang seasoning is a bit spicy, but it is eaten instantly. After the pizza tasting, the highlight of the day is the red pepper paste making experience.
Gochujang making experience
First, listen to why Sunchang Gochujang is delicious and how to make it. In other regions, square meju is used to make soy sauce, soybean paste, and red pepper paste. What is unusual is that the meju is usually picked in early winter, but Sunchang makes meju at the end of August. When the weather is hot, the microorganisms that add the rich flavor of red pepper paste multiply well. Another special feature of Sunchang is that it is not only made from soybeans but also mixed with rice at 6: 4 ratio. Soybean paste is soaked in winter and aged for more than 6 months.
Gochujang making experience
After listening to the explanation, take a moment to make a gochujang quiz. The experience is surprisingly simple. Distribute bowls of mew flour, red pepper powder, Sikhye, salt, and malt in the right proportions by team. The secret is to mix them well so that they don't clump together. Mix it up and dip it with your finger to taste it. It's a strange taste. Gochujang is not made right away because it needs to be aged. As time goes by, our traditional Jangjang, which tastes deeper, is truly slow food. If you leave the gochujang made by the visitors in the experience hall, they will gather them together and mix them well. Instead of making it on-site, you will receive a well-cooked gochujang one by one.
Gochujang making experience
Gochujang Village to preserve the traditional taste
After enjoying the Jangju experience, take a look around Gochujang Village. In Kochujang Village, Kochujang can be produced and sold only if you are recognized as a master of Kochujang. The merchandise in the market is almost reliable. All you see here is the red pepper paste shop, so it's as if you're in the red pepper paste country. Gochujang Nara is not a small Gochujang village, but it is enough to catch our taste.
Sunchang Red Pepper Village
In the yard, there are many jars of red pepper paste, miso and soy sauce, and the pickles smell like pol-pol in the store. Jangjang is good, but rice thief pickles are just as popular. There are many kinds of pickles such as plums, radishes, cucumbers, garlic seeds, sweet persimmons, sesame leaves, deodeok, scallops, oysters, etc. You can taste and choose different kinds of pickles.
Sunchang Red Pepper Village
There is also a rice wine jar next to it. The pickles that are eaten in the mouth are salty, but when you taste them after sipping the rice wine, "kya" sound comes out. Cheonggukjang smells very little and tastes so mild that children eat well. The steps are so great when you pick up pickles in a hot pepper paste made by a master.
Sunchang Red Pepper Village
I have tried making jang but I do not make delicious jang. How much effort do you compare to the workmanship of a master who has been in the market forever?
Sunchang Red Pepper Village
Travel info

Sunchang Paste Experience Center
-Address: 55, Folk Village-gil, Sunchang-eup, Sunchang-gun, Jeollabuk-do
-Experience program: Make Soonchang Traditional Red Pepper Paste, Make Korean Cuisine, Make Injeol, Make Traditional Tofu
-When using the experience program, you can use the accommodation facilities in the experience hall.

http://www.janghada.com/

item.title: Seocho-gu, Seoul, Korea - Journey through the alleys of the city center
item.description:
Bangbaesai-gil Art Map <Photo courtesy of Kim Hee-Jung>

Journey through the alleys of the city center

Seocho-gu, Seoul, Korea

I think of traveling far away. However, it is urban travel that is becoming a new trend of travel for modern people who can hardly find a trip. Among them, a trip to an alleyway centered on a particular street brings new pleasures. Bangbae-dong in Seoul reminds us of a cafe alley, but there is a new way. Let's take a trip to fall with the 'Bangbae-dong Sai-gil', which is frequented up and down recently.

Bangbae-ro 42-gil, Seocho-gu, named 'Bangbaesai-gil'

The name 'bangbaesai-gil' is unique. The word "sai", meaning liver, means two or more relationships. It will be time and space to define between. In that sense, calling 42-gil as 'sai-gil' by Bangbae means not only spatial (geographical) relationship but also cultural and social relations among the people living there. Of course, '42' can be read as '시', so you can call it that way.
Saigil began to be known to the world when ten people who nested in this place tried to make the streets of culture and art. In less than two years, it has grown to a group of more than 30 people, and members participate in the form of talent donation. A representative example is the Saigil Art Map. It is the work of Kim Hee-jeong, a designer of a specialty packaging company called 'Aurum'. 'Saigil Map', drawn by hand, embodies the ideal of this street.

Quiet and secluded Bangbae-dong, what is it like?
Recently, many roads between Bangbae-dong have been reported through the media. On the holiday of the New Year's Day, I ate a late morning and went to Sai Gil. You can see signs such as 'Bangbae-dong 42-gil' and '1 ← 72' on the wall.
Different people have different tastes. Some people like crowded places, while others like quiet and secluded places. Garosu-gil was initially a secluded street, but now it's a good place for people who are turning into a complex street and want to look away. If you express Garosu-gil as a 'prose', you can say that Sai-gil is a poem. It is so quiet and secluded that it provides a space of thought.
Bangbaesai Road Signpost Address Sign
The Saigil Flea Market is held here every month from 11:00 to 5:00 on the second Saturday.
The 5th Bangbaesai-gil Festival Poster
Let's make your own creative work in the handmade workshop
As I walk down the street, I can see 'Perfume Studio'. A couple of college students appear to be counseling.
Perfume Base Showcase
When I open the door slightly and enter, I am making a fragrance for my girlfriend for my birthday. From over 100 bases and over 20 natural oils, perfume designers help design and name their own fragrances.
Perfume workshop products sold at flea markets
The second place to visit is Ceramica Paint, a ceramic hand paint workshop. As you enter the entrance, you'll find a wide variety of ceramics in different colors and shapes. Cerawalk not only offers pottery classes, but also theme-style birthday parties.
Cerawalk's colorful ceramics
You can also make your own pottery as a souvenir or gift. Draw a picture on the pottery, apply glaze and bake it in a hot kiln of more than 1,000 degrees. All of this is done in stores. On the other side of the store, you can buy pottery while making pottery.
Participants Hand Painted Porcelain Figurines
When I enter a la main, a leather workshop, I can hear the sound of a hammer. You can make your own leather bags, wallets and more to suit your style.
Leather Craft Workshop
There are also many workshops where you can make sewing classes and dolls.
Sculpture dolls on display at handmade
`` Suemade '', a custom-made jewelry shop and a needlework doll workshop, and `` le conte '', a handmade accessory shop with an eco-friendly sewing story, is recommended for children as well as adults.
Children in class
Home design shop that makes our home happy
There are many trendy European shops on the road, not only antique antiques. The home interior design editorial shop which is full of famous brands
One of the major stores is 'Ruming', which specializes in North European home interior accessories. Looking through the window, the interior of the store
Lumming's Interior Props
Also attracting attention is “Eight Colors”, which displays and sells products such as House Doctor, which is popular for kitchen and furniture accessories, and Meri Meri, which specializes in house party and children's products.
Kitchen utensils displayed on 8 color
Marmelo, a recently established import home and design company, is home to some of Europe's most famous wallpaper, fabrics and cushions.
Eco-Products
'Naenggigi', a kitchenware K-tableware specialty shop located in an imported brand shop, is unique. At the entrance of the store, chandeliers made from dozens of ceramics welcome guests. A single-use cup set that promotes a healthy diet is good enough to contain only what you need for both adults and children. Cold season
Cupboard ceramic chandelier
A step away from Bangbae-sai Road, you will find 'Iim Design', a home fashion design shop such as bedding, curtains and cushions, and 'Aurum', a gift and souvenir packaging craft design company. Ideal for special guests or events.
Cold set
Rest in a small alley gallery

Sometimes smaller but more secluded galleries can blow away the stress of urban life. There are many galleries such as Bangbae-gil. 'A factory' thinks about what kind of factory it is just by its name. Maybe a stands for art

a factory exhibit

Mina Atelier is small but can interact with the artist and appreciate the exhibits.

Mina Atelier exhibits
When you stop by Lisa and Jamie Atelier, the studios of two sisters who have gone on separate paths as singers and jewelry designers, I recommend you to buy a mobile phone case printed with the artist's work.
Lisa & Jamie Atelier Cover
You can feel the warmth and enthusiasm like the bread just saved from the toaster and the gallery toast, which plays a role as a discharge channel for young artists, is also a good place to visit.
Yoo Seong-sun Solo Exhibition at Toaster Gallery
Restaurants like galleries add to the fun of eating
Walking between two or three hours will leave your boat. I'm worried about what to eat. “Kelly Gallery & Restaurant” is eye-catching. As with most shops, the interior view through the window is a fascinating attraction. The interior is more of a gallery than an ordinary restaurant. The walls are filled with paintings, and both the table decoration and the layout are as pretty as the paintings. Ordered today's menu, duck kimchi fried rice and oil pasta. Each grain of fried rice is seasoned evenly with spicy flavors. Pasta feels alive and chewy. The combination of rich olive oil flavor, shrimp and garlic is also excellent.
Interior of Kelly Gallery Kitchen
There are pretty and delicate cakes on the cake showcase that are really questionable.
Cake made with Sugarcraft Craft
Nearby is Lari Café, a popular cake shop since 1992. The shops, like a living room in a fine English home, are comfortable and antique. Made with the finest ingredients, Lari cake melts like a snowflake the moment it is put in your mouth. I ordered a chiffon cake with half the sugar content.
Chiffon Cake and Coffee
The combination of moist and soft creamy taste and Americano using the finest beans creates a wave of emotion. Every time a coffee asks for a refill, it brings it to a new cup with a different design. In addition to the coffee, the cup tastes good.
Lari's Coffee
Bread lovers can't miss Lee Boulanger's French bread bakery. Baking fermented bread using flour and natural yeast imported from France without artificial additives. Representative bread is germinated brown rice bread that is crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. The kitchen is open, so it's fun to see the bread making process.
Gerlan Brown Rice Bread
Those who want to make cakes or macaroons can take a baking class at the Donna L. baking studio run by Le Cordon Bleu Patisserie. It is a great place to make and present special cakes for your children or special people.
Baking studio at patissier from le cordon bleu

item.title: Jeongseon-gun, Gangwon, South Korea - The beauty of native flowers that even spring virgins will cry for
item.description:
Donggang Pasqueflower Reveals Fascinating Flowers

The beauty of native flowers that even spring virgins will cry for

Jeongseon-gun, Gangwon, South Korea

The river, which flows around the rocky cliffs of Jeongseon and Pyeongchang, is a spot where people of all seasons stop because of the clear stream of snow and the surrounding scenery that unfolds for a moment. But the most exciting time for Donggang is spring. This is because Donggang Pasqueflower, a Korean plant, blooms in the limestone rocks. Let's leave now to see this flower that blooms from mid-March to April.
"Even young, pasqueflower, old age!"

The traditional nursery rhyme “Ghalmi Flower” has a simple song that shows our emotion well.

‘Invigorating flower in the back garden, white-tailed pale-flowered flower, young and old pale-flowered flower, even when it is old, … ’

The pasqueflower, though, is still so beautiful that the tears fall into tears. But why is it called 'Halmiflower'? There are very sad stories about the name of the pasqueflower. In the old days, there was a grandmother who lived with two granddaughters in Dumesan Valley. The granddaughter was pretty but ill and nasty. In time, the granddaughter became a rich man in a neighboring village, and the little granddaughter was married to a poor farmer over the mountain. In time, the old and sick grandmother visited her granddaughter, but soon afterwards she was driven out. He lived beyond the mountain to find a little granddaughter, who tried to die to the ridge, but he could not endure the cold and hunger on his sick body. A little granddaughter rushed over to hear the news and buried her grandmother in her place. People called the paschal flower because it was the grandmother's soul.
Donggang Pasqueflower White and Pink Flower
Contrary to this sad story, it is actually called a pasqueflower because the flower cover covered with white hair is bent and the pistil after the flower swells resembles an old man with white hair. In oriental medicine, pasqueflower roots are used as a Buddhist temple called Baekduong.
A flower that has closed petals under the influence of wind or the environment
In Korea, about 10 species, including yellow pale flowers, pink pale flowers and fine leaf pale flowers, grow wild and all have strong toxicity. Once upon a time, from the spring to the fall, the roots of pasqueflower were dug up and sprinkled with raw and boiled water on conventional toilets, where they were used as insecticides to kill insects.
Donggang Pasqueflower Blooming in Fan Shape
Spring in Gangwon-do begins with Donggang Pasqueflower
After the first thunder and the sound of bugs awakening from a long hibernation, a light chip (Spring-March 5 or 6) passes and Donggang Paschal blooms. Unlike Pasqueflower, which grows mainly in sunny graveyards, Donggang Pasqueflower is rooted in the crevices of limestone cliffs along the river. In addition, it is usually characterized by the comfort of the flower without bending it. It is a perennial plant where the first buds bloom and the first flowers bloom, and two flowers bloom in the following year, and the flowers increase as the years go on. It grows to about the height of an adult's hand and is covered with soft fluffy wool. The flowers are usually pinkish in color but vary in bluish purple, reddish purple and white, and bloom in various colors at the root.
A rocky cliff on the bank of Donggang, where Donggang Pasqueflower grows
In fact, those who lived in the Donggang called this flower “pale flower”. This is the story that got the cool name of “Donggang pale flowers”. In the spring of 1998, plant photographer Kim Jung-myung took an ecological picture back up the Donggang, discovered the flower and announced it to the world for the first time through a calendar of his own photos. It was revealed by Dr. Lee Young-no, a researcher of the Korea Institute of Plant Research, who, after the research, turned out to be a Korean specialty plant found only in the Donggang region. As a result, Pulsatilla tongkangensis Y.N. Lee et T.C. Lee has become a rare and special flower that shows its habitat, Donggang.
Scenery with a tandem house and a river
At that time, Donggang Pasqueflower was a strong opposition to the government's policy of building the Donggang Dam, and added enormous power to the environmental groups and the local people who made efforts to revive the Donggang River. The construction plan of the Donggang Dam was finally blanked in June 2000 by the low-level forces that introduced Donggang Pasqueflower, a Korean plant. This has led many to become interested in ecological and natural environment issues, and it is true that efforts for conservation and protection have taken place like wildfire. Numerous East River flora and fauna, and limestone caves, which are almost likely to be buried, all owe a great debt to Donggang Pasqueflower.
Donggang pasqueflower native area adjacent to the road
Donggang Pasqueflower preservation first place person
Donggang Pasqueflower survived the crisis and survived, but the following times were not smooth. With better traffic and more widespread use of high-performance digital cameras, fellow hobbyists came to the swarms to visit the Donggang Pasqueflower habitat, causing some damage, while some ignorant people took photographs to remove all the stems and leaves that are essential for hydration and survival of flowers. After taking a photo, he even went to the endangered species, committing a brutality to cut flowers at all. This is not only the case. Natural disaster also played a part. This is due to the huge typhoons “Rusa” and “Cicada” that followed in August 2002 and September 2003. Park Jae-yeol, the director of Gyul-Am-ri Village, tells the situation at that time.
“Then the river suffered a lot of damage. The level of the Donggang in front of the village has risen to a record high, and most of the Donggang Pasqueflower rooted in the ridges here are uprooted and washed down, reducing the number of people noticeably. ”
Dandelion, a nice flower we met at Donggang Pasqueflower native
In the midst of the crisis, the people who pulled their arms together for the preservation of Donggang Pasqueflower are the residents of Gyulam-ri called Donggang Pasqueflower Village. Since 2005, the village residents have formed the Donggang Pasqueflower Conservation Society, which has become a member, and have been seeding them for 10 years. At the same time, the “Donggang Pasqueflower Festival” is held in April every year, and the festival has already reached 10 times this year. On April 1 (Friday) to 3 (Sunday), the 10th Donggang Pasqueflower Festival, held at the Donggang Ecological Experience Center in Gul-Am-ri, is home to a variety of exhibitions, food fairs, and traditional games. The paschal flower is announced and the thought sharing for preservation continues.
Pussy willow
In Gangwon-do, the government has also made efforts to conserve the Donggang ecosystem, including the Donggang Pasqueflower. Every two to three years, a natural rest year was proclaimed in Donggang. Its content is to control access to the valley by June 15 so that the animals and plants that live in the Donggang River can bloom, seed, and lay eggs. Naturally, rafting is also prohibited at this time. This year is the year when the natural rest year is enforced. To overcome many crises, the Donggang Pasqueflower left by us, sprouting in the cracks of the rocks, washing our faces in the blue Donggang, and lovingly and caring for the beautiful flowers that live on our side, we must strengthen our efforts for conservation. It's up to us all to buy it.
Jeongseon Swordweed called Donggang Goren near the Donggang Pasqueflower
▶ The Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism and the Korea Tourism Organization are continuously pursuing projects to discover and nurture areas where our wildflowers, such as Jeongseon Donggang-gil, can be activated as local tourism resources. to be.
Topography of the Korean Peninsula overlooked from the Byeongchibyeong Observatory

item.title: Yongsan-gu, Seoul, Korea - Is this liberation village? Casablanca, Storage Book & Film, Sofiti
item.description:
Enjoy a hearty meal at Casablanca

Is this liberation village? Casablanca, Storage Book & Film, Sofiti

Yongsan-gu, Seoul, Korea

Liberation Village, an exotic building with old buildings and old signs. If you walk a little further on this unfamiliar and familiar street, you will be waiting for Seoul in the 1960s, with a building on a steep hill. In the spring when the rain falls, I left for the pleasure of the Liberation Village.
Liberation Village, the name of the overseas Koreans who returned to their homeland in 1945 and the displaced people. No matter how you listen, this strange neighborhood is emerging as a hot street. Introducing the hot place of Haebangchon, where you can enjoy the charms different from Itaewon and Gyeongridangil, already filled with the smell of 2000s.
Is this liberation village? Morocco? Casablanca
In small spaces, people are gathering together. It's mostly foreigners too. Even the orderer is a charming foreigner with bushy beards, so it's easy to wonder if it's overseas. If you look back and outside, this is a liberation village.
Casablanca can always see foreigners loyal
Casablanca, run by two brothers from Morocco, has a taste of Moroccan that is so good that Daniel Tudor, author of 'A Country Who Lost Miracles, Lost Joy', said, 'It's much better than Itaewon's expensive food.' . Most of the ingredients and condiments used for the large and thick sandwiches for the price are real exhaust through their hands. We hope that foreigners can taste their hometown at an affordable price.
Figure of foreigner couple waiting for ordered menu
The simple yet generous ingredients in the savory, hot baguette are a good example of Morocco's intense and addictive exotic flavor. Shrimp sandwiches with Moroccan sauce and Harry's Hot Sauce are the most popular dishes! The Moroccan Chicken Sandwich, with its curry-flavored chicken and vegetables, is also available.
A simple yet rich sandwich from Casablanca's main menu
In addition, soup made from lentil beans, which are said to be good for health, and `` Makuda '', a potato croquette that is also enjoyed as a street food in Morocco, is also an unusual menu.
Lentil Soup Known as Health Food by Lee Hyo Ri
If you want a limited edition book, 'Storage Book & Film'
If exotic restaurants tempt you at the beginning of the liberation village, the world of those who are quietly living their lives without signboards over the steep hillsides raises questions. Among them, 'Storage Book & Film', which is located near the three-way intersection of emerging churches, is an independent bookstore that started with the sale of film cameras and has now expanded to the distribution of independent publications.
The shop is simple but there are a lot of treasures to see.
In addition to independent publications, the camera is based on various kinds of photo books. Independent magazine 'Walkjin' is a collection of photographs published by bookstore owners. Season 1, the last greeting with 22 episodes, consisted of 45-60 photographs of a city captured by one person. Is filling. If you want to participate, you can knock on the bookstore door.
A look at Storage Book & Film on a slope
In addition, there are various lectures related to publishing such as InDesign, book binding, and calligraphy. In particular, the four-week photo book making and independent publishing courses are solid enough to be consistently found by people.
Visitors who touch books for a long time and find their own books
Soapy genie where soap becomes work
In the past, there are various types of studios that look like hidden paintings between the alleys. Two years ago, when you open the door of the soap studio Sopizini, you will be greeted by the fragrances that make your sense of smell happy and the colors of the eyes strong.
Cutely decorated studio is cozy
The master's job is an English teacher. Soap making, a long-time hobby, became another happiness that can't be removed from life after five years since it started selling in flea markets. Not only the fragrance and color, but also the potency of each soap, her efforts go all the way to shine even more.
Emotional handmade soaps that can only be found in Sopigini
Like the British handmade cosmetics brand, Rush, we hope to become Korea's leading handmade soap brand beyond Haebangchon.
Showcase outside the studio
It is a warm spring day to hold hands with your loved ones. How about leaving your first outing with a liberation village where your senses as well as your eyes, nose and mouth are happy?
Sofignini owner making soap
Travel info

item.title: Mapo-gu, Seoul, Korea - The main character on TV is me, I do it! MBC WORLD Broadcast Theme Park [My Home Trip_Seoul]
item.description:
MBC WORLD Broadcast Theme Park Hall of Fame

The main character on TV is me, I do it! MBC WORLD Broadcast Theme Park [My Home Trip_Seoul]

Mapo-gu, Seoul, Korea

It is a warm Chinese New Year where at least two generations and as many as four generations gather together to multiply happiness. Why don't you go out on your way home with your family? Seoul prepared for those who are home. Let's have fun at MBC WORLD broadcasting theme park where the space inside the TV spreads out right in front of you.
Infinite Challenge is in front of my eyes!
The station I thought only as a vague world becomes my world! MBC WORLD Broadcast Theme Park where you can meet the stars on TV and experience the shooting scene. Everyone who is interested in the broadcasting system and overseas tourists who have visited our country on the Korean wave are experiencing this place.
A place where you can see the history of MBC and broadcasting equipment
M
Props used by reporters at the Seoul Olympics
The best gift for tourists who visited K-Pop stars is the hologram concert. Hallyu stars such as Big Bang and Psy will be captivated when they reach out. You can enjoy a stage that is more dynamic with the effects of directing and effects that are difficult to realize on the general stage.
Children in virtual experiences playing roles in news experience studios
How about becoming a member of the 7th infinite challenge? In order to fulfill the mission received at MBC Yeouido's underground parking lot, he meets a horror special, Creepy Broadcasting Station, in his 360-degree virtual reality. Unexpected tricks lurking everywhere invite you into a creepy horror. In addition, you can go through the corner of the station with an announcer and walk the DMZ with Henry to experience the real experience.
VR experience to meet 360 degree virtual reality

I can receive an autograph by an email with the greeting of the star

Posing with the virtual husband G-Dragon and one, two, three!
In the augmented reality recording studio of <I am a singer>, the stars of <I am a singer> such as Kim Bum-soo, Yoon Min-su, and Yoon-ha sing and sing with me. On the other hand, in our booth, you can go out with your favorite star and take photos of couples. In addition, King of Mask Singer, I Live Alone, and My Little Television are waiting for visitors.
'House alone' Cut with Gangnam!

Augmented Reality recording studio recording duet of “I miss you”
MBC WORLD Broadcast Theme Park where you can experience various aspects of the station with your family. On New Year's Day, let's have a good time here instead of chatting with rice cake soup at home. Young nieces will be filled with heart-feeling emotions, and adults will be given a memorable gift.

item.title: Naju, Jeonnam, Korea - Simple and courteous, special Christmas in Naju Dew Village
item.description:
At Christmas, the village is transformed into a fairy tale country.

Simple and courteous, special Christmas in Naju Dew Village

Naju, Jeonnam, Korea

The bustling streets of the carols, the trees that reveal their individuality, the sparkling lights, the people who are busy walking. All those scenery we call Christmas. By the way, for 10 years, there is a village to celebrate Christmas with a little different from that of the city center. At this time of year, the main character is Naju Isl Village, which simply renovates country roads and promotes harmony between residents and other tourists. After successfully hosting Happy Christmas in the Isle Village in the winter of 2007, let's go to the Isle Village, which has become the first Christmas village in Korea.
The first Christmas village in Korea
Dew Village is a small country village north of Naju, located at the foot of Byeongpung Mountain. Its official name is Yangcheon-ri, Yangan-ri, Noan-myeon, but it is called dew village because the dew leaves well on the blade of grass every morning. The fort is more famous for its Christmas village than for its dewy village. The Santa mural painted on the wall of the village entrance also reveals the identity of the village. Even the café is operated under the name 'Christmas Cafe' throughout the four seasons. In 2007, the Christmas festival was held to increase farm incomes and develop differentiated village festivals. Last year, more than 5,000 people gathered during the festival. Only the villagers' power has completely changed the rural landscape.
The Christmas festival in the village is the result of a good balance between environmental conditions and the characteristics of the residents. In the middle of the village is the Presbyterian Church, the first Catholic church in Naju, where residents made trees and decorated the cathedral every Christmas. It seems that this support was possible because most of the residents were Catholics. Dew Village plans to develop the festival into Naju's representative winter festival starting in 2017, when it celebrates its 10th anniversary with pride of being the country's first village Christmas festival venue.
The villagers in the dew village turned into Santa <Photo courtesy of dew village>
Complex and obvious Christmas is NO! Preview winter landscape of dew village
This year's Happy Christmas Festival is held in the village of Isle Village for five days from December 21st to 25th as 'Christmas Light Festival'. The center of the festival is also the Presbyopia. Jeong-rak, who fled from Seoul to escape persecution in 1894, operated a drugstore and evangelized the residents one by one. Later, through the hands of several brides, a parish was built, expanded and newly built, and now has its present appearance in 1957. The archetype was relatively well preserved and was designated as Registered Cultural Property # 44 in 2002. The presbyopian cathedral with light bulbs along the border of the building is as fantastic as a princess's house in a fairy tale. It is not magnificent or gorgeous, but I like the simple and cozy look that resembles a dewy village. The atmosphere of the day Jesus was born would have been like this.

Unbelievable stories about the cathedral are also told. During the Korean War, the People's Army occupied Naju and ordered it to be burned, but the soldiers saw it burning red and reiterated that it was already burned. Stories about the illusions that prevented the damage of the cathedral were introduced in magazines and made known to many people. Whether this is true or not, after seeing the story, the presbyopia looks different from the beginning. Perhaps this is the best Christmas village with a holy spirit.

If you pay the entrance fee of 5,000 won in cash, you can fully enjoy Christmas in the village. Children under 7 are free. Major programs include Santa tractor rides, candle making, wish postcards, and straw slides. Even if it doesn't seem like a big deal, the women's council's senior citizens' meetings are all prepared by hand. Just because we've laid straws on the slides for the children's injuries can tell us how they have prepared for the festival.

Tourists gather together in front of the stage <Photo courtesy and dew village>
From 6 pm, you can watch a small performance performed by talent donations of Naju citizens. Nanta, Janggu, Gugak, Ocarina, Ukulele, Acoustic Guitar, Magic, and many other genres. The light sculptures that make up the photo zone are lit from 5:30 pm to 10:30 pm. You can explore the space divided by various themes such as the rose garden and the garden of light, or visit the simple exhibition of photo exhibitions and LED works. If you go out, you can fill your stomach at the dewy local food market. Isle Village Farm Specialty Sales Center is also operated.
Village seniors weaving straw grass on a slide <Photo courtesy of dew village>
Rural experience, another way to enjoy the dew village
There is plenty to do even if you visit the village after the Christmas festival. Dew Village was an experience village that operated various rural experience programs before becoming a Christmas village. Since being designated as a green farming experience village in 2004, the number of visitors has increased significantly. There are also seasonal programs such as planting seedlings in spring, bamboo water pistols, potato digging, corn harvesting, pepper picking, hand planting, rice threshing in the fall, and sweet potato digging in the spring. There are also experiences such as sesame leaf kimchi making, seasoning rice cake, making straw bales and natural dyeing. There is also a campsite and a guest house in the village, so it's easy to hear without worrying about your stay.
Travel info

Naju Dew Village
-Address: 119 Isolchon-gil, Noan-myeon, Naju-si, Jeollanam-do
Contact: 061-335-0123

http://www.eslfarm.com/mall/index.php

item.title: Icheon, South Korea - Flying freely in the autumn sky, Icheon hot air balloon free flight
item.description:
Hot Air Balloon <Photo courtesy of Korea Organization Association>

Flying freely in the autumn sky, Icheon hot air balloon free flight

Icheon, South Korea

As a child, I imagined flying freely in a big balloon like a heroine in a fairy tale. The desire to fly in the sky as an adult remains the same. It's exciting to imagine that you're flying in the wind with a hot air balloon instead of an airplane. The place to make that dream come true is Seokyung-ri village in Icheon, Gyeonggi-do. From this place, it floats up to the sky and flies around the Icheon plain, where the autumn light has fallen.
Flying dreams
A balloon flying in the air with a basket in a large balloon-shaped pocket. There are three major organizations we know. There is a hot air balloon that heats the air with fire and rises to the sky, a gas balloon that fills a balloon with hydrogen or helium, and a rosiere method that is a mixture of a hot air balloon and a gas balloon. It is often the gas balloon that comes only 20-30 meters into the sky after the balloon is tied down at the event or tourist spot.
Hot air balloon
The equipment you can experience in Icheon Seogyeong-ri is a hot air balloon that warms air with fire and floats in the sky, allowing you to fly freely in the direction of the wind. It's not just an experience, but a 'flying' flying over the Icheon Plains in a hot air balloon. Rest assured that pilots who are certified by the Korea Organization Association will read and control the wind flow.
It's so big that people can fit inside the balloon.
Hot air balloons move along the wind. So they fly between two to three hours after the most stable sun rises. Because of the early morning flight, the Korea Association of Associations operates a one-night and two-day program. In the afternoon of the day before the flight, stay in the village of Seogyeongsul, and prepare to take off after seeing the weather condition around 7 o'clock around dawn.
Spread the hot air balloon on the ground before taking off
Head to the park next to Seogyeong Reservoir, a dusky dawn take-off. Envelopes, big balloons that let you fly into the sky, are placed on the floor and filled with blown air with a large fan. It's so big that I want to swell it in a circle, but in 15 minutes it's a balloon. When the goofy is filled to some extent, it burns the air with a burner to heat the air. It floats like a balloon in an instant.
Fill the air to inflate the balloon
The principle of a hot air balloon is very simple. Heating the air in the airbag lowers the density of the air in the bag and rises to the sky.
Heat the air and hot air balloon comes to mind
It's just a blue sky when you look up, and the wind flows differently depending on the altitude. The pilot checks the direction of the wind along the altitude, fires and stops, and changes the altitude to adjust the balloon.
Heat the air and hot air balloon comes to mind
Ride on a basket-like gondola with a snack to eat and water. Goofy shakes softly in the wind, so the gondola shakes. When the pilot fires the fire for a long time, the instrument quickly comes to mind. It is more stable than when it comes to land. In a moment, the Seogyeong Reservoir is placed under your feet and the ground crew unwinds the ropes that hold the balloon and the flight begins.
Burner to warm air from hot air balloon
Having experienced paragliding and bungee jumping, even those who are looking at the scenery from the sky will experience a different experience when they ride a hot air balloon. The feeling of flying in the air without wearing equipment on the body can not be expressed in words. It feels like you're walking in the sky because you can float and walk around in a basket.
Pilots operate instruments in the direction of the wind
Morning on the sky
I was worried that it would be cold in the early morning sky, but it wasn't cold because the fire pillars rose above my head and the Onggi boiled in the basket. The village under the feet is busy starting the day, and the hot air balloon slowly swims over other worlds. Icheon is surrounded by mountains around Bing, so the wind is stable and it is the only plain in Gyeonggi-do.
Icheon plain from the mechanism
The wide plains, rural villages, and wild mountains make the city look so dense when viewed from the sky. Looking down from the sky, the compartments are divided and the yellow fields are like pie slices and the house is like a toy block. I wonder what the white snowy plains are like.
Icheon plain from the mechanism
As you fly early in the morning, you can see how the fog slowly settles far below the horizon. On clear days, you can see the sun rising from the horizon. It is only possible to travel on a hot air balloon while swimming in the sky in the autumn hot air balloon, and when Kim residents gather for Kim Jang-chul, they can sit down and get one Kimchi Kimchi.
Looking down from the sky, the world is like a toy village.
Hot air ballooning flies around two thousand for an hour. Every day, depending on the wind, they fly on an average of 20km to land on the Namhan River, the Anseong River basin, or land on harvested rice fields. Most of them land on rice fields, so free flight is only possible from October to March after the harvest is over. When he flew the farthest, he even went to Chungju. As hot air balloons fly freely, ground agents will follow you from below, so don't worry about going home.
Looking down from the sky, the world is like a toy village.
Seogyeongdl Experience Village
In addition to free flight flying by wind, you can experience mooring flight by connecting the land and hot air balloon, and climbing up to 10 ~ 20m above the ground. The mooring flight is mainly made up of student groups who come to Seogyeongdeul Village for experiential learning. It is the most exciting and exciting moment for children. Children's laughter, like colorful leaves, floats in the autumn sky with a hot air balloon.
Hot Air Balloons at Night
Seo Kyung-ri, a take-off place for hot air balloons, is a village where you can experience various farming experiences, such as making hand tofu, soaking intestines, and catching loach. It is a good opportunity to make a deep memory with hot air balloon experience.
Hot Air Balloons at Night
Let's leave to enjoy the season that is getting shorter in the middle of autumn when the colorful peak is the peak of autumn.
Hot Air Balloons at Night
Travel info

item.title: Jung-gu, Seoul, Korea - Christmas & New Year Hotel Packages “For Special Holidays”
item.description:
Christmas package presented at InterContinental Seoul <Picture Credit: InterContinental Seoul>

Christmas & New Year Hotel Packages “For Special Holidays”

Jung-gu, Seoul, Korea

The cold winds make us lighter in our pockets. Here is a little extravagant hotel package for you who have been running hard for a year. Let's take a look just in case. Who knows and will meet someone who wants to make use of the Christmas hotel package!

Grand Ambassador Seoul

The All About Eve package is ready for romantic Christmas Eve. Christmas dinner at the banquet hall on the 19th floor with a panoramic night view of Namsan Mountain is included. Starting at 429000 won. There is also a “sweet holiday package” for romantic time only. It consists of one night, a bottle of wine and sweet macaroons in a cozy superior room for 24 and 31 days. Starting at 25,9600 won. There is also a “Namsan Sunrise Package” where you can prepare for the New Year while watching the sunrise at Namsan, the symbol of Seoul. Coffee and hot packs are useful for trekking in Namsan, and two room service breakfasts and a sauna pass for relaxing after sunrise. Only one day on December 31st. Starting at 28,3800 won. Happy New Year 2015 Package (Photo courtesy of Lotte Hotel Seoul)
Mayfield Hotel

At Mayfield Hotel, the Christmas & Year-end package My Sweet Heart is available in three versions from December 24 to 31. It includes a "sweet box" containing imported sweets, jelly and candy, and a "sweet heart delivery" mailing of love letters.
"My Sweet Heart" version 1 features a Superior Room and a Michelin 2-Breakfast Buffet, while version 2 offers Christmas headbands and Santa Helena wine for Christmas Eve customers only. Version 3 has Christmas Eve performances and dinners. Starting at 276,000 won. Tax and service charge separately. Contact 02-2660-9000.

http://www.mayfield.co.kr/

Grand InterContinental Seoul

Grand InterContinental Seoul has a "Christmas of Love" package that adds cinema to your hotel break. Packages for the modern people who want to enjoy both relaxing and cultural life in the city include a chocolate basket and a bottle of wine. It also offers tickets to the Winter Festival Christmas Market booth held in the COEX complex. There is also a 'Celebrating 2015 Package' for the new year. In 2015, you can enjoy unlimited wine at the lobby lounge of the hotel, based on healing in the city, and experience Bongeunsa and other fireworks. Christmas packages start at 305,000 won and New Year packages start at 295,000 won. Tax and service charge separately. Contact 02-3430-8888
https://www.grandicparnas.com:444/kor/index.do

Celebrating 2015 Package (Photo courtesy of InterContinental)
Imperial Palace Seoul

Imperial Palace Seoul has prepared an “In the mood for love” package for a romantic Christmas in the heart of the city. Includes room, breakfast, real wood candle & saucer set. If you choose a room as a suite, room service such as wine, pizza, chocolate, and mini cakes is added. There is also an “In the Mood for Love-Special Eve” package where you can enjoy Christmas parties in your room. This is a special package that includes two tickets to the Lobby Lounge Del Mar's Christmas party in the “In the mood for love” package. There is also a New Year's Eve package that will allow you to enjoy the year-end party and the New Year. Christmas packages start at 290,000 won and New Year packages start at 220,000 won. Tax and service charge separately. Contact 02-3440-8000.
http://www.imperialpalace.co.kr/

item.title: Andong, Gyeongbuk, Korea - Wear 'Tal' and stop 'Tal'! A fair world given for a long time
item.description:
Man, Seonbi, and Butcher Fighting Over the Urang

Wear 'Tal' and stop 'Tal'! A fair world given for a long time

Andong, Gyeongbuk, Korea

There were many disasters in Hahoe village. Then one day, the spirit of the village residents Heo-Ryeong dream appears and says, 'If you make 12 masks, the disaster will disappear.' Heo Do-ryeong, who entered the mask making, unfortunately dies while making the last Imatal. The reason is that they could not keep the spirit of the San Spirit that 'no one should see it when making masks'. The neighbor's maiden (who knows nothing) admired Hur Do-Ryung stole him for a mask and the two die. Hahoe mask was born like this.
When looking at Hahoe Village, one of Andong's representative hot spots, there are two things that are unfortunate. One is the Hahoe Star Shinguthal Play, and the other is the view of the Hahoe Village looking up at Buyongdae. Today's protagonist is Hahoe Star New Good Play. We will focus on Byeolshingut and Hahoe Mask and look at Hahoe Village where the Good Pan was held. Follow the ancestors who wrote 'Tal' and wished for 'mutal'. Into the exciting story told by 'Tal' that felt only fun. Earl!
Hahoe Stars Sin Good Tal Nori is a talol that has been held since the middle of the 12th century in Hahoe Village, Andong, Gyeongbuk. At the same time, it was a village gut to pray for the well-being of the village, Daedong and a good harvest. Residents believed that farming and well-being depended on Dongshin's protection of the village. Bakshingut is a special gut that is held every period to cheer up the gods and free the anger. Hahoe Star Singuthal Play was also a festival to relieve body and mind exhausted from social status and farming.
View of Hahoe Village from the Buyongdae
Desire to wish for goodbye and goodbye
Nature was a powerful entity in agricultural society. This is because life and death have been determined by what happened for a year of farming. It could be said that the peace of the village, including PungNong, depends on nature outside the human realm and on the will of God. Because of this, our ancestors held a ritual that they would like to ask the patron god this year if it is full moon. This is called 'sugar' or 'copper'.
Moodong Madang, where Gaek Clown enters the village via Mudong
Wanting a good harvest to God is the same, but the star Shingut was held at regular intervals. Every 5 to 10 years, or when there was a trust 'byeolsingut' was unfolded. As the name suggests, 'Busin Gut' is the same, in that both Dongje and Byunsin Gut wish for goodbye and good farming. If there is a difference, Star Shin Gut is a large gut plate that is held at regular intervals to solve them when the god's experience of protecting the village is reduced or when God's anger is bought. Byshinshingut was the main character or villagers.
The main character of Baekjeong Yard that entertains the audience.
Another way to enjoy Hahoe Village, Hahoe Stars New Good Play
In the 21st century, the festival and the Hahoe Stars Shin Guktalol, which encompassed the local community in the traditional society, continue to be held. It's also in Andong Hahoe Village where the old and exciting Hahoe Star New Goodtal Play took place! The performance is held four times a week (Wed, Fri, Sat, Sun) until December, and during the weekend from January to February.
Most performances will be like that, but it is best to see Hahoe Stars New Goodal Play. The dwarf, which had been worn by villagers for more than half a century, conveys laughter, satire, and comfort to modern people in the 21st century. Half a century later, the Hahoe Star New Goodal Play is held only once (14:00) on the day of the performance. There are some fluctuations in the high season and low season, so you should check it beforehand. You can catch the line by looking around Hahoe Village in time for the performance. The boat going to Buyongdae overlooking the town of Hahoe operates until 5 pm.
Ferryboat to and from Bouyongdae and Hahoe Village
Therefore, if the arrival time of Hahoe Village is full of boat times, it is better to go up to Buyongdae. By ferry, it takes about 10 to 15 minutes to get up to Buyongdae. Go up to the Buyongdae, meet the view of Hahoe Village, and slowly take a look around Hahoe Village. Hahoe Village, known as Pungsan Ryu's Village. This space has become famous for its 600-year-old tradition, but the ball of water flowing through the village is large. The name Hahoe came from here. In feng shui geography, it is a softening float, a lotus that floats on the water.
Hahoe Village Yangjindang
Hahoe Village, home to various old houses from the early to late Joseon Dynasty, is still a space where people live. Among the many old houses, the treasures of Hahoe Village, Yangjin-dang (Treasure No. 306) and Ryu Seong-ryong Jong-taek Chung Hyo-dang (Treasure No. 414), where Iam Ryu Jung-young and Ryu Un-yong stayed, are worth a visit.
Jong-ae Chung Hyo-dang of Seo-ae Ryu Sung-ryong
It's a pity not to forget Byeongsan Seowon, which is located between Hahoe Village and Volcano (271m). Seoae Ryu Seong-ryong's pupils and larvae built a shrine here and became a formal vow. The peaceful stream of water and rock formations overlooking Mandalu is awesome. After receiving the sum of Byeongsan Seowon in 1863, he survived the abolition of Seowon of Heungseondaewon.
Byungsan Seowon Admission Hall
Shoulder dances are a must for satire and humor throughout the times
Hahoe Stars Singuthal Play starts at 'Mudong Madang', where play cards received a new game in Seonangdang. Each corner, supported by the incarnation of the Holy Spirit, appears on the shoulders of the mover without stepping on the ground. This scene symbolizes the welcome of the village guardian deity. It has peace and abundance.
Halmi Madang, Synthetaling of Khalmi
Following this, Juji Madang is opened. 'Juji' is a sacred and scary imaginary animal. Female winning means praying for fertility and farming.
Humor and poignant satire
The humor and satire of our ancestors are revealed in earnest from the 'Baekjeong yard', where Baek Chung grabs cows and removes salt shakers and urang (bulbs). Bunetal, also called Gwabutal, is a `` Pagye Riding Yard '' that shows off its fine appearance. The monk, buried in the urine of Bune, dancing with excitement, abandons religion and visits human nature. Subsequently, Yangban and Seonbi appeared in an argument about the fireball that is 'good for Yang', showing the hypocrisy and pretense of the ruling class.
Monk against Bune
As such, masked dances show the contradictions of society and the hypocrisy of the ruling class. There are scenes of laughter and piercing in the eyes of the 21st-century descendants. At least during the full unfolding of the New Singut would be free regardless of status, gender and wealth. Of course, after the end of the end, you had to go back to your original status, but you might have enjoyed the freedom and blown away the stress for a while.
Audiences Enjoying Hahoe Star New Goodal Play
A world of fullness and equality permitted to the oppressed. This is a Daedong festival and special gut that eased the conflicts and made the village unity. Hundreds of years later, Hahoe Stars New Guttal play is the reason why.
Audiences Enjoying Hahoe Star New Goodal Play

item.title: Seogwipo, Jeju, South Korea - Shooting while breathing with nature: ATV Experience Center, Jeju Daeyu Land
item.description:
Clay shooting in nature

Shooting while breathing with nature: ATV Experience Center, Jeju Daeyu Land

Seogwipo, Jeju, South Korea

Jeju is open for four seasons and is a paradise for leisure sports enthusiasts. Even though autumn is over, we are on the threshold of the cold season, but in Jeju you can still enjoy various activities under the warm sunshine. In addition, special sports activities such as shooting that are not easily accessible are also possible. We visited Daeyuland to experience clay shooting, rifle and pistol shooting.

Pleasure to hit the flying disc! Clay shooting

Daeyu Land is located in the middle mountainous area of Seogwipo City and is the only place where you can experience clay shooting in Jeju. In addition to the clay shooting range, which is made up of indoor and outdoor spaces, 330ha (about 1 million pyeong) of Jeju's nature, there are rifle, pistol shooting range, and ATV experience ground.

bang! The sound is thrilling all over the body. The exhilarating energy of the air blows through the whole body at once. You haven't hit the target, but you will be happy regardless of your success. Follow the staff's instructions and shoulder the gun again. Second shot! The flying disc is hit by a bullet, split into two, and falls off without force. I am excited like children with more pleasure than before. I feel like old stress washed away at once. The first world of shooting is a series of curiosity and surprises. Once you have tasted clay shooting with nature, you have no choice but to fall in love with it.

Camellia blooms on the way to the shooting range.

Clay shooting is a leisure sport in which clay disks are thrown into the air. Because you have to hit moving objects, you need a lot of quickness and concentration. Above all, the pleasure of hitting the flying disc is very exciting. Even beginners can learn without difficulty, so everyone can try it.

Professional staff members are placed one-on-one during shooting experience

Clay shooting uses a shotgun. With the buttocks on your shoulders, one hand holds the trigger side and the other hand supports the muzzle unsteadily. Shotguns are large and heavy and have a large recoil after shooting. Therefore, it is necessary to keep both feet firmly on the ground and posture before shooting. When the disc is slightly below the muzzle, firing increases the hit rate. Wearing earplugs is a must since the gunfire sounds very loud after launch. Shooting a total of 16 shots, of which only 5-7 hits are great skills. If you are confident in clay shooting, you can also go hunting for wild pheasants.

Loading ammo into shotgun
Aim at the target! Rifle and pistol shooting
Opposite the Clay Shooting Range, there is another space for pistol and rifle shooting. Pistols and rifle shots aim at targets that do not move in the shooting range surrounding bulletproof glass.
There is a rifle and pistol shooting range opposite Clay Shooting Range.
The scores are given for each target range, so you can also compare your shooting skills. After the experience, you can take your target as a souvenir.
Pistols and rifle ranges are bulletproof glass.
The pistol extends the arm forward and holds it with both hands. Close one eye and match the target and muzzle with the other eye. And launch! Less recoil after firing than clay shots, but shots are as good as shotguns. Of course, earplugs are a must.
Aim and fire at the still target
The most exciting time to check the target plate after shooting.
Hold the pistol as if it's wrapped with both hands
If the pistol is too small and the shotgun is a bit of a burden, we recommend rifle shooting. Best of all, the gun is light and easy to position. Like a pistol, close one eye and aim at the target. If you've been to the army, rifle shooting can be quite familiar.
Travelers experiencing rifle shooting
Surprisingly, women enjoy shooting quite a lot of fun, but often score better than men.
Grand Master Shooter list of high scorers

The ammunition used in the shooting experience is all used in practice, so be careful about your safety during the experience. Daeyu Land has professional staff at the shooting range to help tourists experience shooting safely. In addition to clay shooting, pistols and rifle shooting can be enjoyed by anyone of all ages. However, you can experience from age 14 or older.

Travelers holding their targets as souvenirs
ATV instincts run on four wheels!

Shooting experiences are somewhat short, usually taking between 15 and 20 minutes. If you feel uncomfortable, take a step to the ATV experience. You can enjoy the joy of enjoying the great nature while enjoying the blowing wind.

ATV Experience

ATV is a popular leisure sport that runs through nature including wild off-road, mountains and fields. Anyone who can't drive can experience ATV, so many families visit. However, you can hold the steering wheel yourself at least 14 years old, and you can carry children in front of or behind the driver's seat.

Travelers trained before hands-on training
Tomb The engine starts to sound up lightly. The faces of experienced visitors wearing helmets and waiting for departure signals are recalled. Finally starting! Rolling movements and vibrations are transmitted to the passengers as if the big wheel bounced off the bumpy road.
Anyone can easily experience ATV
Run off-road breathing with nature as if you were an explorer. Sometimes the fun will blow away the dust and your mind will be calmed. The ATV experience is very satisfying to enjoy for stress relief.
ATV breathing with nature
Travel info
